Egypt kho lamloh mamih aka khuen Moses he, hlang khaw a taengah mebang a om khaw m'ming uh moenih,” a ti uh.
Te dongah Aaron loh amih te, “Na yuu rhoek, na canu, na capa hna dongkah sui hnaii te dul uh lamtah kai taengah hang khuen uh,” a ti nah.
Pilnam pumloh a hna dongkah sui hnaii te a dul uh tih Aaron taengla a khuen uh.
Amih kut lamkah a loh phoeiah tah te te cacung neh a dum tih vaito mueihlawn la a saii. Te phoeiah, “Israel nang kah pathen la he, he long ni Egypt kho lamloh nang ng'khuen he,” a ti uh.
Aaron loh a hmuh vaengah a hmai ah hmueihtuk a suem. Te phoeiah Aaron loh a hoe tih, “Thangvuen ah BOEIPA taengah khotue om ni,” a ti nah.
A vuen ah thoo uh tih hmueihhlutnah a khuen uh. Rhoepnah a tawn phoeiah tah pilnam te ngol tih a caak a ok neh thoo uh tih nuei uh.
Te vaengah BOEIPA loh Moses te, “Egypt kho lamkah na khuen na pilnam he a poci coeng dongah cet lamtah suntla laeh.
Amih ka uen longpuei lamloh vilvak taengphael uh tih amamih ham mueihlawn vaito a saii uh. Te te a bawk uh tih te te a nawn uh. Te phoeiah, “Namah pathen long ni Israel khaw Egypt kho lamloh na khuen,” a ti uh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh Moses te, “Pilnam he ka hmuh vaengah pilnam kah a rhawn khaw mangkhak rhoe he.
Te dongah kai he n'rhoe laeh. Ka thintoek he amih taengah sai vetih amih ka khap lah ve. Tedae nang te namtom taengah pilnu la kang khueh bitni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Moses tah a Pathen BOEIPA neh a maelhmai te thae coeng. Tedae, “BOEIPA aw balae tih Egypt kho lamloh tanglue thadueng neh, tlungluen kut neh na khuen na pilnam taengah na thintoek khaw a sai eh?
Balae tih Egypt rhoek loh a thui mai eh? A thae la, “Amih te tlang ah ngawn ham neh amih te diklai hman lamloh khah ham ni amih a khuen,” ti ve. Na thintoek thinsa lamloh mael lamtah na pilnam sokah boethae khaw kohlawt mai.
Abraham te khaw, Isaak te khaw, na sal Israel te khaw poek mai. Namah loh amih taengah na toemngam tih amih te, 'Na tiingan te vaan aisi bangla, ka ping sak vetih khohmuen pum he na tiingan taengah ka paek vetih kumhal ham a pang uh ni,’ ka ti nah,” na ti,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah a pilnam soah boethae saii ham a thui tangtae te BOEIPA loh ko a hlawt.
Te daengah Moses te mael tih a kut dongkah olphong cabael panit neh tlang lamloh suntla thuk. Cabael rhoi te a vae rhoi ah a daek pah tih khatben ah khaw khatben ah khaw a daek.
Te rhoi tah Pathen kah kutngo cabael coeng tih, Pathen kah a cadaek a cadaek te amah loh cabael dongah a daek.
Pilnam kah a o ol te Joshua loh a yaak van vaengah Moses te, “Rhaehhmuen kah caemtloek ol te,” a ti nah.
Tedae, “Thayung thamal aka doo ham ol pawt tih yawknah aka doo kah ol bal moenih. A doo ol ka yaak ngawn dae,” a ti nah.
Rhaehhmuen la a moe vaengah vaitoca neh a lam te a hmuh. Te dongah Moses kah thintoek te sai tih a kut te a voeih. Te dongah a kut lamkah cabael rhoi khaw tlang yung ah bok rhek.
Te phoeiah vaitoca a saii uh te a loh tih hmai neh a hoeh. A tip la a neet phoeiah tui soah a phul tih Israel ca rhoek te a tul.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Aaron te, “A taengah tholh len na khuen pah ham he pilnam loh nang taengah balae a saii?” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Aaron loh, “Ka boeipa kah thintoek khaw sai boel mai dae saeh. Pilnam a thae aih khaw namah loh na ming.
Kai taengah, “Kaimih ham pathen saii lamtah te te mamih hmai ah cet bitni. Egypt kho lamloh mamih aka mawt hlang, Moses he a taengah metla a om khaw m'ming moenih,” a ti uh.
Te dongah amih te, “U khaw sui aka tah dul uh,” ka ti nah. Te vaengah kamah taengla m'paek uh tih hmai dongah ka pup hatah he vaitoca la poeh,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah pilnam te a hlahpham coeng tila Moses loh a hmuh. Amih aka tlai thil taengah Aaron loh nueih thaboep la a hlahpham dong ni.
Te dongah Moses tah rhaehhmuen vongka ah pai tih, “BOEIPA kah te tah kai taengla,” a ti nah hatah Levi koca boeih te anih taengla tingtun uh.
Te phoeiah amih te, “Israel Pathen BOEIPA loh he ni a thui. Hlang loh a cunghang te a phai ah kaelh saeh. Cet saeh lamtah vongka lamloh vongka patoeng hil rhaehhmuen te hil saeh. Te vaengah a manuca hlang te khaw, a hui kah hlang khaw, a hmaiben hlang khaw ngawn saeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Moses ol bangla Levi koca rhoek loh a saii uh tih te hnin ah pilnam khuikah hlang thawng thum tluk cungku.
Te daengah Moses loh, “Tihnin ah BOEIPA ham na kut han cung sak coeng. Hlang he a ca taengah khaw a manuca taengah khaw, tihnin ah nangmih te yoethennah m'paek pawn ni,” a ti nah.
A vuen ah tah Moses loh pilnam te, “Nangmih he tholh len neh na tholh uh coeng dae BOEIPA taengah ka cet pawn vetih nangmih kah tholhnah ham ka dawth thai khaming,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Moses te BOEIPA taengla mael tih, “Pilnam he aw, amamih ham sui pathen a saii uh dongah tholh len neh tholh coeng.
Tedae amih kah tholhnah phuei mai laeh. Te pawt atah kai he na daek tangtae na cabu lamloh n'khoe mai laeh,” a ti nah.
Tedae BOEIPA loh Moses taengah, “Kai taengah aka tholh te unim? Anih te ka cabu lamloh ka khoe bitni.
Te dongah cet lamtah nang taengah kan thui bangla pilnam te mawt laeh. Ka puencawn loh na hmai ah cet bitni ne. Ka cawh khohnin ah ngawn tah amamih kah tholhnah bangla amamih soah ka cawh van bitni,” a ti nah.
Aaron kah a saii bangla vaitoca te a saii uh dongah BOEIPA loh pilnam te a vuek.
BOEIPA loh Moses taengah, “He lamloh namah cet lamtah nong laeh. Egypt khohmuen lamkah na khuen pilnam te khohmuen la khuen laeh. Te te Abraham taengah, Isaak taeng neh Jakob taengah ka toemngam tih, “Na tiingan taengah ka paek ni,” ka ti nah.
Nang mikhmuh ah puencawn kan tueih vetih Kanaan neh Amori khaw, Khitti neh Perizzi, Khivee neh Jebusi khaw ka haek bitni.
Suktui neh khoitui aka long khohmuen lam khaw na khui ah ka pongpa mahpawh. Pilnam he na rhawn mangkhak aih tih longpueng ah nang kang khap lah ve,” a ti nah.
Pilnam loh ol thae he a yaak vaengah nguekcoi uh tih hlang loh a pum dongkah a cangen khaw oi uh pawh.
Te dongah BOEIPA loh Moses taengah, “Israel ca rhoek te thui pah. Nangmih he rhawn thah pilnam ni. Na khui ah mikhaptok ah vai ka pongpa vetih nang kan thup ve. Na cangen khaw na pum dong lamloh pit laeh. Na taengah mebang ka saii ham khaw ka ming ngawn,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Israel ca rhoek loh a cangen te Horeb tlang ah a dul uh.
Moses loh dap te a puen tih rhaehhmuen lamkah a lakhla la rhaehhmuen vongvoel ah amah la a tuk. Te te tingtunnah dap la a khue tih BOEIPA aka dawt boeih loh rhaehhmuen vongvoel kah tingtunnah dap te a paan.
Moses te dap la a caeh vaengah pilnam pum khaw thoo uh tih hlang he amah kah dap thohka ah pai uh. Te vaengah dap khuila a kun hil Moses hnuk te a paelki uh.
Dap khuila Moses a kun van neh cingmai tung ha suntla. Te vaengah dap thohka ah pai tih Moses te a voek.
Dap thohka kah aka pai cingmai tung te pilnam loh boeih a hmuh. Te dongah pilnam te boeih thoo tih hlang he amah kah dap thohka ah ni a bakop uh coeng.
Te vaengah hlang loh a hui a voek bangla BOEIPA loh Moses te a hmai, hmai ah a voek. Te phoeiah rhaehhmuen la mael. Tedae anih kah tueihyoeih Nun capa cadong Joshua tah dap khui lamloh nong pawh.
Te phoeiah Moses loh BOEIPA te, “Namah loh kai taengah pilnam he khuen laeh,” na ti ne. Tedae kai taengah nan tueih ham te khaw kai nan ming sak moenih. Te vaengah namah loh, 'Na ming neh kan ming tih ka mik dongkah mikdaithen khaw na hmuh,’ na ti.
Na mikhmuh ah mikdaithen ka hmuh van coeng atah na longpuei te kai m'ming sak laeh. Namah kan ming daengah man na mikhmuh ah mikdaithen khaw ka hmuh ve. Namtom he na pilnam la hmuh mai,” a ti nah.
Tedae, “Ka mikhmuh kah he a caeh uh daengah ni nang te kan duem sak eh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah amah te, “Na mikhmuh kah te a caeh pawt atah he lamloh kaimih nan khuen pawt mako.
Kai neh na pilnam loh na mikhmuh ah mikdaithen ka hmuh te me nen nim a ming eh. Kaimih taengkah na pongpa nen pawt nim kai neh na pilnam tah diklai hman kah pilnam cungkuem lamloh ka hoep uh tangloeng he,” a ti nah.
Te dongah BOEIPA loh Moses te, “Ka mikhmuh ah mikdaithen na hmuh tih na ming neh kam ming dongah ol he na thui bangla ka saii bitni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah, “Na thangpomnah te kai m'hmuh sak laem,” a ti nah.
Te dongah BOEIPA loh, “Ka thennah boeih he na mikhmuh ah ka phoe vetih na mikhmuh ah Yahweh ming he ka doek ni. Ka rhen tueng ni ka rhen vetih ka haidam tueng ni ka haidam eh?,” a ti nah.
Tedae, “Ka maelhmai hmuh ham na coeng moenih, hlang loh kai m'hmu mai cakhaw a hing hae moenih,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh, “Kamah taengkah hmuen ah he lungpang soah khaw pai mai.
Tedae ka thangpomnah loh a pah phai vaengah lungpang rhaep ah nang kang khueh ni. Te vaengah ka khum hil nang soah ka kut kang khuk bitni.
Ka kut ka khoe van neh ka nam na hmuh ni. Tedae ka maelhmai tah tueng mahpawh,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA loh Moses taengah, “Namah loh lamhma kah bangla lungto cabael panit saek lamtah te cabael dongah lamhma kah aka rhek cabael dongah aka om ol te ka daek eh.
Mincang ah sikim la om lamtah mincang neh Sinai tlang la ha luei. Te phoeiah tlang lu ah kamah taengla pahoi pai.
Tedae na taengah hlang ha luei boel saeh lamtah hlang pakhat pataeng tlang tom ah phoe boel saeh. Boiva neh saelhung khaw tlang dan ah he luem uh boel saeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah lungto cabael rhoi te lamhma kah bangla a saek. Mincang ah Moses te thoo tih BOEIPA loh amah a uen bangla Sinai tlang ah yoeng. Te vaengah lungto cabael rhoi te a kut dongah a pom.
Te phoeiah BOEIPA te cingmai neh ha rhum tih a taengah pahoi pai. Te vaengah BOEIPA ming neh a doek.
BOEIPA te a hmai ah a pah pah vaengah tah, “Yahweh, Yahweh, thinphoei neh lungvatnah Pathen, thintoek a ueh tih sitlohnah neh oltak dongah boeiping coeng.
Sitlohnah he thawngkhat ham khaw a kueinah dongathaesainah, boekoeknah neh dumlai khaw a phueih pah. Tedae pa rhoek kathaesainah a cawh pah te ca rhoek so neh ca kah ca rhoek soah khongthum khongli hil a hmil rhoe a hmil moenih,” tila tamhoe.
Te vaengah Moses tah diklai la koe buluk tih bakop.
Tedae Moses loh, “Ka Boeipa aw na mik dongah mikdaithen la ka tueng mai khaming. Ka Boeipa kaimih khui ah pongpa laeh. Pilnam he a rhawn mangkhak sitoe cakhaw kaimih kathaesainah neh kaimih kah tholhnah te khodawkngai lamtah kaimih he m'pang mai,” a ti nah.
Boeipa loh, “Kai loh na pilnam pum hmai ah paipi ka saii ne. Diklai pum neh namtom boeih taengah a suen pawh khobaerhambae te ka saii ni. Te vaengah a khui kah na pilnam boeih loh BOEIPA kah khoboe te hmuh saeh. Nang taengah ka saii te rhih pai saeh.
Tihnin ah nang kang uen te namah ham ngaithuen. Na mikhmuh lamloh, Amori neh Kanaan khaw, Khitti neh Perizzi khaw, Khivee neh Jebusi ka haek ne.
Namah khaw ngaithuen, khohmuen khosa rhoek neh paipi na saii ve ne. Namah khaw a khuila na kun vetih namah khui ah hlaeh la poeh ve.
A hmueihtuk te palet pah lamtah a kaam te phaek pah. Anih kah Asherah khaw vung pah.
A ming mah thatlai Yahweh coeng tih Pathen tah a thatlai thai dongah pathen tloe taengah bakop boeh.
A pathen taengkah a cukhalh neh a pathen te a nawn uh dongah a hmueih te caak ham nang n'khue akhaw khohmuen kah khosa taengah moi na bop ve.
A canu te na capa ham na lo cakhaw a canu khaw a pathen hnukah cukhalh uh. Te dongah na ca rhoek te amih kah pathen taengah cukhalh hae ni.
Mueihlawn pathen khaw namah ham saii boeh.
Nang kang uen bangla vaidamding khotue te hnin rhih yaeh lamtah vaidamding mah ca. Egypt lamloh Abib hla dongah na thoh dongah Abib hla ah tingtunnah om saeh.
Bung lamkah cacuek boeih, na boiva dongkah vaito neh tu cacuek a tal boeih he kamah kah ni.
Tedae laak cacuek tah tu neh lat. Na lat pawt bal atah pahoi at laeh. Na capa caming boeih tah lat lamtah ka mikhmuh ah kuttling la phoe boel saeh.
Hnin rhuk khuiah thotat lamtah hnin rhih dongah tah lophoh vaengah khaw duem lamtah cangah vaengah khaw nduem.
Cang dongkah cangah vaengkah thaihcuek khotue yalh neh kum thoknah cangyom khotue te namah ham saii.
Namah khuikah tongpaca boeih tah kum khat ah voei thum Israel Pathen, Boeipa Yahovah mikhmuh ah phoe saeh.
Namtom te na mikhmuh lamloh ka haek vetih na khorhi khaw kang aeh ni. BOEIPA na Pathen mikhmuh la kum khat ah voei thum phoe ham na caeh daengah ni na khohmuen te hlang loh ham veet pawt eh.
Kai kah hmueih thii te tolrhu neh ngawn boeh. Yoom khotue kah hmueih loh mincang duela rhaeh boel saeh.
Na khohmuen kah tanglue thaihcuek te BOEIPA na Pathen im la khuen. Maae ca te a manu suktui neh thong boeh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh Moses te, “He ol he namah ham daek laeh. Kamah ka dongkah ol nen he nang taeng neh Israel taengah paipi ka saii,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA neh a om vaengah khothaih hni sawmli, khoyin hnin sawmli buh khaw ca pawh, tui khaw o pawh. Te vaengah paipi ol te cabael rhoi dongah ol lung rha la a daek.
Moses te Sinai tlang lamloh a suntlak vaengah Moses kut dongah olphong cabael rhoi khaw om. Tlang lamloh a suntlak neh amah te a voek pueng dongah a maelhmai vin a phii te khaw Moses loh ming pawh.
Aaron neh Israel ca boeih loh Moses te a hmuh uh vaengah a maelhmai vin tarha a phii coeng dongah a taengla mop ham a rhih uh.
Tedae Moses loh amih te a khue dongah Aaron neh rhaengpuei kah khoboei boeih tah anih taengla mael uh tih Moses loh amih te a voek.
Te phoeiah Israel ca rhoek boeih te mop uh. Te vaengah Sinai tlang ah BOEIPA anih taengkah a thui boeih te amih a uen.
Moses loh amih taengah a thui te a khah van neh a maelhmai te a lumuekhni neh a dah.
Tedae BOEIPA amah te voek ham a mikhmuh la kun tih amah ha pawk daengah lumuekhni a lim pueng. Ha pawk phoeiah tah amah a uen te Israel ca rhoek ham a thui pah.
Israel ca rhoek loh Moses maelhmai te a hmuh vaengah Moses kah maelhmai vin a phii pah. Tedae Boeipa amah te voek ham a kun hil Moses loh lumuekhni neh a maelhmai te a dah.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Israel ca rhaengpuei te boeih a tingtun tih amih ham ol he a thui pah. Te te amih saii sak ham ni BOEIPA loh a uen.
“Hnin rhuk khuiah bitat saii saeh lamtah hnin rhih dongah tah nang ham Sabbath cim neh BOEIPA ham koiyaeh la om saeh. Te vaengah bitat aka saii boeih tah duek saeh.
Sabbath hnin ah tah na tolrhum tom ah hmai toih uh boeh,” a ti nah.
Moses loh Israel ca rhaengpuei boeih te, “He ol he thui hamla BOEIPA loh n'uen coeng.
Nangmih taeng lamloh BOEIPA ham khosaa khuen uh. A lungbuei aka hlangcong boeih loh BOEIPA kah khosaa te sui neh cak neh rhohum khaw,
a thim neh daidi neh hlampai a lingdik neh hnitang neh maae,
tutal pho a thimyum neh saham pho khaw, rhining thing khaw,
hmaivang ham situi neh koelhnah situi botui khaw, botui bo-ul ham khaw,
Hnisui neh rhangpho dongkah ham oitha lung neh saboi lung khaw khuen saeh.
Nangmih ah lungbuei aka cueih boeih khaw ha pawk uh saeh lamtah BOEIPA kah a uen boeih te,
A dap kah dungtlungim neh a imphu te khaw, a rhuithu neh a longlaeng khaw, a thohkalh, a tung neh a buenhol,
thingkawng neh a thingpang, thingkawng tlaeng neh himbaiyan dongkah hniyan,
caboei neh a longlaeng khaw, a hnopai boeih neh a mikhmuh kah buh khaw,
hmaivang ham hmaitung neh a hnopai, a hmaithoi neh hmaivang situi khaw,
bo-ul hmueihtuk neh a thingpang, koelhnah situi neh botui bo-ul, dungtlungim thohka kah thohka himbaiyan,
hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk neh rhohum pahak ham khaw, a thingpang neh a hnopai boeih, baeldung neh a kho khaw,
vongtung imbang khaw, a tung neh a buenhol khaw, vongtung vongka kah himbaiyai,
dungtlungim hlingcong neh vongtung hlingcong, a liva khaw,
hmuencim kah aka thotat ham hnithun himbai, khosoih Aaron ham hmuencim himbai neh aka khosoih ham koi anih koca rhoek kah himbai khaw saii uh saeh,’ a ti,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Israel ca rhaengpuei boeih te Moses mikhmuh lamloh khoe uh.
Te vaengah a lungbuei aka tueng hlang boeih neh a mueihla aka puhlu boeih loh tingtunnah dap kah bitat ham neh a thothuengnah cungkuem ham khaw hmuencim himbai ham khaw BOEIPA kah khosaa te a khuen uh.
Lungbuei ah aka hlangcong boeih tah a yuu a va la kun uh tih tlaeloh neh hnaii khaw, kutcaeng neh oilung khaw, sui hnopai boeih a khuen uh tih hlang boeih loh BOEIPA taengah sui thueng hmueih la a thueng uh.
Hlang boeih loh te te a hmuh vaengah a thim neh daidi khaw, hlampai a lingdik neh hnitang khaw, maea neh tutal pho a thimyum khaw saham pho khaw a khuen uh.
Khosaa aka ludoeng boeih loh cak neh rhohum te BOEIPA kah khosaa la a khuen uh. Te te aka hmu boeih loh rhining thing te thothuengnah bitat cungkuem ham a khuen uh.
Lungbuei aka cueih nu boeih loh a kut neh a hnuh uh tih hnitah te a thim neh daidi, hlampai a lingdik neh hnitang la a khuen uh.
Amih a lungbuei a cahoeh pah nu boeih loh cueihnah neh a hnuh maae mul khaw a khuenuh.
Khoboei rhoek loh oitha lungto neh hnisui rhangpho ham saboi lungto a khuen uh bal.
Botui neh hmaivang ham situi khaw, koelhnah situi ham neh botui bo-ul khaw,
Huta tongpa a lungbuei aka puhlu boeih, te rhoek te BOEIPA kah a uen bangla bitat cungkuem ham a khuen uh. Moses kut neh saii ham Israel ca rhoek loh BOEIPA taengah kothoh a khuen uh.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Israel ca rhoek te, “So lah BOEIPA loh Judah koca lamkah Hur capa Uri kah a ca, a ming ah Bezalel te a khue coeng.
Anih te Pathen kah mueihla neh, cueihnah neh, lungcuei neh, mingnah neh, bitat cungkuem neh cung.
Te phoeiah sui neh ngun dongah khaw, rhohum dongah khaw kopoek neh a moeh tih a saii.
Lungto kutthaibibi nen khaw a cung sak tih thing kutthaibibi dongah khaw kopoek kah bitat boeih neh a saii ham,
amah a lungbuei kah te thuinuet ham Dan koca lamkah Ahisamak capa Oholiab te a paek.
Amih te kutthai kah bitat cungkuem khaw moehnah neh saii ham lungbuei kah cueihnah a cung sak. Te dongah a thim neh, daidi neh hlampai a lingdik neh hnitang dongah a en. Te phoeiah hni aka tak long khaw kopoek kah bitat moehnah cungkuem neh a saii.
Te dongah Bezalel, Oholiab neh lungbuei aka cueih hlang boeih loh saii saeh. Amih taengah BOEIPA kah a uen boeih tah hmuencim kah thothuengnah bitat cungkuem te ming sak ham neh saii sak ham BOEIPA loh cueihnah neh lungcuei la a khueh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Bazelel, Oholiab neh lungbuei aka cueih hlang boeih te a khue. Te rhoek te BOEIPA loh a lungbuei ah cueihnah paek tih amih boeih tah bitat la caeh ham neh saii ham khaw a lungbuei a cahoeh.
Te phoeiah hmuencim thothuengnah bitat la saii ham Israel ca rhoek loh a khuen khosaa cungkuem te Moses mikhmuh lamloh a doe uh. Amih loh te te mincang, mincang ah moeihoeihnah a khuen uh pueng.
Te phoeiah hmuencim kah bitat boeih aka saii hlang cueih boeih neh hlang boeih khaw amah kah bitat a saii lamloh ha pawkuh.
Te phoeiah Moses te a voek uh tih, “Te bitat te saii ham BOEIPA loh a uen coeng dongah thothuengnah kah a ngoe lakah pilnam loh a khuen he yet,” a ti uh.
Te phoeiah Moses loh a uen bangla rhaehhmuen ah ol a thak uh tih, “Huta khaw tongpa khaw hmuencim kah khosaa ham bitat saii voel boel saeh,” a ti uh. Te dongah pilnam loh hno a khuen te paa uh.
Bitat ham a rhoeh la a om phoeiah bitat cungkuem dongah te te hnonah ham khaw coih coeng.
Bitat aka saii khuiah lungbuei aka cueih boeih loh dungtlungim te a saii uh. Himbaiyan yungrha te hnitang la a tah tih a thim, daidi neh hlampai a lingdik la a en. Cherubim dongkah bibi khaw moehnah neh a saii.
Himbaiyan pakhat kah a yun he dong kul dong rhet, a daang dong li lo tih himbaiyan boeih ham te himbaiyan pakhat neh cungnueh pakhat la cet.
Himbaiyan yung nga te pakhat neh pakhat a cong tih himbaiyan yung nga te khaw khat neh khat cong uh.
Himbaiyan pakhat kah a hmoi phai ah rhuikawl a thim te rhui at a bawt hil a buen pah. Te tlam te a tloe himbaiyan hmoi kah rhui at a bawt hil a saii.
Himbaiyan yung khat dongah rhuikawl sawmnga a saii tih himbaiyan a pabae khaw rhui at la a hmoi ah rhuikawl sawmnga a saii. Te dongah khat neh khat rhuikawl neh a doe sak.
Te phoeiah sui rhuithu sawmnga a saii tih rhuithu lamloh himbaiyan khat neh khat te a hlinghlui dongah dungtlungim khaw pakhat la om.
Dungtlungim kah dap ham himbaiyan te maae mul neh a saii tih himbaiyan yung hlai khat a saii.
Himbaiyan yungat te a yun dong sawmthum, a daang dong li lo tih himbaiyan hlai khat ham te himbaiyan pakhat cungnueh dongah pakhat la cet.
Himbaiyan yung nga te hloep a cong tih himbaiyan yung rhuk te pakhat la a cong.
Himbaiyan pakhat kah a hmoi ah a bawt due rhuikawl sawmnga te rhui at la a saii tih a pabae himbaiyan kah a hmoi ah rhuikawl sawmnga ham buenyang a saii.
Te dongah rhohum rhuithu sawmnga a saii dap te a hlinghlui tih pakhat la a om sak.
Dap imphu te tutal pho a thimyum neh a sokah imphu la saham pho neh a saii.
Te phoeiah dungtlungim ham a longlaeng te rhining thing aka pai te a saii.
A longlaeng pakhat te a yun dong rha neh a daang dong khat phoeiah dong kaek lo tih a longlaeng te rhip vaiuh.
A longlaeng pakhat dongah dangkam rhoi khaw khat neh khat kiba uh. Te tlam te dungtlungim kah a longlaeng te boeih a saii.
Dungtlungim kah a longlaeng te tuithim ah tuithim saa kah a longlaeng te yung kul a saii.
A longlaeng pakhat dangah dangkam rhoi ham buenhol panit neh a longlaeng yung kul ham cakben buenhol sawmli a saii. Te dongah a longlaeng pakhat dangah buenhol panit neh dangkam panit om.
Dungtlungim khat ben tlangpuei saa ah a longlaeng pakul a khueh.
A longlaeng pakhat dangah buenhol panit, a longlaeng pakhat dangkah buenhol panit neh cakben buenhol sawmli te a saii.
Dungtlungim kah imthael khotlak sa ham tah a longlaeng yung rhuk a saii.
Imthael ah dungtlungim kah a ngong ham khaw a longlaeng panit a khueh.
Te te a hmui lamloh tungbok la om vetih a soi ah tah kutcaeng pakhat khuiah pakhat la rhenten ben uh. Te rhoi dongkah bangla imki rhoi kah ham khaw a saii.
Te dongah a longlaeng parhet vaengah a longlaeng pakhat hmuikah buenhol panit, panit neh buenhol he cakben buenhol hlai rhuk om.
Dungtlungim impalai kah a longlaeng pakhat ham thohkalh panga te rhining thing a saii.
Dungtlungim khat ben impalai kah a longlaeng dongah khaw thohkalh panga tih dungtlungim khotlak imthael kah a longlaeng dongkah ham thohkalh panga om.
Tedae a bangli kah thohkalh a saii long tah a longlaeng te a hmoi lamloh a bawt hil a bangli ah yong phai.
A longlaeng te khaw sui a ben thil tih thohkalh rholhnah ham a kutcaeng te sui ni a saii. Thohkalh te khaw sui a ben thil.
Te phoeiah hniyan te a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik neh a saii. Bibi moehnah neh hnitang la a tah tih cherubim khaw a saii.
Te ham te rhining tung pali a saii tih sui a ben thil. A voei te sui tih te dongkah buenhol pali ham te cak a hlawn.
Dap thohka kah himbaiyan te a saii vaengah a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik neh hnitang la a tah tih kutnaep la a en.
A tung panga neh a voei rhoek te khaw a soi ah a ben pah tih a yaeltlang te sui, a buenhol panga te rhohum a saii.
Bezalel loh rhining thing te thingkawng a yun dong nit ngancawn, a daang dong khat neh tintan, a sang dong khat neh tintan la a saii.
Te phoeiah a khui a hman ah sui cilh a ben thil tih a kaep, a kong khaw, sui neh a saii.
A kho pali dongah sui kutcaeng pali a hlawn. A vae khat ben ah kutcaeng panit, a vae khat ben ah kutcaeng panit om.
Rhining thing thingpang la a suih tih sui a ben thil.
Thingpang te thingkawng aka kawt ham thingkawng vae kah kutcaeng dongah a rholh.
A tlaeng te sui cilh neh a yun dong nit tintan neh a daang dong at tintan la a saii.
Sui cakben cherubim panit te a saii tih te rhoi te a tlaeng kah a hmoi rhoi ah a ben.
Thingkawng tlaeng lamloh khat ben a hmoi ah cherubim pakhat neh khat ben a hmoi ah cherubim pakhat tih cherubim te a hmoi ah a hmuicue panit a saii.
Cherubim aka om rhoi loh a phae a phuel hang rhoi tih a phae neh thingkawng tlaeng te a khu rhoi. A maelhmai rhoi khaw pakhat loh a manuca taengla mael. Te dongah cherubim kah maelhmai te thingkawng tlaeng soah hum uh.
Te phoeiah rhining thing te caboei a yun dong nit neh a daang dong khat, a sang dong khat tintan la a saii.
Te te sui cilh a ben thil tih a kaep kah a khopnah khaw sui ni a saii.
Te ham te a kae a kaep ah kutsom pakhat a khueh tih a kae soah a khopnah te sui neh pin a saii.
Te ham te sui kutcaeng pali a hlawn tih kutcaeng te a kho pali kah a kil pali ah a buen.
A kae kah voeivang ah caboei aka kawt ham thingpang rholhnah kutcaeng om.
Caboei aka kawt ham thingpang te rhining thing a suih tih sui a ben thil.
Te phoeiah caboei dongkah hnopai la a bael neh a yakbu khaw, tuisi a doeng vaengah kah a tuisi-am neh tui-um khaw sui cilh lamloh a saii.
Hmaitung la sui cilh cakben neh a saii tih hmaitung kah a kho neh a bunang kong khaw a saii. Te lamloh a paimuem neh a rhaiphuelh om.
A vae khat ben lamloh hmaitung kah a kong pathum, a vae khat hmaitung kah a kong pathum neh a kaep lamloh a kong parhuk cawn.
A kong pakhat dongah rhaimuem rhaiphuelh neh noepai bunang pathum, a kong pakhat dongah khaw rhaimuem rhaiphuelh neh noepai bunang pathum a saii. Hmaitung lamkah aka cawn a kong parhuk dongah te tlam te a saii.
Hmaitung dongah noepai bunang pali khaw rhaimuem rhaiphuelh neh a khueh.
A kong panit hmuiah rhaimuem pakhat neh, a kong panit hmuiah rhaimuem pakhat tih a kong parhuk a cawn dongah a kong panit hmui ah rhaimuem pakhat om bal.
Te lamkah a rhaimuem neh a kong te sui cilh a boh neh pakhat la boeih om.
Hmaithoi parhih neh a paitaeh khaw a baelphaih khaw sui cilh ni a saii.
Te hmaithoi a hnopai boeih te sui cilh talent khat neh a saii.
Te phoeiah rhining thing te bo-ul hmueihtuk a yun dong khat, a daang dong khat neh hniboeng la om tih a sang dong nit a ki khaw om.
Te te sui cilh neh a imphu khaw, a pangbueng phai khaw, a ki khaw a ben thil tih a kaep kah a khopnah te sui a saii.
Te ham te a khopnah hmui ah sui kutcaeng panit a saii. Te te hmueihtuk aka kawt ham thingpang rholhnah la a vae rhoi ah a buen.
Rhining thing te thingpang la a suih tih sui a ben thil.
Hmuencim kah koelhnah situi neh aka thungnom kutci bangla botui bo-ul cil khaw a saii.
Rhining thing te hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk, a yun dong nga neh a daang dong nga ah hniboeng la om tih a sang te dong thum la a saii.
A kil pali ah a ki a saii pah tih a ki aka om rhoek te rhohum a ben thil.
Te phoeiah hmueihtuk dongkah hnopai cungkuem, am neh hmaisoh khaw, baelcak ciksum neh baelphaih khaw a saii. A hnopai boeih te rhohum ni a saii.
Hmueihtuk ham a loengboeng hmui lamloh a kong hmui hil rhohum vairhuek dongkah bibi bangla pahak a saii.
Thingpang rholhnah ham rhohum pahak kah a hmuicue pali ah kutcaeng pali a hlawn.
Rhining thing te thingpang la a suih tih rhohum a ben thil.
Te aka kawt ham te hmueihtuk vae kah kutcaeng khuiah thingpang a rholh tih hmueihtuk te thingphael aka khui rhoi neh a khop.
Aka thotat nu kah mangthuinah lamloh rhohum baeldung neh rhohum kho khaw a saii. Amih te tingtunnah dap thohka ah thotat uh.
Tuithim ben kah ah vongtung a saii tih, vongtung imbang te hnitang dong yakhat a tah thil.
A tung pakul neh a buenhol pakul te rhohum tih tung dongkah voei neh a yaeltlang tah cak a saii.
Tlangpuei saa kah dong yakhat ham khaw tung pakul neh a buenhol pakul te rhohum tih, tung dongkah voei neh a yaeltlang tah cak a saii.
Khotlak ben kah imbang khaw dong sawmnga lo. A tung parha neh a buenhol parha lo. Tung dongkah voei neh a yaeltlang te cak a ben.
Khothoeng ben ah khaw dong sawmnga lo.
A kaep kah imbang te dong hlai nga lo. A tung pathum neh a buenhol pathum om.
A Vongup vongka hlaep kah imbang pabae te he ben ah khaw ke ben ah khaw dong hlai nga lo. A tung pathum neh a buenhol khaw pathum om.
Vongup kaepvai kah imbang boeih te hnitang a tah thil.
Te vaengah tung dongkah buenhol tah rhohum tih tung dongkah voei neh a yaeltlang tah cak neh a saii. Te dongah vongup kah tung boeih te a soi kah cak ben phoeiah cak neh a cen uh.
Vongup vongka kah himbaiyan khaw kutci neh a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik la a en tih hnitang la a tah. Te vaengah vongup kah imbang voeivang kah bangla a yun dong kul neh a daang a sang tah dong nga lo.
A tung pali neh a buenhol pali tah rhohum a saii. A voei tah cak tih a soi neh a yaeltlang khaw cak ben la om.
Dungtlungim ham neh a kaepvai vongtung ham khaw rhohum hlingcong boeih a saii.
He dungtlungim la a hlum he khosoih Aaron koca Ithamar kut dongkah Levi thohtatnah, Moses ol bangla olphong kah dungtlungim la a soep.
Te vaengah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vabangla Judah koca lamkah Hur capa Uri kah a ca Bezalel loh a cungkuem te a saii.
Tedae a taengah moehnah neh a thim la, daidi la, hlampai a lingdik neh hnitang la aka en kutthai, Dan koca lamkah Ahisamak capa Oholiab khaw om.
Hmuencim bitat cungkuem dongah sui khaw bitat la boeih a saii. Te vaengah thueng hmueih dongkah sui mah hmuencim kah shekel ah talent pakul pako phoeiah shekel ya rhih sawmthum om coeng.
Rhaengpuei kah a soep cak he khaw talent yakhat neh hmuencim kah shekel ah shekel thawngkhat ya rhih sawmrhih panga lo.
Hlangmi pakhat dongah beka pakhat, hmuencim shekel ah shekel rhakthuem a paek. Soep hamla aka kat boeih te kum kul ca lamloh a so hang te thawng ya rhuk thawng thum neh ya nga sawmnga lo.
Te vaengah hmuencim buenhol neh hniyan buenhol la a hlawn ham cak te talent yakhat lo coeng. Buenhol pakhat dongah talent khat van tih talent yakhat lamloh buenhol yakhat rhoeh.
Te dongah thawngkhat ya rhih neh sawmrhih panga te tung dongkah voei la a saii. Te phoeiah a soi ah a ben tih a cen.
Te phoeiah thueng hmueih rhohum talent sawmrhih neh shekel thawng nit ya li lo.
Te nen te tingtunnah dap thohka kah buenhol neh rhohum dapim hmueihtuk khaw, rhohum pahak khaw hmueihtuk kah hnopai cungkuem khaw,
vongtung phai kah buenhol khaw, vongtung vongka kah buenhol khaw, dungtlungim kah hlingcong boeih neh, vongtung phai kah hlingcong boeih a saii.
Hmuencim ah aka thotat kah hnithun himbai khaw a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik neh a saii. Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla Aaron ham khaw hmuencim himbai a hui uh.
Te phoeiah sui hnisui te a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik la a en tih hnitang la a tah.
Sui phaldaep te a daep tih hamrhui khaw a thim la, daidi la, hlampai a lingdik la, bibi moehnah neh hnitang la saii ham a ah.
Holhnam te a hmuicue rhoi ah hlinghlui ham a saii uh tih a hmoi te a hlinghlui.
A pholip dongkah cihin khaw a bibi bangla a soah sui, a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik neh BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla hnitang la a tah.
Sui oibom dongkah a det oitha lungto te a saii tih kutbuen thingthuk te Israel ca rhoek kah ming la a thuk.
Te te BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla Israel ca rhoek ham poekkoepnah lungto la hnisui kah holhnam dongah a bang.
Rhangpho te khaw sui hnisui dongkah kutngo bangla bibi moehnah neh a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik a en tih hnitang la a tah.
Rhangpho a saii te hniboeng la om tih a yaep, a yun khap at neh a daang khap at la a yaep.
A soah lungto a than, than li a hulh tih a than cuek te lungling, vaya neh tamkuei,
A than bae dongah ah khocillung, minhum neh lungmik,
a than thum dongah tamsenlung, khopang lung neh kemden,
A than li dongah timsuih, oitha, maihae te a hulhnah neh sui oibom dongah a bom.
Lungto te khaw Israel ca hlai nit ming neh a khueh. Lungto ming tarhing ah koca hlai nit ham khaw a ming te kutbuen thingthuk la rhip a khueh pah.
Rhangpho dongkah cuehnah cangtui-rhaica khaw sui cilh rhuivaeh dongkah kutngo la a saii.
Sui oibom panit neh sui kutcaeng panit a saii tih kutcaeng rhoi te rhangpho kah a hmoi rhoi ah a bang.
Sui rhuivaeh rhoi te rhangpho hmoi kah kutcaeng rhoi dongah a khih uh.
Rhuivaeh rhoi kah a hmoi rhoi te oibom rhoi dongla a hlinghlui. Te rhoek te a hmai kah hnisui holhnam dongla a khih uh.
Te phoeiah sui kutcaeng panit te a saii uh tih hnisui a khui, a hmai a hmoi dongah rhangpho hmoi rhoi dongah a khih uh.
Sui kutcaeng rhoi a saii uh tih te rhoi te hnisui cihin sokah a rhui voeivang taeng, a hmai ah a dang kah hnisui holhnam rhoi dongla a hlin.
Rhangpho dongkah a kutcaeng rhoi neh te hnisui dongkah kutcaeng rhoi te hamrhui a thim neh a pin. BOEIPA loh Moses a uen bangla hnisui kah cihin soah a om daengah ni rhangpho hnisui dong lamloh a hawl pawt eh.
Te phoeiah hnikul te hnisui dongkah kutngo bangla a saii tih a thim la boeih a tah.
Hnikul kah a rhai te a laklung ah rhawnmoep kah a rhai bangla om tih a rhai ham a kongnah khaw pin a om dongah pawn mahpawh.
Hnikul dongkah hnihmoi ah tale thaih a saii tih a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik neh a tah.
Sui cilh te hling la a saii tih hling te hnikul hnihmoi kah tale laklo, tale laklo ah pin a bang.
BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla aka thotat ham kah hnikul hmoi ah te hling neh tale thaih, hling neh tale thaih tila pin a bang.
Te phoeiah Aaron ham neh anih koca rhoek ham hnitang kutngo a tah angkidung te a hui uh.
Hnitang lupong neh lukhuem khaw, hnitang samkhuem neh takhlawk hnii khaw hnitang la a tah.
Lamko te khaw hnitang la a tah tih BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla a kutngo te a thim, daidi, hlampai a lingdik neh a en.
Rhuisam tamlaep cim te khaw sui cilh neh a saii tih a soah kutbuen dongkah thingthuk cadaek te BOEIPA ham Cim tila a daek.
Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen bangla te te a so ah lupong dongah khih ham hamrhui a thim neh a hlinghlui.
Tingtunnah dap ah dungtlungim kah thothuengnah boeih a coeng tangloeng coeng. Israel ca rhoek loh a saii uh vaengah a cungkuem dongah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen te ni a saii uh van.
Te phoeiah dungtlungim te Moses taengah dap neh a hnopai boeih, a rhuithu neh a longlaeng a thohkalh khaw, a thohkalh neh a tung a buenhol khaw.
Imphu, tutal pho a thimyum neh imphu, saham pho te khaw himbaiyan hniyan khaw,
Olphong thingkawng neh a thingpang khaw a tlaeng khaw,
Caboei neh a hnopai boeih neh a hmai kah buh,
A hmaithoi cim kah hmaitung neh hmaithoi bong khaw, a hnopai cungkuem neh hmaivang situi khaw,
Sui hmueihtuk neh koelhnah situi khaw, botui bo-ul neh dap thohka kah himbaiyan khaw,
rhohum hmueihtuk neh rhohum pahak khaw, a thingpang neh a hnopai boeih, baeldung neh a kho khaw,
vongtung imbang kah a tung neh a buenhol khaw, vongup vongka dongkah himbaiyan khaw, a liva neh te a hlingcong khaw, dungtlungim kah thothuengnah hnopai cungkuem neh tingtunnah dap ham khaw,
Hmuencim ah aka thotat ham hnithun himbai te khaw, khosoih Aaron kah hmuencim himbai neh aka khosoih ham koi anih koca rhoek kah himbai te khaw a khuen uh.
BOEIPA loh Moses taengah boeih a uen vanbangla Israel ca rhoek loh thothuengnah cungkuem te a saii uh.
Moses loh bitat cungkuem te a hmuh vaengah BOEIPA kah a uen bangla buelh a saii uh. A saii tangloeng dongah amih te Moses loh a uem.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a voek tih,
Hla lamhmacuek kah hlasae lamhmacuek khohnin ah tingtunnah dap kah dungtlungim te thoh.
Te vaengah olphong thingkawng te pahoi khueh lamtah thingkawng soah hniyan neh khuk thil.
Caboei te khaw khuen lamtah a phu te tael pah. Hmaitung te khuen bal lamtah a hmaithoi te tok pah.
Olphong thingkawng hmai ah bo-ul ham sui hmueihtuk te hol lamtah dungtlungim ham thohka kah himbaiyan te yan pah.
Te phoeiah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk te tingtunnah dap kah dungtlungim thohka hmai ah hol.
Baeldung te tingtunnah dap laklo neh hmueihtuk laklo ah hol lamtah tui pahoi loei pah.
Vongtung te pin thoh lamtah vongtung vongka kah himbaiyan te yan pah vetih, akhui la kun nah thohka ah himbai te yanuh.
Koelhnah situi te lo lamtah dungtlungim neh a khuikah a cungkuem te koelh. Te neh a hnopai cungkuem te na ciim daengah ni a cim la a om eh.
Te phoeiah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk neh a hnopai boeih te koelh. Hmueihtuk te ciim lamtah hmueihtuk te a cim a cim koek la om saeh.
Baeldung neh a kho te khaw koelh lamtah ciim.
Te phoeiah Aaron neh anih koca rhoek te tingtunnah dap thohka la khuen lamtah amih te tui hluk.
Aaron te a cim himbai bai sak lamtah koelh. Anih te ciim lamtah kamah taengah khosoih saeh.
A ca rhoek te khaw khuen lamtah amih te angkidung puei sak.
A napa na koelh bangla amih te koelh lamtah kamah taengah khosoih saeh. Khosoihbi he a cadilcahma ham kumhal due amih koelhnah la om rhoe om saeh,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA loh anih saii sak ham a uen boeih te Moses loh a saii.
Te dongah a kum bae dongkah lamhma cuek hla a pha neh hlasae dongkah lamhma cuek hnin ah dungtlungim te a pai sak.
Moses loh dungtlungim te a thoh vaengah a buenhol a buen tih a longlaeng te a paek. A thohkalh te a rholh tih a tung te khaw a ling.
Dungtlungim sokah dap te a dih tih BOEIPA loh Moses a uen bangla dap imphu te a so, so lamloh a khueh.
Te phoeiah olphong te a khuen tih thingkawng khuiah a khueh. Thingpang te thingkawng dongah a rholh phoeiah tah a tlaeng te thingkawng soah a so lamloh a tloeng.
Te phoeiah thingkawng te dungtlungim khuila a khuen tih himbaiyan dongkah hniyan te a yan thil. Te vaengah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla olphong thingkawng te a khuk.
Caboei te tah tingtunnah dap khuikah dungtlungim kaep, tlangpuei hniyan kah kawtpoeng ah a khueh.
A soah BOEIPA hmai kah buh te, BOEIPA loh Moses a uen bangla buelh a tawn.
Hmaitung te tah tingtunnah dap khuikah caboei dan, dungtlungim kaep kah tuithim ah a khueh.
Hmaithoi te BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla BOEIPA mikhmuh ah a tok.
Sui hmueihtuk te tingtunnah dap khuikah hniyan hmai ah a khueh.
A soah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla botui bo-ul khaw a phum.
Te phoeiah dungtlungim thohka kah himbaiyan te a bang.
Hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk te tingtunnah dap kah dungtlungim thohka ah a khueh tih te soah te hmueihhlutnah neh khocang khaw BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla a nawn.
Baeldung te tingtunnah dap laklo neh hmueihtuk laklo ah a hol tih hluk ham tui khaw pahoi a khueh.
Te nen te Moses neh Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh a kut a kho a silh uh.
Tingtunnah dap khuila a kun ham vaengah khaw, hmueihtuk la a caeh uh vaengah khaw BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla a silh uh.
Dungtlungim ham neh hmueihtuk ham vongtung pin a tung tih vongup vongka kah himbaiyan a yan daengah Moses loh bitat a coeng.
Te vaengah tingtunnah dap te cingmai loh a thing tih BOEIPA thangpomnah loh dungtlungim ah bae.
A soah cingmai yaal tih BOEIPA kah thangpomnah loh dungtlungim ah a bae dongah Moses loh tingtunnah dap khuila kun ham coeng pah pawh.
A longpueng khing ah dungtlungim dong lamloh cingmai a caeh van vaengah ni Israel ca rhoek khaw a caeh uh.
Tedae cingmai a caeh pawt atah a caeh hnin duela cet uh van pawh.
A longpueng khing Israel imkhui pum kah mikhmuh ah tah khothaih ah dungtlungim sokah BOEIPA cingmai neh khoyin ah hmai a om pah.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a khue tih tingtunnah dap lamkah a voek vaengah,
“Israel ca rhoek te voek lamtah amih te thui pah., 'Nangmih khuikah hlang loh BOEIPA taengah nawnnah a khuen vaengah rhamsa, saelhung, boiva khui lamkah khaw namamih kah nawnnah la khuen.
Nawnnah ham hmueihhlutnah te saelhung mai koinih a tal aka cuem te tingtunnah dap thohka ah nawn saeh lamtah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah a kolonah ham nawn saeh.
Te vaengah hmueihhlutnah kah a lu soah a kut tloeng saeh lamtah anih ham a dawth te doe saeh.
BOEIPA mikhmuh ah saelhung ca te ngawn saeh lamtah khosoih Aaron ca rhoek loh a thii te khuen saeh. Te vaengah thii te tingtunnah dap thohka kah hmueihtuk so neh a kaepvai ah haeh uh saeh.
Hmueihhlutnah te hlaih saeh lamtah maehpoel la tloek saeh.
Aaron koca khosoih rhoek loh hmueihtuk ah hmai toih uh saeh lamtah hmai soah thing hueng uh saeh.
Maehpoel, a lu, neh a tha te hmueihtuk sokah thing toih hmai soah Aaron koca khosoih rhoek loh tloeng uh saeh.
A kotak neh a kho te tui neh sil saeh lamtah khosoih loh BOEIPA taengah hmuehmuei botui hmueihhlutnah hmaihlutnah la hmueihtuk ah boeih phum saeh.
Tedae anih kah nawnnah te boiva khui lamkah koinih hmueihhlutnah ham tah tu khaw, maae tal aka cuem te khuen saeh.
Tekah te BOEIPA mikhmuh kah hmueihtuk kaep kah tlangpuei ben ah ngawn saeh lamtah Aaron koca khosoih rhoek loh a thii te hmueihtuk so neh a kaepvai ah haeh uh saeh.
A pum te maehpoel la tloek saeh lamtah a lu neh a tha te khosoih loh hmueihtuk sokah thing toih hmai dongah tloeng saeh.
Tedae a kotak neh a kho rhoek te tui neh sil saeh. Te phoeiah khosoih loh khuen saeh lamtah BOEIPA taengah hmuehmuei botui hmueihhlutnah hmaihlutnah la hmueihtuk ah boeih phum saeh.
BOEIPA taengah anih kah nawnnah ham hmueihhlutnah te vaa khui lamkah koinih vahu mai khaw, vahui ca mai khaw amah kah nawnnah ham khuen saeh.
Te vaengah khosoih loh hmueihtuk la khuen saeh. A lu te a paimaelh pah phoeiah hmueihtuk ah phum saeh. A thii te hmueihtuk pangbueng dongah ci saeh.
Tedae a tukpoe neh a dii te poelh saeh lamtah hmueihtuk khothoeng kah maehhloi hmuen ah voei saeh.
Vaa te a phae let pah saeh lamtah boe boel saeh. Te phoeiah khosoih loh BOEIPA taengah hmuehmuei botui hmueihhlutnah hmaihlutnah la hmueihtuk sokah thing toih hmai dongah phum saeh.
Hlinglu loh BOEIPA taengla khocang a khuen vaengah vaidam te anih kah nawnnah la om saeh. Te vaengah vaidam te situi suep saeh lamtah hmueihtui te a soah phul saeh.
Te phoeiah Aaron koca khosoih rhoek taengla khuen saeh. Vaidam te kutvang ah mawk paco saeh lamtah situi hmueihtui boeih neh BOEIPA ham hmueihtuk kah hmaihlutnah soah khosoih loh kamhoeinah hmuehmuei botui la phum saeh.
Khocang khui lamkah a coih te tah Aaron ham neh anih koca rhoek ham om tih BOEIPA kah hmaihlutnah khuiah aka cim khuikah aka cim koek la om.
Hmaiulh dongkah cangrhoh khocang nawnnah na khuen atah vaidam, situi a piit vaidamding vaidam laep mai khaw, situi neh a koelh vaidamding te vaidam rhawmla om saeh.
Nang kah nawnnah khocang te thiphael dongkah koinih vaidam te situi neh thoek lamtah vaidamding la om saeh.
Buhkam te aek lamtah a khocang la a soah situi suep thil.
Tedae nang kah nawnnah khocang te thi-am dongkah koinih vaidam te situi neh saii saeh.
Te rhoek khui lamkah a saii khocang te BOEIPA taengla na khuen vaengah khosoih te a kamhoei phoeiah hmueihtuk la thoeih saeh.
Khocang khuikah kamhoeinah te khosoih loh ludoeng saeh lamtah hmueihtuk kah hmaihlutnah soah BOEIPA ham hmuehmuei botui la phum saeh.
Tedae khocang kah a coih te Aaron ham neh anih koca rhoek ham om saeh. BOEIPA hmaihlutnah khuiah aka cim khuikah aka cim koek ni.
BOEIPA taengah na khuen khocang boeih te tolrhu nuen boel saeh. Tolrhu mai khaw, khoitui mai khaw BOEIPA taengkah hmaihlutnah dongah phum thil boeh.
Thaihcuek nawnnah te BOEIPA taengla na khuen vaengah hmueihtuk soah hmuehmuei botui bangla nawn uh boel saeh.
Na khocang nawnnah boeih te lungkaeh neh thoek lamtah na Pathen kah lungkaeh moi toeng boeh. Na khocang khui lamkah na nawnnah boeih te lungkaeh nawn thil.
BOEIPA taengah thaihcuek khocang na khuen atah a vueilue te hmai neh rhoh lamtah cangthai yenkip te namah kah thaihcuek khocang la nawn.
Te te situi suep thil lamtah khocang te hmueihtui la tloeng thil.
Te phoeiah yenkip khui lamkah neh situi lamkah kamhoeinah, hmaihlutnah hmueihtui boeih te khosoih loh BOEIPA taengah phum saeh.
Anih kah nawnnah tah rhoepnah hmueih te a saelhung khui lamkah a tal mai khaw a la mai khaw a nawn atah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah a cuemthuek te nawn saeh.
Te vaengah a nawnnah saelhung kah a lu dongah a kut tloeng saeh lamtah tingtunnah dap thohka ah ngawn saeh. Te phoeiah thii te Aaron koca khuikah khosoih rhoek loh hmueihtuk kaepvai ah haeh uh saeh.
Rhoepnah hmueih khui lamkah a kotak aka dah maehtha neh a kotak dongkah maehtha boeih te BOEIPA taengah hmaihlutnah hamla khuen saeh.
A kuel rhoi neh a uen dongkah a tha khaw, a thin neh a kuel dongkah a thinhnun te khaw rhoe saeh.
Te phoeiah Aaron koca rhoek loh hmueihtuk dongah hmueihhlutnah thing hmai soah BOEIPA ham hmuehmuei botui hmaihlutnah la phum uh saeh.
Tedae a nawnnah boiva te BOEIPA taengah rhoepnah hmueih la a nawn atah a tal mai khaw, a la mai khaw a cuemthuek te nawn saeh.
Anih kah nawnnah te tuca neh a nawn atah BOEIPA kah mikhmuh ah nawn van saeh.
Te vaengah anih kah nawnnah tu kah a lu soah a kut tloeng saeh lamtah tingtunnah dap hmai ah ngawn saeh. Te phoeiah a thii te Aaron koca rhoek loh hmueihtuk kaepvai ah haeh uh saeh.
Te phoeiah a songrhuh voeivang kah a kawl tha a hmabuet neh, a kotak aka dah a tha khaw, a kotak dongkah a tha boeih khaw hluep saeh lamtah BOEIPA taengah rhoepnah hmaihlutnah hmueih la nawn saeh.
Te phoeiah a kuel rhoi neh a uen dongkah a tha khaw, a thin neh a kuel dongkah a thinhnun te khaw hluep saeh lamtah,
BOEIPA taengkah hmaihlutnah buh la hmueihtuk soah khosoih loh phum saeh.
Tedae anih kah nawnnah te maae mai khaw BOEIPA mikhmuh ah a nawn atah,
maae lu soah a kut tloeng saeh lamtah tingtunnah dap hmai ah ngawn saeh. Te phoeiah a thii te Aaron koca rhoek loh hmueihtuk kaepvai ah haeh uh saeh.
Te phoeiah hmaihlutnah nawnnah khui lamkah a kotak aka dah a tha neh a kotak dongkah a tha boeih te BOEIPA taengah nawn saeh.
Te phoeiah a kuel rhoi neh a uen dongkah a tha khaw, a thin neh a kuel dongkah a thinhnun khaw hluep saeh lamtah,
a tha boeih te khosoih loh hmueihtuk kah hmaihlutnah buh soah BOEIPA ham hmuehmuei botui la phum saeh.
Na tolrhum boeih kah na cadilcahma ham kumhal khosing la aka om, maehtha boeih neh thii boeih tah ca uh boeh.
Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh Moses a voek tih,
“Israel ca rhoek te voek lamtah thui pah. Hinglu pakhat loh tohtamaeh ah BOEIPA kah olpaek boeih soah tholh mai ni. A saii tueng pawt khaw a lamkah pakhat khaw a saii mai ni.
A koelh tangtae khosoih loh pilnam kah dumlai khuila lai a hmuh atah tekah tholhnah a laihmuh dongah boirhaem la saelhung khuikah vaitotal ca cuemthuek te BOEIPA taengah nawn saeh.
Te vaengah vaitotal te tingtunnah dap thohka kah BOEIPA mikhmuh la khuen saeh. Te phoeiah a kut te vaito kah a lu soah tloeng saeh lamtah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah vaito te ngawn saeh.
A koelh tangtae khosoih loh vaito thii te lo saeh lamtah tingtunnah dap khuila khuen saeh.
Te phoeiah khosoih loh a kutdawn te thii khuila nuem saeh lamtah thii te hmuencim hniyan hmai kah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah voei rhih haeh saeh.
Te phoeiah thii te tingtunnah dap khuikah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah botui bo-ul la hmueihtuk ki dongah khosoih loh pae saeh. Tedae vaito thii aka coih boeih te tah tingtunnah dap thohka kah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah hawk saeh.
Boirhaem vaito tha boeih neh a kotak soah khoep aka dah maehtha te khaw, a kotak dongkah a tha boeih te khaw hluep saeh.
A kuel rhoi neh a uen kaep dongkah a tha te khaw, a thin neh a kuel dongkah a thinhnun te khaw hluep saeh.
Rhoepnah hmueih vaito kah a tha vanbangla khosoih loh ludoeng saeh lamtah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk dongah phum saeh.
Tedae vaito pho neh a saa boeih khaw, a lu neh a kho rhoek khaw, a kotak neh a aek khaw,
vaito pum te rhaehhmuen vongvoel kah maehhloi a lunnah hmuen tlaai la khuen saeh lamtah hoeh saeh. Maehhloi lunnah kah thing hmai dongah hoeh saeh.
Te dongah Israel rhaengpuei pum loh palang uh tih hlangping mikhmuh lamkah olka a rhael vaengah BOEIPA olpaek boeih khuikah mai khaw saii pawt koi pakhat te a saii uh atah boe uh coeng.
Tholh uh tih a tholhnah te amah loh a ming coeng atah saelhung khuikah vaitotal ca te hlangping loh boirhaem la khuen uh saeh lamtah tingtunnah dap hmai ah tloeng uh saeh.
Te vaengah rhaengpuei khuikah patong rhoek loh BOEIPA mikhmuh kah vaito lu soah a kut tloeng uh saeh. Te phoeiah vaito te BOEIPA mikhmuh ah ngawn uh saeh.
Te phoeiah a koelh tangtae khosoih loh vaito thii te tingtunnah dap khuila khuen saeh.
Te phoeiah khosoih loh a kutdawn te thii khuila nuem saeh lamtah hniyan hmai kah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah voei rhih haeh saeh.
thii te khaw tingtunnah dap ah BOEIPA mikhmuh kah hmueihtuk ki dongah pae saeh. Tedae thii aka coih te tingtunnah dap thohka kah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah hawk saeh.
Te vaengah maehtha boeih te ludoeng saeh lamtah hmueihtuk dongah phum saeh.
A saii vaengah boirhaem vaito a saii vanbangla rhoepnah vaito te saii saeh. Te daengah ni khosoih loh amih ham a dawth pah vetih amih te khodawk a ngai eh.
Te phoeiah vaito te rhaehhmuen vongvoel la khuen saeh lamtah lamhma kah hlangping kah boirhaem vaito a hoeh bangla hoeh saeh.
Khoboei khaw tholh tih a BOEIPA Pathen kah olpaek khat khat khui lamkah saii pawt koi te tohtamaeh ah a saii vaengah boe coeng.
Tedae tholhnah dongah a tholh te amah loh a ming van neh nawnnah ham maae a tal ca a cuemthuek te khuen saeh.
Maae tal lu soah a kut tloeng saeh. BOEIPA mikhmuh ah hmueihhlutnah a ngawn nah hmuen ah boirhaem te ngawn saeh.
Te phoeiah boirhaem thii te khosoih loh a kutdawn neh lo saeh lamtah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk ki dongah pae saeh. Te phoeikah thii te hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah hawk saeh.
Tedae a tha boeih te rhoepnah hmueih tha bangla hmueihtuk ah phum saeh. Te daengah ni anih kah tholhnah kongah khosoih loh anih ham a dawth pah vetih khodawk a ngai eh.
BOEIPA olpaek dongkah saii pawt koi khat khat te tolrhum pilnam lamkah hinglu pakhat mai loh tohtamaeh ah a saii tholh tih boe coeng.
Tedae a tholhnah neh a tholh te amah loh aming atah a tholhnah neh a tholh kongah a nawnnah ham te maae a la ca a cuemthuek te khuen saeh.
Te vaengah boirhaem lu soah a kut tloeng saeh lamtah hmueihhlutnah hmuen ah boirhaem te ngawn saeh.
Te phoeiah thii te khosoih loh a kutdawn neh lo saeh lamtah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk ki dongah pae saeh. Tedae thii kah a coih boeih te hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah hawk saeh.
A tha boeih te rhoepnah hmueih tha a hluep vanbangla hluep saeh lamtah BOEIPA taengkah hmuehmuei botui la hmueihtuk dongah khosoih loh phum saeh. Te daengah ni anih ham te khosoih loh a dawth pah vetih anih te khodawk a ngai eh.
Tedae a nawnnah ham te tuca ni a khuen atah a la a cuemthuek te boirhaem la khuen saeh.
Te vaengah boirhaem lu soah a kut tloeng saeh lamtah hmueihhlutnah a ngawn nah hmuen ah boirhaem la ngawn saeh.
Te phoeiah boirhaem thii te khosoih loh a kutdawn neh lo saeh lamtah hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk ki dongah koelh saeh. Te phoeikah thii aka coih boeih te hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah hawk saeh.
Tedae a tha boeih te rhoepnah hmueih dongkah tuca tha a hluep vanbangla hluep saeh lamtah BOEIPA kah hmaihlutnah hmueihtuk dongah khosoih loh phum saeh. Te daengah ni anih kah tholhnah kongah khosoih loh a dawth pah vetih a tholh te khodawk a ngai eh?,” a ti nah.
Hinglu pakhat te tholh tih thaephoeinah ol a yaak. Te vaengah amah te laipai la a om dongah a hmuh tih a ming. Tedae a puen pawt atah anih kathaesainah te phuei saeh.
Hinglu pakhat loh rhalawt hno khaw, rhalawt mulhing rhok mai khaw cuem pawh rhamsa rhok mai khaw, rhalawt rhulcai rhok khat khat mai khaw buengrhuet a ben vaengah tah rhalawt la boe mai ni.
Hlang kah a tihnai dongkah khaw, a tihnai boeih dongah khaw a ben mai atah te nen te poeih uh coeng. Te te a phah akhaw a ming akhaw anih boe saeh.
Hinglu pakhat loh a cungkuem dongah thaehuet ham neh voelphoeng ham a hmuilai neh khungrhap la a toemngam mai ni. Hlang he olhlo neh a khungrhap coeng dongah te te a phah a khaw a ming akhaw te pakhat dongah anih boe saeh.
Tedae he rhoek khuikah khat nen khaw a boe mai akhaw te kah a tholh te loh phoe saeh.
Te vaengah a tholhnah neh a tholh bangla BOEIPA taengah a hmaithennah khuen saeh. Boirhaem la boiva khuikah tu a la mai khaw, maae la ca mai khaw om saeh. Te daengah ni a tholhnah dongah khosoih loh anih ham a dawth pa eh.
Tedae boiva kangna khaw a kut loh a na pawt atah a tholh bangla a hmaithennah te vahu phiknit mai khaw, vahui ca phiknit mai khaw, pakhat te boirhaem la, pakhat te hmueihhlutnah la BOEIPA taengah khuen saeh.
Te phoeiah khosoih taengla khuen saeh lamtah boirhaem ham te nawn lamhma saeh. A lu te a rhawn lamloh paimaelh pah saeh lamtah boe boel saeh.
Te phoeiah boirhaem thii te hmueihtuk pangbueng dongah haeh saeh lamtah thii aka coih te boirhaem hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah ci saeh.
Tedae a pabae te tah laitloeknah vanbangla hmueihhlutnah saii saeh. Te vaengah, a tholhnah neh a tholh dongah khosoih loh anih ham dawth pah saeh lamtah anih te khodawkngai saeh.
Tedae vahu phiknit mai khaw, vahui ca phiknit mai khaw a kut loh a na pawt oeh atah, a tholh bangla a boirhaem ham nawnnah te vaidam cangnoek parha khuen saeh. Te tah boirhaem la a om dongah a soah situi bueih boel saeh lamtah hmueihtui khaw tloeng thil boel saeh.
Te vaengah khosoih taengla khuen saeh lamtah kamhoeinah te khosoih loh a kut dongah a bae mawk la paco saeh. Te phoeiah boirhaem te BOEIPA hmueihtuk kah hmaihlutnah soah phum saeh.
Te daengah ni te khuikah pakhat nen khaw a tholh vanbangla a tholhnah dongah khosoih loh anih ham a dawth pah vetih anih te khodawk a ngai eh. Tedae khosaa bangla khosoih hamla om saeh.
BOEIPA loh Moses a voek tih,
“Hinglu pakhat loh tholh tih BOEIPA taengah boekoeknah la boe a koek mai ni. Te vaengah hnokhueh neh kut khoom kawng dongah a imben taengah a basa atah, huencannah neh a imben te a hnaemtaek atah,
Hmuencim dongah lai a hmuh te a sah phoeiah panga neh thap saeh lamtah khosoih taengla thak saeh. Te daengah ni khosoih loh anih kah hmaithennah ham te tutal neh a dawth pah vetih anih te khodawk a ngai eh.
Hinglu pakhat loh BOEIPA olpaek khat khat khuikah saii pawt koi te pakhat khaw a saii tholh coeng dae a boe te khaw a ming pawt atah amah kathaesainah te phuei van saeh.
Te vaengah a phu aka ting boiva khuikah tutal a cuemthuek te khosoih taengah hmaithennah la khuen saeh. Te daengah ni anih loh ming pawt tih tohtamaeh la a taengphael te khosoih loh anih ham a dawth pah vetih anih te khodawk a ngai eh.
He tah a boe, a boe vaengah BOEIPA taengkah a saii hmaithennah ni,” a ti nah.







Te phoeiah Moses te BOEIPA loh a voek tih,
“Hinglu pakhat loh tholh tih BOEIPA taengah boekoeknah la boe a koek mai ni. Te vaengah, hnokhueh neh hnohol kawng dongah a imben taengah a basa atah, huencannah neh amah imben a hnaemtaek atah,
hnohma khaw a hmuh lalah basa tih hlang taengkah a saii boeih khuikah pakhat mai neh a honghi la a toemngam dongah tholh mai thai
anih laihmu la om vetih a boe coeng dongah a huenkoe a rhawth te khaw, hnaemtaeknah neh a hnaemtaek hno te khaw, anih taengah a hlah hnokhueh te khaw, hnohma a hmuh te khaw, mael saeh.
A honghi neh a toemngam tih a dang boeih te khaw dumlai sahnah khohnin vaengah tah a kungmah te a muel la koep sah saeh. Te te a kungmah ham panga neh thap saeh lamtah pae saeh.
Te vaengah hmaithennah ham tutal a hmabut te BOEIPA taengah khuen saeh lamtah tekah tutal neh a phu aka tluk boiva te khosoih taengla hmaithennah ham thak saeh.
Te daengah ni BOEIPA mikhmuh ah khosoih loh anih ham a dawth pah vetih anih khaw dumlai a saii boeih dong lamloh khodawk a ngai eh?,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a voek tih,
Aaron neh anih koca rhoek te uen lamtah hmueihhlutnah olkhueng he thui pah. Hmueihtuk sokah hmaikol hmuen ah hmueihhlutnah loh khoyin puet neh mincang due om saeh lamtah a soah hmueihtuk hmai loh rhong saeh.
Te vaengah khosoih loh amah kah takhlawk himbai te bai saeh lamtah takhlawk hnii te a pum dongah na saeh. Te phoeiah hmueihtuk sokah hmueihhlutnah hmai ah aka tlum maehhloi te kol saeh lamtah hmueihtuk taengah khueh saeh.
Te phoeiah a himbai te pit saeh lamtah himbai a tloe bai saeh. Maehhloi te rhaehhmuen vongvoel kah hmuen saelh la thak saeh.
Hmueihtuk dongkah hmai te khaw phat rhong saeh lamtah thi boel saeh. Te dongah mincang mincang vaengah khosoih loh thing toih thil saeh. Te phoeiah hmueihhlutnah te tloeng thil saeh lamtah rhoepnah maehtha soah phum saeh.
Hmai te hmueihtuk soah phat rhong saeh lamtah thi boel saeh.”
Tahae kah he tah Aaron koca rhoek loh BOEIPA mikhmuh kah hmueihtuk hmai la khocang a khuen vaengkah olkhueng ni.
Khocang vaidam te a kutvang neh lo saeh lamtah situi neh hmueihtui boeih te khocang soah khueh saeh. Te phoeiah BOEIPA taengah kamhoeinah hmuehmuei botui la hmueihtuk ah phum saeh.
Tedae a coih te tah Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh ca uh saeh lamtah a caak vaengah tingtunnah dap vongup kah hmuen cim ah vaidamding neh ca uh saeh.
Ka hmaihlutnah lamloh amih kah hamsum ka paek te tolrhu neh thong boel saeh. Te tah boirhaem bangla, hmaithennah bangla a cim khuikah a cim koek ni.
BOEIPA kah hmaihlutnah lamloh na cadilcahma rhoek ham kumhal buhvae coeng ni. Aaron koca khui lamkah tongpa boeih long tah ca saeh lamtah te te aka ben boeih long tah amah te ciim uh saeh,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a voek tih,
Tahae kah nawnnah dongah Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh khocang vaidam, cangnoek parha te a koelh khohnin vaengah BOEIPA taengla khuen uh saeh lamtah mincang ah a ngancawn, hlaem vaengah a ngancawn nawn saeh.
Tekah khocang te thiphael dongah situi neh saiisaeh. A kae phoeiah a nuei kamat te khuen lamtah BOEIPA taengah hmuehmuei botui la nawn saeh.
Te vaengah a koelh tangtae khosoih neh amah koca rhoek khuikah a hnukthoi loh saii saeh. BOEIPA ham kumhal kah buhvae la boeih phum saeh.
Tedae khocang boeih he rhuemtuet la om saeh lamtah khosoih loh ca boel saeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah hmaithennah olkhueng he a cim khuikah a cim koek la om.
Hmueihhlutnah a ngawn uh hmuen ah hmaithennah te ngawn uh saeh lamtah a thii te hmueihtuk kaepvai ah haeh saeh.
Te vaengah a kawl dongkah a tha boeih neh a kotak aka dah maehtha te nawn saeh.
A kuel rhoi neh a uen kaep dongkah maehtha khaw, a thin dongkah a thinhnun te khaw a kuel neh rhen hluep saeh.
Te phoeiah hmaithennah te BOEIPA taengkah hmueihtuk sokah hmaihlutnah dongah khosoih loh phum saeh.
Hmueihlutnah maeh te khosoih tongpa boeih loh hmuen cim ah ca uh saeh lamtah a cim khuikah a cim koek la ca saeh.
Boirhaem khaw hmaithennah khaw a olkhueng pakhat la a om dongah dawth ham koi te khosoih hut la om.
Te dongah khosoih loh hlang khat khat kah hmueihhlutnah te a nawn pah vaengah a nawn hmueihhlutnah kah a pho khaw khosoih amah hut la om saeh.
Tapkhuel dongkah a thong khocang boeih, thi-am dongkah neh thiphael dongkah a saii boeih khaw khocang aka nawn khosoih amah hut la om saeh.
Situi neh a thoek khaw, a kaksap akhaw khocang boeih tah Aaron koca rhoek boeih neh amih boeinaphung ham rhip om saeh.
Tedae tahae kah he tah BOEIPA taengah rhoepnah hmueih a nawn vaengkah olkhueng ni.
Uemonah ham a nawn atah uemonah hmueih la situi neh a thoek vaidamding vaidam laep khaw, situi neh a koelh vaidamding kah vaidam rhawm khaw, situi neh a thoek tih a kae vaidam laep khaw nawn saeh.
Te vaengkah tolrhu buhham vaidam laep te uemonah, rhoepnah hmueih neh nawnnah la nawn saeh.
Te vaengkah BOEIPA taengla a nawn, nawnnah boeih khui lamkah pakhat te tah rhoepnah thii aka haeh khosoih kah khocang la om saeh.
Rhoepnah dongkah uemonah hmueih saa te tah amah nawnnah hnin ah ca saeh lamtah mincang duela paih boel saeh.
Tedae olcaeng neh kothoh nawnnah hmueih tah a nawn khohnin vaengah hmueih te ca saeh lamtah a caknoi te a vuen ah ca saeh.
Hmueih saa khui lamkah a coih te a thum hnin ah hmai neh hoeh saeh.
Amah kah rhoepnah hmueih saa te a thum hnin dongah a caak la a caak atah anih kah a nawn te doe pah mahpawh. Anih te a nawt a na pawt atah dikyik dikyak la om ni. Te te aka ca hinglu tah amah kathaesainah te amah loh phuei saeh.
Rhalawt hno boeih dongah a ben maeh te ca boel saeh lamtah hmai neh hoeh saeh. Tedae aka caih maeh saa boeih tah ca saeh.
Hinglu pakhat loh BOEIPA taengkah rhoepnah hmueih saa a caak vaengah amah te amah dongah a ti a hnai a om atah tekah hinglu te a pilnam khui lamloh hnawt saeh.
Hinglu te rhalawt cungkuem dongah, hlang kah a tihnai dongah khaw, rhalawt rhamsa dongah khaw, konawhnah boeih dongah a rhalawt te a ben atah. BOEIPA taengkah rhoepnah hmueih saa te a caak atah tekah hinglu te pilnam lamloh hnawt saeh.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a voek tih,
“Israel ca rhoek te voek lamtah thui pah. Vaito, tu, maae kah a tha boeih ca uh boeh.
Te dongah maehrhok tha neh saha tha tah bibi khat khat dongah hnonah mai cakhaw ca rhoe ca uh boeh.
Khat khat long ni BOEIPA taengkah hmaihlutnah ham a nawn rhamsa tha te a caak atah, aka ca hinglu te pilnam lamloh hnawt saeh.
Na tolrhum boeih ah vaa lamkah khaw, rhamsa lamkah khaw thii boeih te ca uh boeh.
Hinglu khat khat loh thii khat khat ni a caak atah tekah hinglu te pilnam lamloh hnawt saeh,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a voek tih,
“Israel ca rhoek te voek lamtah thui pah. BOEIPA taengah rhoepnah hmueih aka khuen long tah rhoepnah hmueih khui lamkah a nawnnah te BOEIPA taengla pawk puei saeh.
BOEIPA taengkah hmaihlutnah ham te a kut loh a khuen vaengah a tha neh a rhang te khuen saeh. A rhang te BOEIPA mikhmuh ah thueng hmueih la thueng saeh.
Maehtha te khosoih loh hmueihtuk soah phum saeh. Tedae a rhang te Aaron ham neh anih koca rhoek hamla om saeh.
Te dongah nangmih kah rhoepnah hmueih khui lamkah bantang benkah a laeng te tah khosoih taengah khosaa la pae uh.
Aaron koca rhoek khui lamkah rhoepnah thii neh maehtha aka nawn ham maehvae la bantang laeng te om saeh.
Rhoepnah hmueih khuiah thueng hmueih kah a rhang neh a laeng he Israel ca rhoek taeng lamkah khosa la ka loh tih Israel ca rhoek taengkah kumhal maehvae la khosoih Aaron neh anih koca rhoek taengah ka paek coeng.
He tah BOEIPA taengah khosoih la a nuen hnin vaengah BOEIPA hmaihlutnah khui lamkah Aaron kah maeham neh anih koca rhoek kah maeham ni,” a ti nah.
Anih a koelh hnin van vaengah Israel ca rhoek loh khosoih rhoek taengah paek ham koi te tah cadilcahma due kumhal khosing la khueh ham BOEIPA loh a uen coeng.
Hekah olkhueng dongkah hmueihhlutnah ham, khosaa ham khaw, boirhaem ham khaw, hmaithennah ham khaw, saboi ham khaw, rhoepnah hmueih ham khaw,
BOEIPA loh Sinai tlang ah Moses a uen vanbangla amah a uen khohnin vaengah Israel ca rhoek amamih kah nawnnah te Sinai khosoek kah BOEIPA taengah a nawn uh.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a voek tih,
“Aaron neh anih koca rhoek te amah neh himbai khaw, a koelhnah situi, boirhaem ham vaito neh tutal pumnit, vaidamding voh at te hang khuen.
Te phoeiah rhaengpuei boeih loh tingtunnah dap thohka ah tingtun uh saeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah BOEIPA kah a uen vanbangla Moses loh a saii tih rhaengpuei loh tingtunnah dap thohka ah tingtun uh.
Te phoeiah Moses loh rhaengpuei taengah saii ham koi BOEIPA loh a uen te a thui pah.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Aaron neh anih koca rhoek te a pai sak tih tui neh a silh.
Aaron te angkidung a paek tih lamko a vah sak. Hnikul te a bai sak tih hnisui te a sui pah. Cihin neh a yen phoeiah hnisui khaw a hlin pah.
Rhangpho te a buen pah vaengah Urim neh Thummim te rhangpho khuiah a det pah.
A lu ah lupong a muei sak bal tih BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla sui tamlaep neh rhuisam cim te a hmai kah lupong soah a khuem sak.
Te phoeiah Moses loh a koelhnah situi te a loh tih dungtlungim neh a khuikah aka om boeih te a koelh tih a ciim.
Te phoeiah situi te hmueihtuk soah voei rhih a haeh tih hmueihtuk neh a tubael boeih, baeldung neh hmueihtuk kho te khaw a koelh tih a ciim.
Te phoeiah a koelhnah situi te Aaron lu soah a suep tih anih te ciim ham a koelh.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Aaron koca rhoek te a pai sak tih amih te angkidung a bai sak. BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla amih te lamko a vah sak tih amih te samkhuem a khuem sak.
Boirhaem vaito te a khuen vaengah boirhaem vaito lu soah Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh a kut a tloeng uh.
Vaito te a ngawn phoeiah a thii te Moses loh a khuen tih hmueihtuk ki neh a kaepvai ah a kutdawn neh a koelh. Te phoeiah hmueihtuk te a caih sak tih thii te hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah a hawk. Te daengah te anih dongah a dawth ham koi te a ciim pah.
A kotak dongkah maehtha boeih neh a thin dongkah a thinhnun khaw, a kuel rhoi neh a kuel dongkah a tha khaw a loh bal tih Moses loh hmueihtuk soah a phum.
Tedae vaito pho neh a saa khaw, a aek khaw Moses taengkah BOEIPA kah a uen vanbangla rhaehhmuen vongvoel kah hmai dongah a hoeh.
Hmueihhlutnah tutal te khaw a khuen tih tutal a lu soah Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh a kut a tloeng thiluh.
Te phoeiah a ngawn tih a thii te hmueihtuk so neh a kaepvai ah Moses loh a haeh.
Tu te khaw maehpoel la a sah tih a lu neh maehpoel khaw, a tha khaw Moses loh a phum.
Tedae a kotak neh a kho te tui neh a silh. Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla tutal pum boeih te BOEIPA ham hmuehmuei botui hmaihlutnah la hmueihhlutnah hmueihtuk soah Moses loh a phum.
A pabae kah tutal te saboi la a nawn. Te phoeiah tutal kah a lu soah Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh a kut a tloeng uh.
Tu te a ngawn phoeiah a thii te Moses loh a loh tih Aaron bantang a hnapae neh bantang kut kah kutpuei dongah khaw, bantang kho kah khopuei dongah khaw a koelh pah.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Aaron koca rhoek te a pai sak tih amih kah bantang hna kah hnapae neh bantang kut kah kutpuei dongah khaw, bantang kho kah khopuei dongah khaw thii te a koelh pah. Te phoeiah thii te hmueihtuk kaepvai ah Moses loh a haeh.
Te phoeiah maehtha neh a kawl khaw, a kotak dongkah a tha boeih neh a thin, a kuel rhoi dongkah a thinhnun neh a tha khaw, bantang ben kah a laeng khaw a loh tih,
BOEIPA mikhmuh kah vaidamding kodawn dongkah vaidamding vaidam laep pakhat, situi buh vaidam laep pakhat neh vaidam rhawm pakhat te a loh tih maehtha neh bantang laeng soah a khueh.
Te phoeiah Aaron kut neh anih koca rhoek kah kut ah boeih a tloeng tih BOEIPA mikhmuh ah thueng hmueih te a thueng.
Te phoeiah amih kut dong lamkah saboi te Moses loh a loh tih BOEIPA taengah hmuehmuei botui hmaihlutnah la hmueihtuk sokah hmueihhlutnah dongah saboi te a phum.
Te phoeiah a rhang te Moses loh a loh tih BOEIPA mikhmuh ah thueng hmueih la a thueng. Saboi tutal te tah BOEIPA loh Moses a uen vanbangla Moses amah kah maehvae la a khueh.
Te phoeiah Moses loh a koelhnah situi neh hmueihtuk sokah thii te a loh tih Aaron neh anih kah himbai dongah khaw, anih koca rhoek neh anih koca rhoek kah himbai dongah khaw a haeh thil tih Aaron neh a himbai khaw, anih koca rhoek neh, anih koca rhoek kah himbai khaw a ciim pah.
Te phoeiah Aaron neh anih koca rhoek taengah Moses loh, “Maeh te tingtunnah dap thohka ah thong uh lamtah saboi kodawn dongkah buh te, Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh ca uh saeh,’ ka ti tih ka uen vanbangla pahoi ca uh.
Tedae maeh neh buhham aka coih te hmai neh hoeh uh.
Te phoeiah nangmih kah koiyaeh hnin tah na kut dongah hnin rhih cum saeh. Khohnin hnin rhih a cup hil tingtunnah dap thohka lamloh moe uh boeh.
Tihnin ah a saii vanbangla nangmih kah te saii ham neh dawth ham khaw BOEIPA loh ng'uen coeng.
Te vaengah khoyin khothaih hnin rhih tah tingtunnah dap thohka ah om uh. BOEIPA kah a kuek te kang uen bangla na tuem uh daengah ni na duek uh pawt eh?,” a ti nah.
Te dongah BOEIPA loh Moses kut ah a uen hno boeih te Aaron neh anih koca rhoek loh a saii.
Hnin rhet a lo vaengah Moses loh Aaron, anih koca rhoek neh Israel kah a hamca rhoek te a khue.
Te vaengah Aaron taengah, “Namah ham boirhaem la saelhung khuikah vaito ca neh hmueihhlutnah ham tutal a cuemthuek te lo lamtah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah nawn laeh.
Te phoeiah Israel ca rhoek te voek lamtah, 'Boirhaem la maae ca, hmueihhlutnah ham vaitoca neh tuca kum khat ca a cuemthuek te lo uh,’ ti nah.
BOEIPA tah tihnin ah nangmih taengla a phoe ham coeng dongah vaito khaw, tu khaw, situi neh a thoek khocang khaw, BOEIPA mikhmuh ah rhoepnah hmueih la nawn uh laeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Moses kah a uen te tingtunnah dap hmai la a khuen uh. Te phoeiah rhaengpuei boeih loh mop uh tih BOEIPA mikhmuh ah pai uh.
Te vaengah Moses loh, “BOEIPA loh ol ng'uen he na vai uh daengah ni nangmih taengah BOEIPA kah thangpomnah a tueng eh?,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Aaron taengah, “Hmueihtuk la halo phai. Namah kah boirhaem neh hmueihhlutnah te saii lamtah namah ham neh pilnam ham dawth pah laeh. Te phoeiah pilnam kah nawnnah te saii pah lamtah BOEIPA a uen vanbangla amih ham khaw dawth pah,” a ti nah.
Te dongah hmueihtuk te Aaron loh a paan tih amah ham boirhaem la vaitoca te a ngawn.
Te phoeiah thii te Aaron koca rhoek loh Aaron taengla a khuen pauh. Te dongah a kutdawn te thii khuila a nuem tih hmueihtuk ki dongah a koelh phoeiah thii te hmueihtuk kah khoengim taengah a bueih.
Te phoeiah BOEIPA loh Moses taengkah a uen vanbangla boirhaem kah a tha, a kuel neh a thin dongkah a thinhnun te hmueihtuk dongah a phum.
Te phoeiah a saa neh a pho te rhaehhmuen vongvoel ah hmai neh a hoeh.
Hmueihhlutnah te a ngawn phoeiah thii te Aaron koca rhoek loh a pom uh tih hmueihtuk kaepvai ah a haeh.
Te phoeiah hmueihhlutnah te a taengah maehpoel la a pom pa uh tih a lu neh hmueihtuk dongah a phum.
Te phoeiah a kotak neh a kho rhoek te a silh tih hmueihtuk dongkah hmueihhlutnah soah a phum.
Te phoeiah pilnam kah nawnnah te a nawn. Te vaengah pilnam kah boirhaem maae te a loh tih a ngawn phoeiah lamhma kah bangla a hlup pah.
Te phoeiah hmueihhlutnah te a khuen tih laitloeknah vanbangla a saii.
Te phoeiah khocang te a khuen tih a kut dongkah a bae neh hmueihtuk sokah mincang hmueihhlutnah dongah a phum thil.
Te phoeiah pilnam kah rhoepnah hmueih la vaitotal neh tutal te a ngawn. thii te Aaron koca rhoek loh a thueng uh tih hmueihtuk kaepvai ah a haeh.
Tedae vaito neh tu kah a tha khaw, a kawl neh a dakda, a kuel neh a thin dongkah a thinhnun khaw,
a rhang dongkah a tha khaw a tloeng uh tih a tha te hmueihtuk dongah a phum.
Tedae a rhang rhoek neh bantang laeng te tah Moses loh a uen vanbangla BOEIPA mikhmuh kah Aaron loh thueng hmueih la a thueng.
Te phoeiah Aaron loh a kut te pilnam taengla a phuel tih yoethen a paek. Te daengah boirhaem, hmueihhlutnah neh rhoepnah a saii lamloh suntla thuk.
Te phoeiah Moses neh Aaron loh tingtunnah dap khuikla kun rhoi. Te dongah ha moe rhoi tih pilnam te yoethen a paek rhoi vaengah BOEIPA kah thangpomnah loh pilnam cungkuem taengah a tueng pah.
Te vaengah BOEIPA maelhmai lamloh hmai ha thoeng tih hmueihtuk dongkah hmueihhlutnah neh maehtha te a hlawp. Pilnam boeih loh a hmuh vaengah tamhoe uh tih a hmai a buluk uh.
Aaron ca rhoi Nadab neh Abihu loh amah amah baelphaih te a loh rhoi tih hmai soah a tloeng rhoi. Te phoeiah bo-ul te a khueh thil rhoi tih hmai hloeh neh BOEIPA mikhmuh ah a khueh rhoi. Te te amih rhoi taengah a uen dae moenih.
Te vaengah BOEIPA hmai lamkah hmai ha thoeng tih amih rhoi te a hlawp dongah BOEIPA mikhmuh ah duek rhoi.
Te dongah Moses loh Aaron taengah, “BOEIPA loh, 'Kai neh aka yoei taengah ka ciim uh vetih pilnam boeih kah mikhmuh ah ka thangpom uh ni,’ a ti te a thui coeng he,” a ti nah. Te vaengah Aaron khaw kuemsuem sut.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Aaron kah a napa noe Uzziel ca rhoi Mishael neh Elizaphan te a khue tih, “Halo rhoi lah. Na manuca rhoi he hmuencim hmai lamloh rhaehhmuen vongvoel la kawt uh ,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Moses kah olpaek vanbangla halo uh tih amih rhoi te a angkidung dongah rhaehhmuen vongvoel la a koh uh.
Te phoeiah Moses loh Aaron, a ca rhoi Eleazar neh Ithamar taengah, “Na lu te lim uh boeh, na himbai khaw phen uh boeh. Te daengah ni a thintoek ah rhaengpuei pum loh na duek uh pawt eh. Tedae Israel imkhui boeih ah BOEIPA loh hmai neh a hoeh na manuca rhoek te tah rhah uh mai saeh.
Te dongah tingtunnah dap thohka lamkah moe uh boeh. Na soah BOEIPA kah koelhnah situi dongah na duek uh ve,” a ti nah. Te dongah Moses kah olthui bangla a saii uh.
BOEIPA loh Aaron te a voek tih,
“Namah neh namah taengkah na ca rhoek loh tingtunnah dap khuila na kun uh vaengah misurtui khaw, yu khaw o boeh. Te daengah ni na cadilcahma ham khaw kumhal khosing vanbangla na duek uh pawt eh.
Cimcaihnah laklo neh rhongingnah laklo ah, rhalawt laklo neh aka cil laklo ah paekboe ham om,” a ti nah.
Israel ca rhoek thuinuet ham oltlueh cungkuem te khaw BOEIPA loh amih ham Moses kut ah a thui pah.
Te dongah Moses loh Aaron, Eleazar neh Ithamar koca aka sueng rhoek te, “BOEIPA hmaihlutnah dong lamkah khocang aka coih te lo uh. Tedae te tah a cim kah a cim dongah hmueihtuk taengah vaidamding la ca uh.
Kai ng'uen van coeng dongah BOEIPA hmaihlutnah khui lamkah khocang te namah kah buhvae neh namah koca rhoek kah buhvae la hmuen cim ah ca uh.
Tedae Israel ca rhoek kah rhoepnah hmueih khuiah thueng hmueih kah a rhang neh khosaa kah a laeng tah namah kah maehvae neh, na ca rhoek kah maehvae coeng ni. Na capa rhoek, na canu rhoek neh namah kah hmuen saelh ah ca uh.
Khosaa kah a laeng neh thueng hmueih kah a rhang khaw maehtha hmaihlutnah khaw BOEIPA mikhmuh kah thueng hmueih la thueng ham khuen uh. BOEIPA kah a uen vanbangla namah ham neh na ca rhoek ham kumhal ah maehvae la om saeh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah boirhaem maae te Moses loh a tlap a tlap hatah vawl ana hai pauh. Te dongah Aaron koca rhoek khuiah aka sueng Eleazar neh Ithamar taengah a thintoek tih,
“A cim kah a cim boirhaem he balae tih hmuencim hmuen ah na caak uh pawh He khaw rhaengpuei kathaesainah aka phuei tih BOEIPA mikhmuh ah amih kah tholh aka dawth hamla nangmih taengah m'paek dae.
A thii te hmuencim la a khuen moenih ko he. Kang uen bangla hmuencim ah ca khaw ca uh yap mai saw,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Aaron loh Moses taengah, “Tihnin ah a boirhaem neh hmueihhlutnah te khaw BOEIPA mikhmuh ah a nawn uh coeng dae tahae kah bangla kai taengah thoeng coeng he. Tihnin ah boirhaem he ka ca koinih BOEIPA mikhmuh ah then aya?,” a ti nah.
Tedae Moses loh a yaak vaengah a mikhmuh ah a thuem sak.
BOEIPA loh Moses neh Aaron te a voek tih,
“Israel ca rhoek te voek rhoi lamtah, diklai hmankah rhamsa boeih khuiah na caak uh ham mulhing he thui pah.
Rhamsa khuiah a khomae rhak tih a khomae dongkah a khorhaek aka thal neh caknaih aka naih boeih te tah ca uh.
Tedae caknaih aka naih neh khomae aka rhak khuiah Kalauk he ca uh boeh. Caknaih a naih dae a khomae a rhak pawt dongah nangmih ham rhalawt.
Saphih he khaw caknaih a naih dae a khomae a rhak pawt dongah nangmih ham rhalawt.
Saveh khaw caknaih a naih dae a khomae a rhak pawt dongah nangmih ham rhalawt.
Ok he a khomae rhak tih a khomae dongkah a khorhaek thal dae caknaih a naih pawt dongah nangmih ham rhalawt.
A saa te ca uh boeh. A rhok khaw ben uh boeh. Te rhoek te nangmih ham rhalawt.
Tui dongkah aka om boeih khuiah he ca uh. tui dongkah khaw, tuitunli dongkah khaw, soklong kah khaw a phae neh a lip aka om boeih tah ca uh.
Tedae tuitunli dongkah khaw, soklong kah khaw, tui dongkah rhulcai boeih neh tui khuikah aka hing hinglu boeih khuiah a phae neh a lip aka om pawt boeih te nangmih ham konawhnah ni.
Nangmih ham konawhnah la a om uh dongah a saa te ca uh boeh. A rhok te khaw tuei uh.
A phae khaw, a lip khaw a khueh mueh la tui dongah aka om boeih te nangmih ham konawhnah ni.
Vaa khuiah he rhoek tah tuei uh, caak ham moenih. atha khaw, langta khaw, thamuk khaw konawhnah ni.
murhung neh maisi hui khaw,
vangak neh anih hui boeih,
Tuirhuk khaw, kirhoeng, khangkhoe, mutlo neh anih hui boeih,
thathawt, tuiliim, saelbu,
abuu, khosoek saelbu, tamcu,
bungrho, kaikoi neh anih hui, thongpanai neh pumphak.
Vaa bangla om tih a kho pali neh aka yuel rhulcai boeih khaw nangmih ham konawhnah ni.
Tedae vaa bangla om tih a kho pali neh yuel cakhaw diklai dongah cungpet nah ham a kho phoeiah a kho aka khueh rhulcai boeih tah ca uh.
Kaisih neh a hui, tangboeng neh a hui khaw, tungrhit neh a hui khaw, tangku neh anih hui khaw ca uh.
Tedae vaa bangla om tih a kho pali aka khueh rhulcai boeih tah nangmih ham konawhnah ni.
A rhok aka ben boeih tah te nen te na poeih uh ni. Amih te kholaeh duela a poeih ni.
A rhok aka phuei boeih long khaw a himbai te til saeh. Anih te kholaeh duela poeih uh ni.
Rhamsa boeih khaw a khomae rhak tih a khorhaek aka thal pawt neh caknaih aka naih pawt tah nangmih ham rhalawt. Te te aka ben boeih tah poeih uh ni.
A kho pali neh aka yuel mulhing boeih khuiah a kut neh aka yuel boeih khaw nangmih ham rhalawt. A rhok aka ben boeih tah kholaeh duela a poeih ni.
A rhok aka phuei long tah a himbai te til saeh. Hlaem duela a poeih uh vaengah tah amih te nangmih ham rhalawt.
Diklai kah aka luem rhulcai khuiah saham, su, imrhai neh anih hui boeih,
tawkke, tangkong, cangdawl, lainaat, hambo he khaw nangmih ham rhalawt.
Rhulcai boeih khuiah nangmih ham aka rhalawt rhoek te a duek vaengah aka ben boeih khaw kholaeh duela poeih uh ni.
A duek vaengah anih soah aka cungku boeih tah poeih uh ni. Te dongah thing hnopai boeih neh himbai khaw, maehpho mai khaw, tolkhui mai khaw, te rhoek neh bitat la a saii hnopai boeih te tah tui dongah duung saeh. Hlaem due poeih uh saeh lamtah caihcil saeh.
Tedae amih khuikah te lai umam khat khat khuila a tlak atah a khui neh a khui kah boeih khaw a poeih dongah rhek dae uh laeh.
Caak ham cakok khat khat te tekah am tui loh a pha thil atah a poeih coeng. Te dongah umam khat khat khui lamkah ok ham koi tui khaw boeih a poeih coeng.
Amih rhok loh a cuhu thil boeih tah tapkhuel khaw, lungthu khaw a poeih coeng. Te rhoek rhalawt rhoek te tah palet saeh. Nangmih ham khaw rhalawt la om.
Tedae tuisih neh tangrhom tui tungnah a tlak thil atah tuicil la om mai cakhaw a rhok aka ben te a poeih.
Tedae te cangti ballung boeih tah a rhok loh tlak thil cakhaw cuem ngawn dongah tue ngawn saeh.
Tedae cangti te tui dongah a khueh vaengah a rhok loh a cuhu thil atah nangmih ham rhalawt.
Na caak ham koi rhamsa a duek vaengah khaw a rhok aka ben tah hlaem duela poeih uh ni.
A rhok aka ca tah a himbai te til saeh. Anih khaw hlaem duela poeih uh ni. A rhok aka phuei te khaw a himbai te til saeh. Hlaem due la poeih uh ni. Diklai
ah aka luem rhulcai boeih khaw konawhnah, caak koi moenih.
A bung neh aka colh boeih, a kho pali neh aka van boeih khaw, a kho aka ping boeih khaw, diklai ah aka luem rhulcai boeih he tah konawhnah ni ca uh boeh.
Aka luem rhulcai boeih neh na hinglu te rhun uh boeh. Amih nen khaw poeih uh boel lamtah amih long khaw nang m'poeih uh boel saeh.
Kai tah nangmih Pathen BOEIPA ni. Te dongah ciim uh lamtah ka cim bangla a cim la om uh. Te dongah diklai kah aka colh rhulcai boeih dongah na hinglu te poeih uh boeh.
Nangmih kah Pathen la om ham Egypt khohmuen lamloh nangmih aka khuen khaw BOEIPA kamah ni. Te dongah kai ka cim bangla a cim la om uh.
He tah rhamsa neh vaa, tui dongkah aka hing tih aka colh hinglu boeih neh diklai dongkah aka luem hinglu boeih ham,
rhalawt laklo neh cuemcaih laklo ah, caak ham mulhing laklo neh caak koi pawh mulhing laklo ah paekboe ham olkhueng ni,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA loh Moses te a voek tih,
Israel ca rhoek te voek lamtah thui pah. Huta he vawn tih capa a cun atah pumom tue vaengah a poeih uh bangla hnin rhih khuiah poeih uh.
Tedae hnin rhet vaengah camoe kah yahhmui saa te rhet pah saeh.
Te phoeiah ciimnah thii dongah khohnin sawmthum hnin thum khosa saeh. A caihcilnah khohnin a cum hlan atah aka cim boeih te ben boel saeh lamtah rhokso lam khaw cet boel saeh.
Tedae huta a cun atah pumom vaengkah bangla yalh khat khuiah poeih uh la om saeh. Te dongah ciimnah thii dongah khohnin sawmrhuk hnin rhuk khosa saeh.
A caihcilnah khohnin a cup vaengah atah capa canu kah hmueihhlutnah ham tu kum khat ca neh boirhaem la vahui ca neh vahu mai khaw tingtunnah dap thohka kah khosoih taengla khuen saeh.
Te phoeiah anih ham te BOEIPA mikhmuh ah nawn pah saeh lamtah dawth pah saeh. Te daengah ni anih kah pumthim thii te a caihcil eh. He tah huta tongpa aka cun ham olkhueng ni.
Tedae a kut loh boiva kangna khaw a hmuh pawt atah vahu phiknit mai khaw, vahui ca phiknit mai khaw hmueihhlutnah ham pakhat, boirhaem ham pakhat te khuen saeh. Te daengah ni anih ham te khosoih loh a dawth pah vetih a caihcil eh?,” a ti nah.
BOEIPA loh Moses neh Aaron te a voek tih,
“Hlang a vin a saa dongah a phuem mai khaw, a vinhna mai khaw, a dikdak la om tih a vin a saa dongah hmaibae tloh la om mai ni. Te vaengah khosoih Aaron taengah khaw, khosoih koca rhoek khuikah pakhat taengah khaw khuen saeh.
A vin saa dongkah a tloh te khosoih loh a sawt vaengah a hma dongkah a mul te a bok la om tih a tloh kah a hmuethma khaw a vin saa khuila dawp a dung atah hmaibae tloh coeng ni. Tedae khosoih loh so saeh lamtah anih poeih uh ti saeh.
Te vaengah a vin saa dongkah dikdak la bok dae a hmuethma loh a vin khuila dung pawt tih a mul khaw a bok la a om pawt atah hlang tlo te khosoih loh hnin rhih khoh dae saeh.
A rhih hnin vaengah khosoih loh so saeh. Tedae tloh te a mikhmuh hmuen la om tih a vin khuila tloh rhoeng mai mahpawh. Te vaengah anih te khosoih loh pabae la hnin rhih parhaeng saeh.
A hnin rhih dongah anih te khosoih loh pabae la so bal saeh. Te vaengah a hma te maat tih a vin dongkah a hma khaw a rhoeng pawt atah khosoih loh caihcil coeng ti saeh. Phai la a om dongah a himbai te a suk vetih caihcil bitni.
Tedae a ciimnah ham khosoih taengla a tueng phoeiah a vin dongkah phai a rhoeng la a rhoeng atah khosoih taengah pabae la tueng bal saeh.
Khosoih loh a sawt vaengah a vin dongkah phai te a rhoeng atah anih te khosoih loh poeih uh coeng ti saeh. Te te hmaibae ni.
Hmaibae tloh he hlang dongah a om van neh khosoih taengla khuen saeh.
Khosoih loh a sawt vaengah a vin te a bok la phuem tih, a phuem dongkah a mul te a bok la a poeh phoeiah a saa te thingsup la a thing mai ni.
A vin a saa dongkah hmaibae he rhung coeng tih a poeih uh coeng. Anih te rhalawt coeng tih khosoih loh anih parhaeng voel boel saeh.
Tedae a vin dongah hmaibae te hnai khaw hnai mai ni. Te vaengah khosoih mik kah hmuhnah boeih ah hlangtlo kah a vin boeih te hmaibae loh a lu lamkah a kho duela a thing mai ni.
