Nangmih kah mingnah bangla kai khaw ka ming tih nangmih kai he nangmih lakah ka toem moenih.
Tedae kai tah Tlungthang taengah ka thui tih Pathen taengah ka ngaih bangla ka tluung lah sue.
Tedae nangmih ah laithae kap tih nangmih boeih te mueirhol siboei ni.
U long nim n'ngam sak lah sue? Na ngam uh lah vetih nangmih ham cueihnah la om mako.
Kai kah toelthamnah hnatun dae lamtah ka hmuilai dongkah tuituknah he hnatung uh.
Pathen yueng la dumlai na thui uh vetih amah yueng la vuelvaeknah na thui uh aya?
A maelhmai na then sak uh vetih Pathen yueng la na ho uh aya?
Nangmih te n'khe vetih hlanghing taengkah omsaa bangla a taengah na omsaa uh koinih then aya?
Yinhnuk ah maelhmai na dan uh koinih a tluung ham khaw nangmih te ni n'tluung eh.
A boeimang loh nangmih te n'let sak tih amah kah birhihnah loh nangmih soah tla het mahpawt nim?
Nangmih poekkoepnah he hmaiphu dongkah banghui, nangmih kah amkhawn khaw amlai amkhawn banghui ni.
Kai taengah hilphah uh lamtah ka cal mai akhaw kamah taengah mebang khaw thoeng mai saeh.
Balae tih ka saa te ka no dongla ka khueh vetih ka hinglu he ka kut neh ka pom eh.
Kai n'rhaem mai cakhaw amah taengah ka ngaiuep mahpawt nim? Ka longpuei he a mikhmuh ah ka thui pueng ni.
He khaw kai hamla khangnah la om pai. Lailak tah a mikhmuh la kun mahpawh.
Nangmih hna dongkah ka olthui neh ka olhoe he hnatun khaw hnatun mai dae.
Ka tang ni tila ka ming dongah laitloeknah ka tawn coeng he.
Kai aka ho te unim? Ka ngam mai laeh vetih ka pal mai mako.
Kai taengah panit bueng saii boeh, na mikhmuh lamloh ka ying pawt ve.
Na kut te kai dong lamloh lakhla sak lamtah na mueirhih neh kai n'let sak boeh.
Te phoeiah n'khue lamtah ka doo bitni. Ka thui saeh lamtah kai he n'thuung saeh.
Ka taengkah thaesainah neh tholhnah he meyet nim? Ka boekoeknah neh ka boirhaem lai kai n'tueng lah.
Balae tih na maelhmai na thuh, kai he na taengkah thunkha bangla nan moeh mai.
Hawnlae a yawn nim na na sairhing vetih divawt rhae te na hloem eh?
Kai taengah khahing te nan daek tih ka camoe thaesainah te kai nan pang sak.
Ka kho he hloong dongah nan buen tih ka caehlong boeih na ngaithuen. Ka kho dongkah khotang ham kha na vuel coeng.
Te khaw keet bangla hmawn tih himbai bangla bungbo loh a caak.
Huta kah a sak hlang he a khohnin toi tih khoponah khaw hah.
Rhaipai bangla phuelh tih a oh uh. Khokhawn bangla yong tih pai voel pawh.
Te soah ngawn tah na mik tueng tih kai he na taengkah laitloeknah dongla na khuen.
Rhalawt lamloh a cuem la aka khueh te unim? Pakhat pataeng om pawh.
A khohnin neh a hla taenah khaw namah taengah hangdang. A oltlueh te a oltlueh bangla na saii tih poe thai pawh.
Anih lamloh vawl mangthong lamtah amah hnin at kutloh bangla a ngaingaih hil toeng saeh.
Thing ham tah a vung akhaw ngaiuepnah om pueng. Te dongah koep mikhing vetih a dawn khaw ngoeng mahpawh.
Diklai khuiah a yung patong mai tih laipi khuiah a ngo duek cakhaw,
tui bo ah duei vetih thinghloe bangla a pae cawn ni.
Tedae hlang tah duek tih rhaa uh coeng. Hlang he a pal phoeiah tah melam a om.
Tuitunli lamkah tui khaw khawk dae tuiva loh a khah vaengah tah kak.
Hlang khaw yalh tih thoo voel pawh. Vaan a om pawt due khaw haenghang pawh. Amih te ih kung lamloh haenghang uh mahpawh.
Unim saelkhui ah a paek lah ve? Kai he nan khoem lah vetih na thintoek a mael duela kai nan thuh lah mako. Kai hamla oltlueh na khueh vetih kai nan poek mako.
Hlang he duek koinih hing venim? Kamah kah caempuei hnin boeih he ka thovaelnah a pawk hil ka lamtawn bitni.
Nan khue vaengah kai loh nang te ka doo bitni. Na kut dongkah bibi dongah na moo bitni.
Ka khokan he na tae pawn vetih ka tholhnah khaw na dawn mahpawh.
Ka boekoek hnocun khuiah catui a hnah thil tih kai kathaesainah na dah thil bitni.
Tedae Tlang khaw cungku tih moelh. Lungpang pataeng a hmuen lamloh thoeih.
Lungto khaw tui loh a hoh tih a kongnawt loh diklai laipi a yo. Te dongah hlanghing kah ngaiuepnah na pal sak.
Anih te a yoeyah la na khulae tih a hmai a tal la a van daengah anih te na tueih.
A ca rhoek a thangpom uh dae a ming moenih. Muei uh cakhaw amih a yakming moenih.
Tedae a pumsa tah a taengah tih thak a khoeih tih a hinglu khaw amah hamla nguekcoi,” a ti.
Te phoeiah Temani Eliphaz loh a doo.
Te vaengah, “Aka cueih loh khohli mingnah neh a doo vetih a bung ah kanghawn a hah sak aya?
A taengah hmaiben pawt tih a hoeikhang pawh olthui te ol neh a tluung aya?
Nang aisat, hinyahnah na muei sak tih Pathen mikhmuh kah thuepnah khaw na bim.
Na ka loh namah kathaesainah a cang tih thaai ol na coelh.
Na ka loh nang m'boe sak tih kai long moenih. Na hmuilai long ni namah te n'doo.
Hlang lamhma la n'sak tih som a om hlan lamloh n'yom coeng a?
Pathen kah baecenol te na yaak tih namah hamla cueihnah na buem a?
Ka ming uh pawt te metlam na ming tih kaimih taengah amah a om pawt khaw na yakming?
Sampok khaw, mamih taengkah patong khaw na pa lakah a khohnin khuet coeng ta.
Pathen loh hloephloeinah neh na taengah dikdik a cal ol nang hamla vawt a?
Balae tih na lungbuei na a khuen? Balae tih na mik loh a mikmuelh?
Na thintoek te Pathen taengla na hooi tih na ka lamloh ol na tha.
Huta kah a sak te mebang hlanghing nim aka cim tih aka tang te?
A hlangcim khuikah a hlangcim koek pataeng tangnah pawt tih vaan pataeng amah mikhmuh ah a cil moenih.
Tui bangla dumlai aka mam hlang, a tueilaeh neh a rhonging aisat a.
Nang taengah kan thui eh kai ol he hnatun dae. Ka hmuh te kan tae eh.
Te te hlangcueih rhoek loh a thui uh tih a napa rhoek taeng lamloh a phah uh moenih.
Amih te amamih bueng ham khohmuen a paek vaengah amih lakli ah kholong a nuen sak moenih.
Halang tah hnin takuem amah kilkul tih hlanghaeng ham a kum tarhing la khoem uh.
Ngaimongnah khuiah pataeng anih aka rhoelrhak ham a hna ah birhihnah ol a pawk pah.
Hmaisuep lamloh mael ham tangnah pawt tih rhaltawt long khaw amah cunghang te dongah tawt uh.
Buh hamla amah poeng tih a kut ah hmaisuep khohnin bangla a tawn te metlam a ming eh?
Anih te rhal loh a let sak tih caem dongah a coekcoe la aka om manghai bangla khobing loh anih te a khulae.
Pathen taengah a kut a thueng tih Tlungthang taengah phuel uh.
A rhawn kah uen a thah la a taengah a photling a yong puei.
A maelhmai te a tha neh a khuk tih a uen duela bungkawt laep.
Tedae khopuei khosa khaw a im ding te lungkuk la a phaek uh tih a khuiah khosa uh pawh.
Boei pawt vetih a thadueng khaw pai mahpawh. Amih kah khohrhang loh diklai ah pungtai mahpawh.
Hmaisuep lamloh nong thai mahpawh. A dawn te hmairhong loh a hae vetih a ka dongkah yilh loh a khoe ni.
A poeyoek dongah tangnah boel saeh lamtah a poeyoek dongah khohmang boel saeh. A hnothung khaw a poeyoek lamni a om eh.
A khohnin loh cup pawt vetih a rhophoe khaw hing mahpawh.
Misur a thaihkang bangla hul vetih olive rhaipai bangla rhul ni.
Lailak kah hlangboel tah pumhong la om vetih kapbaih kah dap tah hmai loh a hlawp ni.
thakthaenah la vawn tih boethae a sak. A bungko khaw hlangthai palat cuen,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Job loh a doo tih,
“Te bang ol te muep ka yaak coeng. Nangmih boeih kah a hloep khaw thakthaenah ni.
Khohli ol te a bawtnah om a? Balae tih na doo hamla nang n'huek.
Kai khaw nang bangla ka thui thai ta. Na hinglu te ka hinglu yueng la om koinih olthui neh nangmih te kan sun vetih ka lu lamloh nangmih taengah ka hinghuen van ni.
Ka ka neh nangmih te kan duel lah vetih ka hmuilai kah thaphohnah loh n'hoeptlang mako.
Ka thui akhaw ka thakkhoeihnah a rhoei moenih. Ka paa koinih kai lamloh metlam a caeh eh?
Ka hlangboel boeih khaw na pong uh tih ka ngak ngawn coeng.
Kai nan tonga sak khaw laipai la om coeng. Ka laithae khaw ka taengah pai sak tih ka mikhmuh ah n'doo coeng.
A thintoek loh a baeh tih kai soah a konaeh. Kai taengah a no te a tah coeng. Ka rhal loh kai soah a mik a huel.
A ka neh kai n'ang thil uh. Kokhahnah neh ka kam han taam uh tih kai taengah huek ha cu uh.
Pathen loh kai he hlang thae taengla n'det tih halang kut dongla kai m'muek.
Thayoeituipan la ka om vaengah kai m'phae. Ka rhawn ah n'khak tih kai he n'taekyak. Te dongah kai he amah ham kutnoek la m'pai sak coeng.
Ka taengah a lithen rhoek loh m'vael uh tih ka kuel a khoh. Lungma a ti kolla diklai dongah ka hmuet phawt coeng.
A puut hman ah a puut loh kai m'va. Hlangrhalh bangla kai taengah cu.
Ka vin soah tlamhni ka hui tih ka ki khaw laipi neh ka poelyoe coeng.
Ka maelhmai he rhahnah neh nok la nok uh tih ka mikkhu khaw nut coeng.
Te cakhaw boethae ka kut ah kuthlahnah om pawt tih ka thangthuinah khaw cil.
Diklai nang loh ka thii he vuei boeh. Ka pang ol he khaw hmuen om boel saeh.
Vaan ah pataeng kai kah laipai om tih ka hlangcal khaw hmuensang ah om coeng ke.
Ka hui khaw Pathen taengah kai kah hmuiyoi la om tih ka mik khaw pha coeng.
Hlang capa tah hlang ham neh a hui ham Pathen taengah a thui ta.
Kum a tarhing ah ha pawk vetih ka mael voel mueh caehlong ah ka cet pawn ni.
Ka mueihla he pat tih ka khohnin loh khum coeng, kai hamla coeng tih phuel om coeng.
Ka taengah a omsasaipat pai moenih a? Te dongah amih koek ham khaw ka mik ah rhaeh pai saeh.
Kai kah rhikhang he namah hamla khueh laeh. Anih te ulong ka kut dongla a khoom eh?
Amih kah lungbuei te lungmingnah lamloh na khoem pah coeng. Te dongah na pomsang sak mahpawh.
Khoyo la a hui a phoe vaengah a ca rhoek mik tah hma coeng.
Kai he pilnam kah a thuidoek la n'khueh tih maelhmai dongkah timthoeihnah la ka om.
Ka mik he konoinah neh hmang coeng tih ka pumrho he khokhawn bangla boeih om.
Te dongah aka thuem khaw a pong sak tih lailak taengah ommongsitoe a haenghang sak.
Tedae aka dueng loh amah longpuei te a tuuk vetih a kut cim khaw a thaa sai ni.
Amih te boeih na mael sak uh coeng. Na pawk uh to cakhaw nangmih ah hlangcueih ka hmu mahpawh.
Ka khohnin loh thok coeng. Ka thinko kah kohnek la ka poeknah mawth coeng.
Khoyin te khothaih la a khueh tih, a hmuep tom te vangnah neh a yoei sak.
Saelkhui te ka im bangla ka lamtawn tih, hmaisuep ah ka rhaenghmuen ka saelh.
Vaam taengah, “A pa nang,” ka ti nah tih a rhit taengah, “A nu neh ka ngannu,” ka ti nah coeng.
Te dongah menim ka ngaiuepnah tih ka ngaiuepnah he unim aka mae?
Saelkhui thohka te suntla vetih laipi khuila rhenten n'ael aya?,” a ti.
Shuhi Bildad loh a doo tih,
“Olthui kah taikhaihnah te me hil nim na khueh ve. Yakming lamtah a hnukah thui sih.
Balae tih rhamsa bangla nan poek, na mikhmuh ah ka angvawk a?
A thintoek ah amah hinglu pataeng a baeh ta. Diklai loh a hnoo tih lungpang te a hmuen lamloh a thoeih akhaw nang hut a?
Halang rhoek kah vangnah ngawn tah thi tih a hmai te hmaihli bang lam pataeng aa pawh.
Vangnah khaw a dap khuiah hmuep tih a hmaithoi khaw amah taengah a thih pah.
A thahuem kah khokan pataeng caek tih a cilsuep loh amah a voeih.
A kho loh lawk khuila a tueih tih sahamlong khuila a pongpa sak.
A khodil te pael loh a tuuk tih amah te kokthah dongah man.
A rhuihet te diklai dongah a tung tih, a sutaeh te a hawn ah a khueh pah.
Anih te mueirhih loh a kaepvai ah a let sak tih a kho ah taekyak uh.
A boethae ah bungpong la om tih a cungdonah hamla rhainah khaw a sikim pah.
Dueknah caming loh a vin saa a caak pah tih a rhuhrhong a hnom pah.
A pangtungnah a dap lamloh a poh tih mueirhih manghai taengla a luei sak.
Amah kah pawt long khaw anih kah dap ah kho a sak tih, a tolkhoeng te yam a phul thil.
A yung khui ah koh tih a so duela a pae khaw ngat.
Anih poekkoepnah te diklai lamloh paltham tih a ming te rhamvoel hmai ah om pawh.
Anih te vangnah lamloh a hmuep la a thaek uh tih anih te lunglai lamloh a poeng sakuh.
A taengah a ca tal tih a pilnam taengah a cadil om pawh. A lampahnah ah khaw rhaengnaeng om pawh.
Amah tue vaengah pong tih a hnuk a hmai la hlithae loh a tuuk.
He tah boethae kah dungtlungim tih Pathen aka ming pawt kah a hmuen khaw he tlam ni,” a ti nah.
Job loh a doo tih,
Me hil nim ka hinglu na pae sak vetih ol neh kai nan phop uh ve?
Voei rha ka hmai na thae sak uh coeng, kai nan toeh te na yak pawh.
Ka taengah ka tholh a rhaeh pueng dongah ka palang tueng pataeng ngawn.
Kai soah na pantai mai tih kai kokhahnah bangla kai taengah na tluung tueng pai.
Pathen loh kai n'khun sak tih amah kah tluum te ka kaepvai ah a vael.
Kuthlahnah te ka doek tih bomah ka bih cakhaw n'doo pawt dongah tiktamnah om pawh.
Ka caehlong he a biing tih ka muk tloel. Ka hawn ah a hmuep a khueh.
Kai kah thangpomnah te kai dong lamloh a pit tih ka lu dongkah rhuisam khaw a dul.
Kai kaepvai lamloh m'palet tih ka pongpa vaengah ka ngaiuepnah he thing bangla a puen.
A thintoek he kai taengah a sai vaengah kai he amah taengah a rhal bangla m'moeh.
Anih kah caem te rhenten ha pawk uh tih a longpuei te kai m'picai thil uh. Te phoeiah ka dap ah pin rhaeh uh.
Ka manuca rhoek kai taeng lamloh lakhla coeng tih ka ming rhoek khaw kai lamloh kholong uh coeng.
Ka yoei uh rhoek loh n'toeng uh tih ka ming uh rhoek loh kai n'hnilh uh coeng.
Ka im pah neh ka salnu rhoek loh kholong bangla kai m'poek uh. Amih mikhmuh ah kholong hlang la ka om.
Ka sal te ka khue dae oei pawh. Anih te ka ka neh ka hloep.
Ka mueihla he ka yuu taengah a kholong pah tih ka bungko kah ka ca rhoek taengah khaw rhennah ka bih.
Casenca rhoek long pataeng kai he n'hnaep uh tih, ka thoh vaengah kai he n'thui uh coeng.
Ka baecenol dongkah hlang boeih loh kai n'tuei uh tih ka lungnah he kamah taengah poehlip uh.
Ka vin neh ka saa hil khaw ka rhuh dongla kap tih ka no dongkah nohli neh ka loeih.
Ka hui rhoek nangmih loh kai n'rhen uh, kai n'rhen uh. Pathen kut loh kai he m'ben coeng.
Balae tih Pathen bangla kai nan hloem uh. Kai saa lamkah khaw na hah uh hae mahpawh.
Kai ol a daek uh te unim a paek bal. Cabu dongkah bangla a unim a paek vetih a taem uh ve?
Thi cacung neh kawnlawk te lungpang dongah a yoeyah la a dae uh.
Kai tah kai aka tlan te hing tih hmailong kah laipi dongah thoo ni tila ka ming.
Ka vin hnukah he hluep uh cakhaw, ka saa dongah Pathen ka hmuh bitni.
Kai kamah long khaw ka hmuh vetih ka mik long khaw a hmuh pueng ni. Te dongah ka rhang kah ka kuel loh rhalawt te a hue moenih.
Ka khuikah ol hnun a hmuh parhi te, “Anih te metlam n'hloem eh?” na ti uh akhaw,
nangmih te cunghang hmai ah bakuep uh laeh. Amah dumlai tah dumlai bangla na ming uh hamla cunghang lamlothaesainah kosi om coeng,” a ti.
Te phoeiah Naamathi Zophar loh a doo tih,
“Te dongah ka pomnah kai n'thuung tih kamah khuiah ka tawn uh coeng dongah ni.
Ka thuituennah he mingthae la ka yaak dongah ka yakmingnah dongah mueihla loh kai n'doo.
Suen lamloh diklai dongah hlang a khueh parhi te na ming a?
Halang kah omngaih laa tah yoei tih lailak kah kohoenah khaw mikhaptok hil mai ni.
A thinlennah te vaan duela cet tih a lu loh khomai duela puet cakhaw,
a aek bangla a yoeyah la milh vetih anih aka hmu rhoek loh, “Anih ta?” a ti uh ni.
Mang bangla a ding phoeiah tah anih te hmu uh pawh. Khoyin kah olphong bangla khum hmata.
A mik loh a hmuh khaw rhaep mahpawh. Anih te amah hmuen ah mae voel mahpawh.
A ca rhoek loh tattloel rhoek te a moeithen uh tih a kut loh a thahuem te a mael uh.
A rhuh tah a cacawn rhoek bangla hah uh dae a cacawn rhoek khaw amah neh laipi dongah ni a yalh eh.
A ka dongah tui mai cakhaw boethae te a lai hmui ah a thuh.
Te te a hnaih tih a toeng pawt dongah a ka khui la a ma-uem.
A bung khuikah a buh te a khui ah minta sue la poeh ni.
Khuehtawn a dolh vaengah a bung khui lamloh lok vetih anih te Pathen loh a talh ni.
Minta sue loh a khut vetih rhulthae lai loh amah a ngawn ni.
Soklong, tuiva neh khorha kah khoitui neh suknaeng te hmuh mahpawh.
Thatloh phu te a thuung akhaw a hnothung kah thadueng bangla a dolh pawt dongah yoka pawh.
tattloel te a neet phoeiah amah loh a sak mueh im te a hnoo sak tih a rawth pah.
A bungko lamkah thayoeituipan te ming pawt tih a nai nen khaw loeih pawh.
A caak ham caknoi om pawh. Te dongah a thennah poem hae mahpawh.
A khuehtawn neh a hah vaengah anih te a daengdaeh vetih thakthaekung kah kut boeih te anih soah thoeng ni.
Anih bung hah sak ham a taengah amah kah thintoek thinsa a tueih pah vetih a buhcak te anih soah a tlan sak.
Thicung lungpok haica lamloh yong dae anih te rhohum lii loh a kah.
A yueh vaengah a pumpu lamloh a pawlh pah. Te vaengah a hmuet khui lamkah mueirhih te amah soah rhaek la a caeh pah ni.
Hmaisuep cungkuem te khoem hamla a tung. A hmuh mueh hmai loh anih te a hlawp vetih a dap kah rhaengnaeng khaw a talh pah ni.
Anih kathaesainah te vaan loh a hliphen uh vetih diklai loh amah taengah a tai pah ni.
A thintoeknah hnin ah tah a im kah cangpai khaw a poelyoe pah vetih a hawk pah ni.
Halang hlang loh tebang khoyo te Pathen taeng lamkah a dang tih Pathen loh a ol rho la a khueh pah,” a ti.
Te phoeiah Job loh a doo tih tih,
Ka ol hnatun, hnatun lamtah te te nangmih kah hloephloeinah om saeh.
Ka thui vaengah kai ol he ueh mai lamtah ka thui hnukah nan tamdaeng akhaw.
Kai khaw ka kohuetnah he hlang hut a? Balae tih ka mueihla loh a ngen pawt mai eh?
Kai taengla a mael vaengah hal tih a kut neh a ka te a puei.
Ka poek bal vaengah ka let tih ka pumsa he tuennah loh a tuuk.
Halang rhoek tah haimo la a hing uh akhaw balae tih tatthai la a len uh.
A mikhmuh kah a tiingan rhoek neh a mikhmuh kah a cadil cahma khaw amih taengah a cikngae sak.
Amih im khaw birhihnah lamloh ngaimongnah la om tih Pathen kah conghol loh amih soah cuk thil pawh.
A vaito a pil vaengah a vaito a pom khaw tuei pawt tih thangyah tlaih pawh.
A casenca rhoek te boiva bangla a hlah uh tih a camoe rhoek loh soipet uh.
Kamrhing neh rhotoeng te a phueih uh tih phavi ol neh a kohoe uh.
Amamih vaengkah tue then khuiah muei uh tih hmawn uh. Mikhaptok ah saelkhui la ael uh.
Tedae Pathen taengah, “Kaimih taeng lamloh nong laeh. Na longpuei ming ham ka ngaih uh moenih.
Anih taengah thothueng ham khaw unim tlungthang? A taengah n'cuuk uh ham khaw balae a hoeikhang eh?” a ti uh.
Amih kah thennah khaw amamih kut ah om pawt lah ko ke. Halang rhoek kah cilsuep te kai lamloh lakhla saeh.
Halang rhoek kah hmaithoi tah metlam khaw thi tih amamih kah rhainah amamih soah a thoeng pah. A thintoek neh a rhilong a suem pah.
Khohli hmai ah cangkong bangla om uh tih cangkik bangla cangpalam loh a khuen.
Pathen loh a ca rhoek ham a khoem coeng. A boethae te amah taengah thuung saeh lamtah ming saeh.
A sitlohthamlam te a mik, a mik ah tueng saeh lamtah tlungthang kah kosi te mam sak saeh.
A hnukah a imkhui ham a kongaih te balae? A hla kah a tarhing khaw bawt coeng.
Pathen te mingnah a tukkil a? Amah he pomsang tih lai a tloek.
A cungkuem dongah bidipbisok tih thayoeituipan la amah kah thincaknah rhuhrhong neh aka duek he,
A rhangsuk khaw suktui buem tih a rhuh hliing khaw sulpuem.
Hinglu khahing la duek tih hnothen aka ca pawt he khaw,
laipi khuiah rhenten yalh tih a rhit loh a soah a yol.
Nangmih kah kopoek ka ming phoeiah tangkhuepnah neh kai soah nan hul ni te.
“Hlangcong im te menim? Halang tolhmuen kah dap te menim?” na ti uh.
Longpuei aka poeng rhoek te na dawt uh pawt tih amih kah miknoek khaw na hmat uh pawt nim?
Rhainah khohnin lamloh boethae te a tuem tih thinpom khohnin lamloh a khuen te ta.
A khoboe te a mikhmuh ah aka phoe pah te unim? A saii bangla a taengah aka thuung te unim?
Anih khaw phuel la a khuen vaengah laivuei ni a hak thil.
Anih ham soklong kah dikmuh khaw tui. Anih hnuk te hlang boeih loh a thoelh tih anih hmai kah hlangmi tae lek pawh.
Te dongah balae tih a honghi la kai he nan hloep uh? Nangmih kah taikhaih khaw boekoeknah la cul coeng,” a ti.
Temani Eliphaz loh a doo tih,
Pathen te hlang loh s hmaiben a?Lungming khaw amah la dawk a hmaiben uh.
Na tang mai tih na mueluemnah mai akhaw, na khoboe soep cakhaw tlungthang hamla naep aya?
Na hinyahnah dongah nang te laitloeknah neh n'khuen tih nang n'tluung a?
Na boethae tangkik pawt nim?Nang kah thaesainah te a bawtnah om pawh.
Lunglilungla la na manuca na laikoi tih pumtling kah himbai te na pit pah.
Buhmueh rhathih te tui na tul pawt tih bungpong te buh na hloh pah.
Bantha aka khueh hlang loh amah hamla khohmuen a khueh tih a sokah khosa mikhmuh ah a dangrhoek.
Nuhmai te kuttling la na tueih tih cadah te a ban na phop pah.
Na kaepvai kah pael dongah he khaw na birhihnah neh buengrhuet na let.
A hmuep khaw na hmu pawt tih tuili tui loh nang n'khuk.
Pathen tah vaan sang kah moenih a?So lah, aisi rhoek kah a lu tah pomsang uh te.
Te lalah, “Pathen te metlam a mingpha?Yinnah lamloh lai a tloek a?
Anih te khomai loh a huep tih tueng pawh. Te vaengah vaan kah kueluek dongah cet,” na ti.
Boethae hlang rhoek loh a cawt khosuen caehlong nim na ngaithuen salah?
A tonga uh vaengah a tue pawt ah khaw tuiva loh amih kah khoengim te a hawt pah.
“Pathen te mamih taeng lamloh nong saeh, Tlungthang loh mamih taengah balae a saii eh? ” a ti uh.
Amah loh amih im te hnothen a cung sak sitoe cakhaw halang kah cilsuep tah kai lamloh lakhla saeh.
Aka dueng rhoek loh a hmuh vaengah a kohoe uh tih ommongsitoe loh amih te a tamdaeng.
Mamih kah thinnaeh a thup vetih amih kah a coih te hmai loh hlawp het pawt nim?
Amah neh hmaiben lamtah te nen te thuung laeh. Nang taengah hnothen ha pawk bitni.
A ka lamkah olkhueng mah doe laeh, a ol te khaw na thinko khuiah khueh laeh.
Tlungthang taengla na mael atah n'thoh bitni dumlai mah na dap lamloh lakhla sak.
Pasing te laipi bangla, Ophir te soklong kah lungpang bangla khueh ngawn.
Te vaengah na pasing te tlungthang la, cak te na ki la poeh bitni.
Te daengah ni Tlungthang dongah na ngailaem vetih Pathen taengla na maelhmai na dangrhoek bitni.
A taengah na thangthui vaengah nang ol a yaak vetih na olcaeng khaw cung ni.
Olkhueh te na tuiphih vaengah nang hamla thoo vetih na longpuei ah vangnah loh a tue ni.
A kunyun uh vaengah koevoeinah na thui dae tlahoei mik ni a khang eh.
Ommongsitoe pawt khaw loeih vetih na kut kah cimcaihnah loh a loeih sak ni,” a ti.
Job loh a doo tih,
Tihnin ah khaw boekoek bangla ka kohuetnah loh ka kut he ka hueinah neh a nan.
U loh n'khueh khaw ka ming vetih amah te ka hmuh phoeiah amah kah hmuenmol la ka pha lah mako?
A mikhmuh ah laitloeknah ka khueng lah vetih ka ka ah toelthamnah ka paem lah mako.
Olthui te ka ming tih kai n'doo vaengkah kai hamla a thui te ka yakming lah mako.
Thadueng cungkuem neh kai n'ho saeh a?Amah loh kai taengah khueh het mahpawt a?
Aka thuem te a hmaiah a tluung pahoi lah vetih kai he laitloek khui lamloh a yoeyah la ka loeih mako.
Khothoeng la ka caeh mai akhaw amah a om moenih. A hnuk ah khaw anih te ka yakming moenih.
Banvoei ah a saii vaengah ka hmuh moenih. Bantang la a mael vaengah ka hmuh moenih.
Tedae longpuei a ming dongah kai he ka taengah n'noemcai tih sui bangla ka thoeng.
A khokan te ka khopha loh a vai. A longpuei te ka ngaithuen tih ka phael moenih.
A hmuilai kah olpaek khaw ka hlong pawt tih ka buhvae lakah a ka lamkah ol ni ka khoem.
Tedae amah tah pakhat la om tih ulong anih a mael thil thai? Te dongah a hinglu kah a ngaih bangla a saii.
Ka oltlueh te a thuung tih te bang te amah taengah yet.
Te dongah a mikhmuh lamloh ka let coeng. Ka yakming dongah amah te ka rhih.
Pathen loh kai lungbuei a phoena sak tih tlungthang loh kai n'let sak.
Tedae a hmuep kah maelhmai loh m'biit pawt tih ka maelhmai te a khohmuep loh a dah moenih.
Balae tih Tlungthang taeng lamkah a tue te a khoem uh pawh. Amah aka ming, amah aka ming loh a khohnin te hmu uh pawh.
Rhilung a rhawt uh , tuping a rhawth uh tih a luem sakuh.
Cadah kah laak te a vai pah tih nuhmai kah vaito te a laikoi pauh.
Khodaeng rhoek te longpuei lamloh a tulh tih khohmuen kah mangdaeng rhoek khaw rhenten a thuh.
Amamih kah bisai la khosoek ah kohong marhang bangla pawk uh coeng ke. Amah ham kolken maeh neh camoe ham buh khaw a toem uh.
Lohma ah a kamvuelh te a ah, a ah uh tih halang misurdum kah a yoep uh.
Pumtling rhoek te pueinak tling la a rhaehba sak uh tih khosik vaengah himbai mueh uh.
Tlang kah cingtui loh a het uh tih hlipyingnah a om mueh la lungpang a kop uh.
Cadah khaw rhangsuk lamloh a suh uh tih mangdaeng rhoek te a laikoi.
Pumtling loh pueinak tling van tih bungpong doela canghmoek a puen.
A pangbueng ah situi a kuelh tih va-am a cawt uh lalah tui hal uh.
Khopuei lamkah hlang rhoek loh nguekcoi uh tih duekrhok hinglu loh bomnah a bih. Tedae Pathen loh ahohap te a dueh moenih.
Amih te vangnah aka tloelh lakli ah om uh tih a longpuei hmat uh pawh. Te dongah a hawn ah khosa uh pawh.
Hlang aka ngawn loh vangnah hnukah thoo tih mangdaeng neh khodaeng te a rhaem. Khoyin ah hlanghuen bangla om.
Samphaih mik loh hlaemhmah a lamtawn. Hlang mik loh kai m'mae mahpawh a ti dongah a maelhmai te a huephael la a khueh.
A hmuep vaengah im a muk. Khothaih ah amih te a tlaeng uh tih vangnah te ming uh pawh.
Dueknah hlipkhup mueirhih neh a hmat uh rhoi dongah dueknah hlipkhup te mincang neh amih taengah rhenten thoeng.
Anih te tui hman ah hoeptuep. Amih kah hmakhuen te diklai ah a tap dongah misurdum kah longpuei la mop voel pawh.
Rhamrhae neh kholing ah, tui khaw rhaeng tih vuelsong khaw saelkhui ah tholh coeng.
A bung loh anih a hnilh hil ah a rhit te a poek voel pawt hil a tui sak. Tedae dumlai tah thing bangla tlawt.
Ca aka cun mueh caya aka luem puei neh nuhmai khaw loha pawh.
Aka lueng pataeng a thadueng neh a kuel tih thoo mai dae hingnah dongah tangnah om pawh.
Anih te ngaikhuek la pae saeh lamtah hangdang saeh. Tedae Amih longpuei ah a mik a paelki.
Bet a pomsang uh vaengah amih te pahoi om uh pawt tih tlumhmawn uh. A pum la a buem uh tih cangmo vueilue bangla a baih uh.
Te pawt koinih unim kai aka laithae sak?Ka ol he a hong bangla a khueh mako,” a ti.
Te phoeiah Shuhi Bildad loh a doo tih,
“A taemrhai ham neh birhihnah he amah hut ni. Amah kah hmuensang ah rhoepnah a saii.
A caem taengah hlangmi om nim?. U soah nim amah kah vangnah a hlah pawh.
Te dongah hlanghing he Pathen taengah metlam a tang thai? Huta kah a sak te metlam a cim eh?
A mikhmuh ah hla pataeng khaw aa pawt tih aisi khaw a cil moenih.
Hlanghing aisat a rhit banghui ni, hlang capa khaw talam banghui,” a ti nah.
Job loh a doo tih,
“Metlam thadueng mueh te na bom tih sarhi aka tak mueh bantha te na khang?
Metlam lae cueihnah aka tal te na uen tih a cungkuem ah lungming cueihnah na ming sak.
U taengah nim ol na thui tih nang lamloh u kah hiil nim aka thoeng?
Sairhai tah tui hmui ah kilkul uh tih kho a sak.
A taengah saelkhui khaw pumtling om tih Abaddon khaw himbai om pawh.
Tlangpuei ah hinghong la a yaal tih bang aka om pawt soah khaw diklai a dingkoei sak.
A khomai khuiah tui a cun tih cingmai te a hmui ah a ueth pawh.
A cingmai te a soah a yaal tih ngolkhoel hmai a dah.
Vangnah neh a hmuep laklo kah a khuetnah hamla tui hman ah a rhi a rhuen pah.
Vaan kah tung khaw hlinghloek uh tih a tluungnah dongah a ngaihmang uh.
A thadueng loh tuipuei te a phih tih a lungcuei neh Rahab a phop.
A mueihla loh vaan kah khocil a thoeng sak tih a kut loh yingyet rhul khaw a toeh.
He tah a longpuei dongkah longpuei hmoi ni he. A thayung thamal kah khohum khuiah amah kah ol duem te metlam n'yaak? A thayung thamal te u long a yakming pai eh?” a ti.
Job loh amah kah a huel ham te a koei tih,
“Pathen kah hingnah loh kai kah laitloeknah a khoe tih Tlungthang lo ka hinglu a phaep.
Ka khuikah ka hiil boeih neh ka hnarhong khuikah he Pathen mueihla ni.
Ka hmuilai loh dumlai thui boel saeh lamtah ka lai loh palyal la caitawk boel saeh.
Nangmih te kan tang sak atah kai ham savisava. Ka pal duela ka muelhtuetnah he kamah lamloh ka khoe mahpawh.
Ka duengnah te ka kop vetih ka hlah mahpawh. Kamah tue lamlong tah ka thinko he veet voel mahpawh.
Ka thunkha te a halang bangla, kai aka tlai thil khaw a boethae bangla om saeh.
Lailak kah ngaiuepnah tah menim? A mueluem tih Pathen loh a hinglu a bong pah.
A soah citcai loh a pai vaengah a pangngawlnah te Pathen loh a hnatun nim?
Tlungthang dongah pang a dok vetih, a tue boeih ah Pathen a khue bitni.
Pathen kah kut te nangmih kan thuinuet phoe vetih, Tlungthang taengkah te ka phah mahpawh.
Nangmih boeih khaw na hmuh vaengah balae tih a honghi neh na hoemdawk he.
Halang hlang loh Pathen taeng lamkah khoyo neh hlanghaeng loh Tlungthang taeng lamkah rho a dang he,
a ca te cunghang hamla a ping pah tih a cadil cahma khaw buh cung uh mahpawh.
A rhaengnaeng, a rhaengnaeng te dueknah loh a up vetih a nuhmai rhoek loh rhah uh mahpawh.
Cak te laipi bangla hmoeng vetih hnicu te dikpo bangla soe ni.
Tawn cakhaw aka dueng loh a bai vetih cak te ommongsitoe loh a tael ni.
A im te ning bangla a sak tih dungtlungim bangla rhalrhing a khueh.
Hlanglen la yalh dae khoem uh mahpawh. A mik a dai dae amah om voel pawh.
Anih te tui bangla mueirhih loh a phatawt khoyin ah cangpalam loh a pom.
Anih te kanghawn loh a khuen tih khum. Te vaengah anih te amah hmuen lamloh a yawn.
Anih te a voeih tih lungma a ti pawt dongah a kut lamloh yong la yong coeng.
A taengah a kut a paeng uh tih anih te amah hmuen lamloh kut a ving thil.
Cak ham a khorhui om tih sui ham khaw a ciil nah hmuen om.
Thicung khaw laipi lamloh a loh tih lungto te rhohum la a tlae.
A bawtnah te a hmuep neh a khuetnah a cungkuem hil a khueh. Anih loh lungto te a hmuep neh dueknah hlipkhup ah khaw a hoem.
Soklong te aka bakuep taeng lamloh a yoe tih kho neh caeh khaw a hnilh uh. Hlanghing lamkah aka tlayae rhoek khaw hinghuen uh.
Diklai amah lamloh buh thoeng tih a hmui ah hmai bangla om.
A lungto te minhum hmuen tih a taengah sui laipi om.
A hawn te vatlung loh ming pawt tih maisi mik loh hmu pawh.
Te te sa ca rhoek loh cawt pawt tih te donglong te sathuengca long khaw pawn pawh.
Hmailung soah a kut a hlah tih tlang pataeng a yung ah a phil.
Sokko lungpang dongah a khoel tih umponah cungkuem khaw a mik loh a hmuh.
Tuiva tuilong khaw a kueng tih olhuep te khosae la a khuen.
Tedae me rhoek ah nim cueihnah a hmuh tih yakmingnah hmuen he menim?
A phu te hlanghing loh ming pawt tih mulhing khohmuen ah a hmuh moenih.
Tuidung loh, “Te te kai ah moenih,” a ti tih tuitunli loh, “Kai taengah moenih,” a ti.
Te ham te cui cilh khaw pae thai pawt tih cueihnah a phu te cak khaw a khiing pah.
Ophir sui nen khaw, oitha lung vang nen khaw minhum nen khawting pawh.
Te te sui neh canglung neh tluk pawt tih a hnothung he suicilh hnopai bal moenih.
Maerhuhlung neh disaehlung khaw thui lawk pawt tih cueihnah rhovoep tah lungvang lakah then.
Te te Kusah vaya nen khaw tluk pawt tih sui cilh nen khaw ting pawh.
Te dongah cueihnah he me lamkah nim ha pawk tih yakmingnah hmuen he menim?
Mulhing boeih kah mik lamloh a thuh pah tih vaan kah vaa taeng lamloh a thuh.
Abaddon neh dueknah loh, “A olthang te kaimih hna neh ka yaak uh,” a ti.
Pathen loh a longpuei a yakming tih a hmuen te khaw amah loh a ming.
Amah loh diklai khobawt hil a paelki tih vaan hmui khaw boeih a hmuh.
Yilh kah a khiing a khueh pah tih tui khaw cungnueh neh a nueh.
Amah loh khotlan ham rhi a suem tih rhaek ol ham khaw longpuei a khueh.
Cueihnah te a hmuh tih a tae. Cueihnah te a sikim sak tih a khe bal.
Hlang taengah khaw, 'Ka Boeipa hinyahnah he cueihnah la om tih boethae lamloh nong he yakmingnah,’ a ti,” a ti nah.
Job loh amah kah a pom te a cong tih,
“Kai he hlamat kah hla bangla aka khueh tih Pathen kah khohnin bangla kai aka tuem te unim?
Amah loh a hmaithoi te ka lu soah a thangthen tih amah kah vangnah nen ni a hmuep ah khaw ka caeh.
Ka cavaa tue vaengah khaw ka dap ah Pathen kah baecenol la ka om.
Tlungthang te kai taengah om pueng tih, ka kaepvai ka ca rhoek om.
Ka khokan te suknaeng neh a hluk tih lungpang loh kai ham situi sokca a long sak.
Vangpuei vongka ah ka thoeng tih toltung ah ka ngolhmuen cikngae sak.
Kai m'hmuh uh vaengah cadong rhoek te thuh uh. Patong rhoek khaw thoo uh tih pai uh.
Mangpa rhoek loh olthui te a phah uh tih a kut te a ka dongla a khueh uh.
Rhaengsang rhoek ol te a phah tih a lai khaw a dang dongla kap.
Hna loh a yaak vaengah kai n'uem tih mik loh a hmuh vaengah kai n'rhalrhing sak.
Mangdaeng loh bomnah a bih tih cadah neh a taengah aka bom aka om pawt khaw ka loeih sak.
Hlang milh kah yoethennah te kai soah pai tih nuhmai kah lungbuei khaw ka tamhoe sak.
Duengnah te ka bai tih hnikul bangla kai n'khuk. Ka tiktamnah he ka sammuei nah ni.
Mikdael taengah mik la, khokhaem taengah kho la ka om.
Kai tah khodaeng taengah a napa la ka om tih ming pawt kah tuituknah te ka khe pah.
Boethae kah pumcu te ka thuk pah tih a no lamkah maeh te ka voeih pah.
Te dongah, “Ka bu ah ka pal mako,” ka ti tih laivin bangla khohnin ka puh.
Ka yung loh tui taengla a muk tih buemtui loh ka cangvuei dongah rhaeh.
Ka thangpomnah ka taengah thai tih ka lii ka kut dongah tinghil.
Kai taengah a hnatun uh tih a lamtawn uh dongah ka cilsuep ham kuemsuem uh.
Ka ol hnukah talh uh voel pawt tih kai olthui he amih soah tla.
Kai ham tah khotlan bangla a lamtawn uh tih a ka loh tlankhol bangla a ang uh.
Amih taengah ka luem dae n'tangnah uh pawt tih ka maelhmai vangnah dongah khaw yalh uh pawh.
Amih kah longpuei te ka coelh tih boeilu la ka ngol. Caem lakli ah manghai bangla kho ka sak tih rhahdoe cangpoem akhaw a hloep.
Tedae a kum la kai lakah aka noe long khaw kai taengah luem uh coeng. Te rhoek kah a napa pataeng ka boiva kah ui taengah khueh ham ka hnawt lah mako.
Amih kut dongkah thadueng khaw kai taengah metlam a om? Amih te a hminkhah lamni a paltham.
Vaitahnah neh khokha rhamling lamkah pumhong loh hlaem vaengah khohaeng neh imrhong kah rhamrhae te a cilh.
Tangpuem dongkah baekkoi te a hlaek uh tih a buh la hlingcet yung a khueh.
A nam lamloh a haek uh tih amih taengah hlanghuen bangla a o uh.
Soklong cakhom kah laipi neh thaelsawk khui ah kho a sak.
Tangpuem khuiah pang uh tih lota hmuiah poem uh.
Aka ang ca rhoek neh ming mueh ca rhoek ni khohmuen lamloh a hawt uh.
Te dongah amih kah rhotoeng la ka om coeng tih amih taengah ol la ka om.
Kai aka tuei rhoek tah kai lamloh lakhla uh tih ka mikhmuh ah timtui khaw tuem uh pawh.
A lirhui lakah ka lirhui he pawl coeng. Te dongah kai he m'phaep tih ka mikhmuh ah kamrhui han tueih uh.
Ka bantang kah hlangyoe loh tlai ka kho a kalh. Amih kah rhainah caehlong te kai taengah a picai uh.
Ka talnah khuiah ka hawn a mak uh tih, amih aka bom pawt khaw hoeikhang uh.
A puut aka len bangla ael uh tih a khohli rhamrhael hmuiah paluet uh.
Kai soah mueirhih pai tih khohli bangla ka moeihoeihnah a hloem vaengah kai kah khangnah te khomai bangla a yah.
Kai lamloh ka hinglu a kingling coeng tih phacip phabaem khohnin loh kai n'tuuk.
Khoyin ah ka rhuh te ka pum dong lamloh a cueh. Kai aka thuek he a dim moenih.
Thadueng cungkuem dongah ka pueinak a phuelhthaih tih ka angkidung te rhawnmoep bangla ka vah.
Kai he dikpo khuila n'dong tih laipi neh hmaiphu bangla n'thuidoek.
Na taengah bomnah kam bih dae kai nan doo moenih. Ka pai akhaw kai he nan yakming moenih.
Kai soah a muen la na poeh tih na ban thaa neh kai nan konaeh thil.
Kai he khohli dongah nan phueih. Kai nan ngol thil vaengah kai nan paci sak tih lungming cueihnah a yawn.
Mulhing boeih kah tingtunnah im la dueknah neh kai nan mael sak ham khaw ka ming.
A yoethaenah khuiah bombihnah a yaak vaengah kut aka thueng he lairhok dongah a om moenih.
Khohnin a mangkhak dongah ka rhap tih khodaeng dongah ka hinglu a omdam moenih.
A then ka lamtawn vaengah boethae ha pawk. Vangnah te ka ngaiuep vaengah a hmuep ha pai.
Ka bung he tlawk tih a kuemsuem moenih. Kai he phacip phabaem khohnin loh n'doe.
Khomik a tal dongah maelhmai a hmuep la ka cet. Hlangping neh ka pai tih ka pang.
Pongui kah a manuca neh tuirhuk vanu kah a hui la ka om.
Ka vin khaw kamah dong lamloh mu tih ka rhuh khaw kholing neh tlum coeng.
Ka rhotoeng te nguekcoinah la, ka phavi rhah ol la poeh.
Paipi te ka mik neh ka saii dongah me tlam lae oila te ka yakming eh?
A so lamkah Pathen khoyo neh hmuensang lamkah Tlungthang rho te menim?
Boethae ham rhainah neh boethae aka saii ham yoethaenah moenih a?
Amah loh ka longpuei a hmuh tih ka khokan boeih he a tae moenih a?
A poeyoek taengah ka pongpa tih ka kho loh a hlangthai palat taengla a tawn uh atah,
Duengnah cooi dongah kai n'khiing saeh lamtah Pathen loh ka muelhtuetnah ming saeh.
Longpuei lamloh ka khokan a buung atah, ka mik hnukah ka lungbuei cet tih ka kut dongah a lolhmaih a kap atah,
ka soem vaengah a tloe loh ca saeh lamtah ka cadil rhoek te ha uh saeh.
Huta loh ka lungbuei a hlae tih ka hui kah thohka ah ka rhongngol atah,
Ka yuu loh a tloe la kuelh saeh lamtah a taengah hlang tloe bakop mai saeh.
Te dongah te khonuen rhamtat neh te te thaesainah rhokhan ni.
Te hmai loh Abaddon duela a hlawp tih ka cangvuei te boeih ha.
Ka salpa neh ka salnu loh kai taengah a tuituk vaengah tiktamnah ka hnawt atah,
Pathen a thoh vaengah balae ka saii vetih n'hip vaengah amah te metlam ol ka mael eh?
Bungko khuiah kai aka saii loh anih a saii moenih a? Kaimih he bung khuiah pakhat la n'cuen sak.
tattloel kah kongaih te ka hloh pah tih nuhmai mik te ka khah sak koinih,
Kamah buhkam te kamah bueng loh ka caak tih cadah loh ca pawt koinih,
Ka camoe lamloh napa bangla ka taengah pantai tih nuhmai khaw a nu bung lamloh ka mawt.
Pueinak mueh tih himbai tling la aka milh khodaeng te ka hmuh mai tih,
A pumpu, a pumpu ah kai n'uem uh vaengah ka tu mul neh ka hlung pawt mai koinih,
Vongka ah kai bomkung te ka hmuh vaengah ka kut he cadah soah ka ka thueng atah,
ka laengpang he a hnuk lamloh rhul saeh lamtah ka ban a cung dong lamloh tlawt mai saeh.
Pathen taengkah rhainah te kai ham ka birhihnah la a om dongah a boeimangnah te ka noeng moenih.
Sui te ka uepnah la ka khueh tih sui cilh te ka pangtungnah la ka thui koinih,
Ka thadueng len tih ka kut loh a khuet la a hmuh dongah ka kokhahnah atah,
Vangnah dongah a thangthen tih hla vang a thoeih te ka hmuh vaengah,
ka lungbuei he yinhnuk ah hloih tih ka kut loh ka ka te mok koinih.
He khaw a so kah Pathen taengah ka basa la om vetih thaesainah lai la om ni.
Ka lunguet kah yoethaenah dongah ka kohoe tih yoethae loh anih taengla a thoeng te ka haenghang puei atah,
A hinglu te thaephoeinah neh hoe hamla ka ka he laihmu la ka khueh aih moenih.
Ka dap kah hlang rhoek loh, “U long nim a maeh te a cung pawt la a paek eh?” a ti uh moenih a?
Ka thohkhaih kah yinlai te caehlong ka ong pah tih vongvoel ah a rhaeh moenih.
Hlang bangla ka boekoeknah ka dah tih, kai kathaesainah he ka thindang ah ka det mai akhaw,
hlangping te yet taengah ka sarhing tih huiko kah nueihbu loh kai n'rhihyawp sak. Te dongah ka kuemsuem tih thohka la ka moe pawh.
Kai taengkah aka hnatun la kamah taengah u long nim m'paek lah mako? Ka kutha he Tlungthang loh kai n'doo saeh lamtah ka tuituknah he hlang loh cabu la daek saeh.
Te te ka laengpang ah ka koh vetih te te ka soah rhuisam la ka laikoeinah het mahpawt nim?
Ka khokan tarhing la a taengah ka puen lah vetih anih te rhaengsang bangla ka paan lah mako.
Ka khohmuen loh kai m'pang thil tih a kong te rhenten rhap koinih,
A thadueng te tangka mueh la ka caak tih a kungmah kah hinglu ka yawn sak atah,
Cang yueng la mutlo hling, cangtun yueng la saeldol khaw poe saeh,” a ti. Job kah ol bawt coeng.
Amah mikhmuh ah amah te a dueng sak dongah te rhoek hlang pathum Job a doo te kangkuen uh.
Te dongah Ram koca kah Buzi Barakel capa Elihu kah a thintoek tah Job taengah sai coeng. Pathen lakah amah hinglu te a tang sak dongah a thintoek khaw sai.
Hlatnah hmu uh pawt dae Job te a boe sak uh dongah anih kah thintoek khaw a hui pathum taengah sai van.
Amih boeih khuiah Elihu tah a kum la a ham dongah Job te ol neh a rhing.
Hlang pathum ka dongah hlatnah a om pawt te Elihu a hmuh vaengah a thintoek te sai.
Te dongah Buzi Barakel capa Elihu loh a doo tih, “Kai he a kum la ka noe tih nangmih tah na ham. Te dongah ka kawl uh tih nangmih taengah kamah kah poeknah thui ham khaw ka rhih.
Cueihnah he a khohnin nen khaw a thui uh vetih kum a yet a tukkil uh mako ka ti.
Mueihla he hlanghing ah om dae Tlungthang hiil long ni amih a yakming sak.
Muep aka cueih neh patong rhoek loh khaw laitloeknah te a yakming uh moenih.
Te dongah kai taengkah hnatun uh lah ka ti. Kai khaw ka poeknah ka thui van eh.
Nangmih ol te ka lamtawn ne. Olthui na khe uh vaengah nangmih kah lungcuei te hna ka kaeng thil.
Nangmih khaw kan yakming vaengah Job taengkah a tluung ol te aka doo na om uh moenih he.
“Cueihnah m'hmuh coeng, anih te hlang pawt tih Pathen loh khoek saeh,” ti uh ve.
Olthui neh kai taengah rhong a pai pawt dongah nangmih ol neh anih te ka thuung mahpawh,” a ti nah.
Amih lamkah ol khaw vawt uh tih, a rhihyawp uh dongah koep doo uh pawh.
Koep doo mueh la pai uh tih a cal uh pawt dongah ka lamtawn aya?
Kai khaw kamah hamsum te ka doo vetih kai khaw kamah kah poeknah te ka thui van ni.
Olthui khaw ka hah tih ka bungko kah mueihla loh kamah n'kilh coeng.
Ka bungko he misurtui bangla khui pawt tih tui-um thai bangla ueth.
Ka thui daengah ni kai ham a hoengpoek eh. Ka hmuilai ka ong vetih ka doo pueng ni.
Hlang maelhmai te ka dan tarha pawt vetih hlang te ka hlae tarha mahpawh.
Hlang hlae ham khaw ka ming moenih, kai aka saii loh kai he phawn n'khoe lah ve.
Job, ka olthui hnatun dae lamtah ka ol boeih he hnakaeng thil laeh.
Ka ka ong coeng he. Ka ka khuikah ka lai loh a thui.
Ka ol he ka lungbuei dueng lamkah tih ka hmuilai kah mingnah loh cimphan la a thui.
Pathen Mueihla loh kai n'saii tih Tlungthang kah hiil loh kai n'hing sak.
Kai thuung hamla na coeng mak atah tawn uh lamtah ka mikhmuh ah pai laeh.
Pathen taengah kai he nang ka bangla ka om tih kai khaw dikpo lamkah ni m'pet.
Kai he mueirhih moenih nang n'let sak mako. Ka kut long khaw nang n'nan thil mahpawh.
Tedae ka hna ah na thui tih olthui ol khaw ka yaak.
“Ka cil tih boekoek ka khueh moenih. Ka caih tih kai taengah thaesainah om moenih.
Te cakhaw kai taengkah noihhainah a hmuh vaengah kai amah kah thunkha bangla a moeh.
Ka kho he hloong dongah a buen tih ka caehlong boeih a dawn,” na ti.
Tedae na tang moenih he. Pathen he hlanghing lakah a len dongah nang te kan doo.
Balae tih amah te na ho. A ol te boeih n'doo moenih ta.
Pathen loh pakhat la a thui dae a hmuhming pawt atah hnavoei la a thui.
Ih loh hlang a hnah vaengkah khoyin olphong mueimang ah khaw, thingkong dongkah a ngam vaengah khaw,
Hlang hna te a khui sak tih amih kah rhalrhingnah neh a daeng pah.
Hlang loh a khoboe lamkah a nong sak tih hlang lamkah koevoeinah a khuk pah.
A hinglu te vaam khui lamloh, a hingnah te pumcumnah loh a paan khui lamkah a hoeptlang.
A thingkong dongah nganboh neh a tluung tih tuituknah loh a rhuhrhong boeih te phat a thuek pah.
A hingnah loh buh te khaw a hinglu loh hoehhamnah maeh khaw a lawt pah.
A saa te caphoei cuk bangla mueihmuh ah a khah tih a rhuh a hmuh pawt khaw a ming sak.
A hinglu loh vaam khuila, a hingnah te aka duek rhoek taengla pawk.
Anih kah duengnah te hlang taengah aka puen la thawngkhat lamkah pakhat ngawn tah amah taengah puencawn oldoe om khaming.
Te dongah anih te a rhen mai vetih, 'Tlansum ka dang tih hlan kah aka suntla khui lamloh anih he doek laeh,’ ti mai koinih.
A saa te camoe bangla noe vetih a cacawn tue vaengkah bangla saibawn suidae.
Pathen taengah a thangthui vanbangla anih te a moeithen ta. A maelhmai te tamlung neh a hmuh vaengah tah anih te hlanghing taengah duengnah neh a mael sak.
Hlang rhoek taengla a mae tih, “Ka tholh tih a thuem te a paihaeh sak dae kai taengah n'yook sak moenih.
Kamah hinglu, hinglu van tah hlan a paan khui lamloh a lat. Te dongah ka hingnah neh a hingnah loh vangnah te hmu saeh.
He boeih he Pathen loh hlang taengah voei nit voei thum a saii ne.
Hlan khui lamkah a hinglu te hingnah khosae neh tue hamla a mael sak.
Job nang hnatung lamtah kai ol he hnatun. Hilphah lamtah kai loh kan thui eh.
Kai nan thuung ham ol a om atah thui lah. Nang tang sak ham ka ngaih dongah ni.
Kai taengkah he na hnatun pawt atah hilphah lamtah nang te cueihnah kan cang sak bitni,” a ti nah.
Elihu loh koep a doo tih,
Aka cueih rhoek ka ol hnatun uh lamtah aka ming rhoek loh kai taengla hnakaeng uh.
Hna loh olthui a nuemnai tih lai loh caak te a ten.
Tiktamnah te mamih ham coelh uh sih lamtah a then te mamih lakli ah ming uh sih.
Job loh,'Ka tang lalah Pathen loh ka tiktamnah a hnawt.
Ka tiktamnah khaw ka laithae bang mai la boekoeknah pawt mai ah ka thaltang loh rhawp coeng,’ a ti.
Tui bangla tamdaengnah aka o Job bang hlang he om nim.
Boethae aka saii neh rhoihui bangla yiin tih halang hlang rhoek taengah khaw pongpa.
'Pathen taengah a ngaingaih vaengah hlang hmaiben pawh,’ a ti.
Te dongah thinko aka khueh hlang rhoek loh kai taengah hnatun uh. Halangnah he Pathen lamloh savisava tih Tlungthang he dumlai neh savisava coeng.
Hlang kah bisai he amah taengla a thuung tih hlang a caehlong bangla amah loh a hmuh.
Pathen tah boe tueng pawt tih Tlungthang loh tiktamnah te a khun sak moenih.
Amah loh diklai ah unim a khueh tih lunglai he a pum la u taengah nim a tloeng.
Amah taengkah loh a khueh a lungbuei, a mueihla neh a hiil te amah taengla khoem koinih,
Pumsa boeih he rhenten pal vetih hlang he laipi la mael ni.
Yakmingnah a om atah he he hnatun lamtah ka olthui ol he hnakaeng lah.
Tiktamnah aka thiinah aisat loh a ngoldoelh tih aka dueng khuet loh m'boe sak aya?
Manghai te,'hlang muen,’ hlangcong te 'Halang,’ a ti nah nim?
Amah loh mangpa maelhmai dan pawt tih tattloel maelhmai lakah rhoeikhang kah a hmat tloe moenih. Amih boeih te amah kut dongah kutngo ni.
Mikhaptok ah a duek dongah pilnam khoyin pathung ah tuen tih khum uh. Kut nen pawt akhaw aka lueng a khoe uh.
A mik te hlang kah longpuei dongah a khueh tih a khokan boeih te a hmuh.
Boethae aka saii rhoek thuh hamla hmaisuep om pawt tih dueknah hlipkhup khaw a om moenih.
Pathen taengkah laitloeknah dongla a pha ham coeng dongah hlang te koep a cae moenih.
Aka khuet khenah a om pawt ah a phaek tih amih yueng la a tloe a khueh.
Amih kah khoboe te a hmat dongah khoyin ah a maelh tih pop uh.
Halang rhoek ham tah hmuh nah hmuen ah amih te kut a paeng thil.
Te dongah ni a hnuk lamloh nong uh tangloeng tih a longpuei boeih te cangbam uh pawh.
tattloel kah pangngawlnah te a taengla pawk tih mangdaeng kah pangngawlnah a yaak.
Tedae amah te mong tih ulong a boe sak. Maelhmai a thuh vaengah ulong anih a mae? Tedae namtom so neh hlang khat soah khaw rhenten om ta.
Lailak hlang a manghai khaw pilnam ham hlaeh la poeh.
Pathen taengah tah,'Ka laikoi pawt khaw ka phueih.
Nang kam hmuh pawt ah kai nan thuinuet coeng. Dumlai ka saii mai cakhaw ka koei voel boel eh?,’ a ti nama thui coeng.
Na hnawt coeng dongah te kah te namah taeng lamloh na thuung aya? Namah loh na coelh coeng, kai long moenih. Te dongah na ming te thui to.
Thinko aka khueh hlang rhoek loh kai taengah thui uh lamtah hlang cueih loh kai taengkah he hnatun saeh.
Job he mingnah neh cal pawt tih a ol long a cangbam moenih.
A pa nae, boethae hlang kah taikhaih dongah Job loh a yoeyah la loepdak saeh.
A tholhnah te mamih laklo ah boekoek neh a koei uh tih kut a paeng dongah Pathen taengah a ol pung,” a ti.
Elihu loh koep a doo tih,
“'Patheni lakah kamah duengnah ngai,’ na ti te tiktamnah la na poek a te?
'Ka tholhnah lamloh nang hamla balae a hmaiben tih balae a hoeikhang,’ na ti.
Namah neh na taengkah na hui rhoek kah olthui te ka thuung eh.
Vaan ke paelki lamtah hmu van lah. Nang lakah aka sang khomong ke dan lah.
Na tholh koinih amah te metlam a ben eh? Na boekoeknah pungtai koinih amah taengah balae a saii eh.
Na tang atah amah taengah balae na paek? Na kut lamloh balae a loh?
Nang bang, na halangnah khaw hlang ham tih na duengnah khaw hlang capa ham ni.
Hnaemtaeknah cungkuem hmuiah aka tlung bantha lamloh bombih hamla pang uh.
Tedae, “Kai aka saii tih khoyin ah laa aka pae Pathen te ta?
Diklai rhamsa lakah mamih n'cang puei tih vaan kah vaa lakah mamih n'cueih sak,’ a ti moenih.
Pang uh pahoi cakhaw boethae rhoek kah hoemdamnah hmai ah tah a doo moenih.
Patheni loh a poeyoek la hnatun pawt tih Tlungthang long khaw a hmuhming moenih.
A hmuhming pawt tih na thui vaeng aisat, dumlai pataeng amah mikhmuh ah a pha dongah amah mah rhingda laeh.
Tedae a thintoek te cawh voel pawt oeh coeng tih halangnah te khaw ming voel pawh.
Job loh a honghi la a ka a ang tih mingnah om pawt ah a olthui yet,” a ti.
Elihu loh koep a cong tih,
“Kamah taengah bet m'bulbo uh lamtah nangmih te olthui khaw Pathen yueng la koep kan thui eh.
Ka poeknah he khohla lamloh kam phueih tih duengnah he kai aka saii ham ni ka khueh.
Ka olthui he a honghi pawt dongah nang taengkah lungming khaw a cuemthuek ham tueng pai.
Pathen tah khuet tih lungbuei thadueng a khuet te a sit moenih ne.
Halang te hlun pawt tih mangdaeng te tiktamnah la a paek.
A mik te hlangdueng taeng lamloh khap pawt tih manghai rhoek te ngolkhoel dongah a ngol sak. Te phoeiah amih a yoeyah la a thuung tih a sang sak.
Tedae hmaipom neh pin uh tih phacip phabaem rhuihet neh a tuuk uh atah,
Amih kah bisai neh a boekoeknah dongah a len uh te khaw amih taengah a thui pah.
Thuituennah hamla amih hna te a vueh pah tih boethae lamloh mael hamla a thui pah.
A hnatun uh tih tho a thueng koinih a khohnin then neh thok tih a kum te a naepnoi la boeih.
Tedae a hnatun uh pawt atah pumcumnah neh a paan uh vetih mingnah aka tal bangla pal uh ni.
Lungbuei lailak rhoek loh thintoek a khueh uh tih amih a khih vaengah pataeng bomnah bih pawh.
Amih hinglu te camoe la, a hingnah khaw hlanghalh lakli ah duek.
A phacip phabaem vaengah mangdaeng khaw a pumcum sak tih a hna te nennah neh a toeh.
Rhal ka lamloh hmuenka la nang m'poh. Te lam te mangdaeng mangtok om pawt tih na caboei dongkah mongnah maehhloi ngang.
Halang kah dumlai khaw na cung sak tih dumlai neh laitloeknah loh m'moep.
Kosi loh nang te boeinah neh m'vuet ve ne. Te dongah tlansum cungkuem loh nang m'phaelh boel.
Rhal khuiah pawt khaw, na bombihnah neh thadueng, thayung boeih loh m'khoembael aya?
A hmuikah pilnam a khum sak ham khoyin khaw hloem aih boeh.
Ngaithuen, boethae taengla mael boeh. Te te phacip phabaem lakah te na tuek coeng te.
Pathen tah amah thadueng neh thaphoh uh coeng ke. Amah bangla unim aka saya?
Anih ham a longpuei te u long nim a tae pah tih u long nim, 'Dumlai na saii,’ a ti nah.
Amah kah bisai na rhoeng sak ham te poek. Te ni hlang rhoek loh a hlai uh.
Hlang boeih loh te te a hmuh uh tih hlanghing loh khohla lamkah a paelki.
Pathen tah a len dongah a kum tarhing te m'ming uh lek pawt tih khenah lek pawh.
Tui dongkah aangpi a yoek tih khotlan te a tuihu lamloh a ciil.
Khomong khaw cip tih hlang soah muep pha.
Khomai maiyan neh a dungtlungim kah pang ol a yakming mai ngawn.
A vangnah loh a taengah a kah tih tuitunli yung duela a khuk.
Te nen te pilnam taengah lai a tloek tih a yet taengah caak a paek.
A kut dongkah vangnah loh a khuk tih phek a cuuk ham khaw te te a uen.
A khohum loh amah kawng te a doek tih boiva pataeng thintoek neh cet.
He dongah ka lungbuei lakueng tih a hmuen lamloh cungpet.
A ol dongkah khoponah te hnatun hnatun. A ka lamloh caitawknah thoeng.
Vaan boeih hmuiah a hlah tih a vangnah loh diklai hmoi duela pawk.
A hnukkah a kawk ol khaw a hoemdamnah ol neh hum tih a ol a yaak vaengah rhaek uelh sak boeh.
Pathen loh a ol neh khobaerhambae a saii khungdaeng tih hum dae m'ming uh moenih.
Vuelsong neh khotlan khonal te, 'Diklai ah om saeh,’ a ti vaengah khotlan khonal khaw a sarhi tak.
Amah kutngo hlang boeih ming sak ham hlang boeih kah kut te rhodaek a soei pah.
Te vaengah mulhing khaw a khui la kun tih a khuisaek ah kho a sak.
Cangpalam te imkhui lamloh, khosik te tlangpuei lamloh ha thoeng.
Pathen kah hiil lamloh rhaelnu khaw a khueh tih tui daang mangdaeng mangtok la om.
Khomai te cingtui loh a rhih sak tih cingmai loh amah kah vangnah te a taekyak.
Te khaw diklai kah lunglai hman ah a uen boeih te saii hamla a niing, a niing dongah kuluk la a hil.
Te te caitueng lam khaw, a khohmuen ham khaw, sitlohnah ham khaw a thoeng sak.
Job, he he hnakaeng lah. Pai lamtah Pathen kah khobaerhambae he yakming lah.
Te rhoek soah Pathen loh a khueh tih a cingmai kah vangnah a sae te na ming a?
Poeknah rhuemtuet, mangvawt khomai a haainah te na ming a?
Tuithim loh khohmuen a mong sak vaengah na himbai te aka bae sak,
Hmaidan a hlawn bangla khomong a thah la amah taengah na nulh thai aya?
Amah taengah metla n'thui ham khaw kaimih tueng lah. Hmaisuep hmai ah n'tawn uh thai pawt oe.
Hlang loh a dolh hamla thui cakhaw ka thui bangla amah taengah a tae pa aya?
Tahae ah khaw vangnah a hmuh uh moenih. A aa te khohli loh a yawn tih a caihcil hnukkah khomong dongah tueng.
Tlangpuei lamkah sui te mueithennah rhih om Pathen taengla pawk.
Tlungthang te thadueng a len dongah a tiktamnah m'hmuh lek moenih. Duengnah khaw a cungkuem dongah hlang a phaep moenih.
Hlang rhoek loh amah te a rhih uh tangloeng dongah lungbuei aka cueih rhoek takuem khaw a sawt moenih,” a ti.
BOEIPA loh Job te hlipuei khui lamloh a doo tih,
Mingnah aka tal olthui neh cilsuep aka hmuep sak te unim?
Hlang bangla na pumpu yen lamtah nang kan dawt bangla kai he n'tueng laeh.
Diklai ka suen vaengah melam na om? Yakmingnah na ming atah thui lah.
U loh a khodang a khueh khaw na ming van nim? A soah rhilam aka yueng khaw unim?
A buenhol te me dongah nim a buen tih, a bangkil lung te unim aka thuinuet?
Mincang aisi rhoek rhenten tamhoe uh tih Pathen ca rhoek boeih yuhui uh.
Tuitunli te a bung lamloh a poh tih a coe vaengah thohkhaih neh a tlaeng.
Kai loh cingmai kah a pueinak neh anih kah yinnah hni khaw ka khueh pah.
Ka oltlueh he anih ham ka tlueh pah tih thohkalh neh thohkhaih khaw ka khueh pah.
He hil ka ti vaengah ha mop lamtah koei boeh. Na hoemdamnah tuiphu te he ah he khueh laeh.
Namah tue vaengah mincang ke na uen a? Khothaih ke na ming tih amah hmuen ah khothaih a om khaw na ming.
Te lamkah halang rhoek khoek ham neh diklai hmoi a tuuk sak ham khaw.
Dikpo kutbuen bangla poehlip tih pueinak bangla pai.
Halang rhoek te amamih kah vangnah a hloh pah tih ban a thueng khaw a tlawt sak.
Tuitunli kah tuiput la na pawk tih tuidung kah khenah dongah na pongpa vai a?
Nang taengah dueknah vongka rhoek ah uh tih dueknah hlipkhup vongka te na hmuh a?
Diklai hmuenka duela na yakming nim? A cungkuem la na ming atah thui lah.
Vangnah aka om longpuei he menim? Hmaisuep kah a hmuen he melae?
Te te amah khorhi la na thak van tih a im kah a hawn khaw na yakming van nim?
Nang n'sak tih na khohnin kah a tarhing a puh daengah ni na ming pueng.
Vuelsong thakvoh khuila na kun tih rhaelnu thakvoh na hmuh a?
Te te rhal tue vaengkah ham khaw, caemrhal neh caemtloek tue vaengkah ham khaw ka tuem pueng.
Diklai ah kanghawn loh a taekyak tih, vangnah loh a tael longpuei te menim?
Tuilong lungpook ham neh rhaek ol ham longpuei aka tael te unim?
A khuiah tongpa aka om pawh khosoek neh hlang aka tal khohmuen ah khaw rhotui aka tlan sak la,
khohli rhamrhael neh imrhong aka hah sak la, toitlim annoe aka poe sak la om coeng.
Khotlan te a napa om a? Buemtui tuicip te ulong a sak?
Rhaelnu he u kah bungko lamkah nim a thoeng tih, vaan vueltling te ulong a sak?
Tui khaw lungto bangla thuh uh tih tuidung hman ah khal.
Airhitbom kah omngaih omloe te na hlaengtang tih buhol phueihrhui khaw na hlawt thai aya?
Mazzaroth aisi te amah tue vaengah na thoeng sak tih Ayish aisi te a ca rhoek neh na mawt a?
Vaan kah khosing te na ming atah amah kah laithuithainah te diklai ah na khueh a?
Na ol te khomai dongla na huel thai tih tuili tui te na khuk thai a?

Ka Pathen aw ka thunkha rhoek kut lamkah kai n'huul lah. Kai aka tlai thil rhoek kut lamkah kai n'hoeptlang lah.

Te vaengah Boeipa loh aka ip muelh bangla, misurtui neh aka tamhoe hlangrhalh bangla haenghang.
A rhal rhoek te tloep a tloek tih amih te kumhal kokhahnah la a khueh.
Joseph kah dap khaw a hnawt tih Ephraim kah mancai te a tuek tloe moenih.
Tedae a lungnah Zion tlang kah Judah mancai te a tuek.
Te dongah a rhokso te a sang la a sak tih kumhal due diklai bangla a suen.
A sal David te a tuek dongah boiva vongup lamkah a loh.
A pilnam Jakob neh a rho Israel te luem puei ham ni anih te cacun hnuk lamkah a khuen.
Te dongah a thinko neh amih te a luem puei tih, a kut kah a lungcuei neh a mawt.
Pathen aw, namtom rhoek loh na rho a kun uh thil tih, na bawkim cim te a poeih uh. Jerusalem te lairhok bangla a khueh uh.
Na sal rhoek kah a rhok te vaan kah vaa taengah, na hlangcim rhoek kah a saa te diklai mulhing taengah cakok la a paek uh.
Amih thii te Jerusalem kaepvai ah tui bangla a hawk uh tih aka up om pawh.
Kaimih he imben rhoek kah kokhahnah, ka taengvai kah tamdaengnah neh soehsalnah la ka om uh.
BOEIPA aw me hil nim na thin a toek ve? Na thatlainah te hmai bangla rhong yoeyah aya?
Nang aka ming pawh namtom rhoek so neh na ming aka khue mueh ram soah na kosi hawk thil lah.
Jakob te a yoop uh tih a tolkhoeng te a pong sakuh.
Lamhm a kathaesainah a rho kaimih taengah thoelh boel lamtah dikdik ka tlayae uh dongah na haidamnah kaimih koe n'doe uh saeh.
Kaimih kah daemnah Pathen aw na thangpomnah ming ham kaimih m'bom dae. Na ming kongah kaimih n'huul lamtah kaimih kah tholhnah te han dawth dae.
Balae tih namtom rhoek loh, A Pathen khaw melae?,” a ti uh eh. Na sal rhoek kah thii aka hawk namtom taengah tawnlohnah loh kaimih mikhmuh ah aka thoeng te namtom rhoek loh ming uh saeh.
Thongtl a kah a kiinah loh namah taengla ha pawk saeh. Dueknah cadil rhoek te na boeilennah bantha neh sueng sak.
Te vaengah kaimih kah imben rhoek te voeirhih la thuung lah. A kodang ah amih kah kokhahnah neh Boeipa namah ni m'veet uh coeng te.
Te dongah na pilnam kaimih neh na rhamtlim kah boiva long tah, namah te kumhal duela kan uem uh ni. Cadilcahma neh cadilcahma hil nang koehnah te ka tae uh ni.
Israel aka dawn loh hnatun lah. Boiva bangla Joseph aka hmaithawn tih cherubim aka ngol loh ha sae lah.
Ephraim, Benjamin neh Manasseh mikhmuh ah na thayung thamal te huel lamtah, kaimih kah khangnah ham halo lah.
Pathen aw kaimih nan lat tih, na maelhmai a sae daengah ni ka daem uh eh.
Caempuei Pathen BOEIPA me hil nim, na pilnam kah thangthuinah te na khuu thil eh?
Amih te mikphi buh na cah tih baelpuei mikphi na tul.
Ka imben rhoek ham olpungkacan la kaimih nan khueh tih ka thunkha rhoek loh n'tamdaeng uh.
Caempuei Pathen aw kaimih nan lat tih na maelhmai a sae daengah ni ka daem uh eh.
Egypt lamkah nang khuen misur te namtom na haek phoeiah na phung.
A mikhmuh ah hmuen na saelh pah tih a yung a hlak dongah khohmuen ah baetawt.
A hlip loh tlang tom a dah tih a hlaeng loh lamphai thingnu a yam thil.
A pae loh tuitunli duela, a dawn long khaw tuiva duela a voeih.
A vongtung te a ba ham nim na phae tih long kah aka pongpa boeih loh a bit uh?
Duup lamkah okngal loh a thoe tih kohong kah satlung loh a luem thil.
Caempuei Pathen aw, ha mael laeh. Misur he vaan lamloh paelki lah, so lamtah hip lah.
Na bantang kut neh a yung te na phung tih namah ham a ca na hlul sak.
Hmai neh a hoeh tih a vung. Na mikhmuh kah tluungnah dongah milh uh.
Na bantang hlang so neh namah ham na thoh hlang capa soah na kut tloeng lah.
Te daengah ni nang taeng lamkah ka balkhong uh pawt eh. Kaimih he nan hlun daengah ni na ming te kang khue uh eh.
Caempuei Pathen Yahweh kaimih nan lat tih na maelhmai a sae daengah ni ka daem uh eh.

Mamih kah sarhi Pathen taengah tamhoe uh lamtah Jakob Pathen taengah yuhui uh lah.
Oldi te phoh uh lamtah kamrhing rhotoeng neh dingsuek thangpa tum uh.
Hlasae, hlalum vaengkah mamih khotue hnin ah tuki te ueng uh lah.
Hekah he Israel ham Jakob Pathen kah laitloeknah oltlueh coeng ni.
Ka yakming mueh ol, Egypt kho la a caeh vaengah Joseph ham a khueh olphong ni.
A laengpang dongkah hnorhih te ka khoe pah tih a kut khaw voh khui lamkah loeih.
Citcai khuiah nan khue tih nang kan pumcum sak. Khohum hlip lamkah nang kan doo tih Meribah tui ah nang kan loep kan dak. Selah
Ka pilnam loh hnatun lamtah kai ol te na hnatun atah Israel nang taengah ka laipai ni.
Na khuiah rhalawt pathen om boel saeh lamtah kholong pathen te bawk boeh.
Kai tah Egypt kho lamkah nang aka doek na Pathen Yahweh ni. Na ka ang lamtah kan hah sak eh.
Tedae ka pilnam loh ka ol he ya pawt tih Israel loh kai taengah naep pawh.
Te dongah amih te lungbuei thinthahnah taengla ka hlah tih amih kah cilkhih dongah pongpa uh.
Ka pilnam loh kai taengah hnatang koinih ka longpuei te Israel loh a vai sui dae.
A thunkha rhoek te a loe la ka kunyun sak vetih a rhal te ka kut neh ka thuung pah suidae.
BOEIPA kah a lunguet rhoek loh anih taengah mai a tum uh vetih amih kah khohnin khaw kumhal duela puh suidae.
Tedae cang tha te anih a cah suitih lungpang khui lamkah khoitui nang kang kum sak sue.

Pathen tah Pathen kah hlangboel khuiah pai tih pathen rhoek lakli ah lai a tloek.
Me hil nim dumlai na tang sak uh vetih halang rhoek kah maelhmai na dan uh ve? Selah
Tattloel neh cadah te laitloek pah lamtah mangdaeng neh aka vawtthoek te tang sak.
Tattloel neh khodaeng te hlawt lamtah halang rhoek kut khui lamkah huul lah.
Tamyin khuiah pongpa uh tih diklai kah a yung boeih a tuen khaw ming uh pawt tih yakming uh pawh.
Nangmih tah pathen rhoek neh Khohni ca rhoek ni. Nangmih boeih taengah kamah loh ka thui coeng.
Tedae hlang bangla na duek uh vetih mangpa pakhat bangla na cungku uh ni.
Namtom rhoek boeih te namah loh na pang coeng dongah Pathen aw thoo lamtah diklai he laitloek thil laeh.
Pathen aw, nang taengah dingsueknah tal nim. Pathen aw omlip boel lamtah mong boeh.
Na thunkha rhoek loh hue a sak tih na lunguet rhoek loh lu a dangrhoek uh soeh ke.
Na pilnam te baecenol neh muet uh tih na khoem rhoek taengah uento uh thae.
Anmih vik loh, “Halo uh lamtah namtom bangla amih ke thup sih. Te daengah ni Israel ming a thoelh uh voel pawt eh?,” a ti uh.
Nang kah a voel ah lungbuei thikat la toidal uh thae tih moi aka bop rhoek tah,
Edom dap rhoek neh Moab Ishmael, Hagri,
Gebal, Ammon, Philistia Amalek, neh Tyre kah khosa hmaih rhoek,
Amih te Assyria loh a koei pataeng tih Lot koca ham bantha la coeng uh. Selah
Amih te Kishon soklong kah Midian, Sisera neh Jabin bangla saii lah.
Endor ah mitmoeng uh tih diklai ah aek la poeh uh.
Amih kah hlangcong rhoek te Oreb neh Zeeb, Zebah bangla, a boeimang boeih te Zalmunna bangla khueh lah.
Amih loh, “Pathen kah toitlim te mamih ham huul uh sih,” a ti uh.
Ka Pathen aw amih te humhae bangla, khohli hmai kah divawt bangla khueh lah.
Hmai loh duup a dom tih hmaisai loh tlang a hlawp bangla han coeng sak.
Amih te na hlipuei neh hloem van lamtah amih te na cangpalam neh let sak lah.
Amih maelhmai te yah bai lamtah BOEIPA nang ming te toem uh saeh.
Amih te yahpok uh saeh lamtah let uh saeh. A yoeyah la a hmai tal uh saeh lamtah milh uh saeh.
Te dongah diklai pum ah nang tah na ming Yahweh tih, namah bueng te Sangkoek tila ming uh saeh.

Caempuei BOEIPA namah kah tolhmuen tah, lungnah kap tloe pai o!
BOEIPA kah vongup te ka hinglu loh a ngaidam tih thana sut. Ka lungbuei neh ka pumsa loh aka hing Pathen te a tamhoe thil.
Ka manghai neh ka Pathen, caempuei BOEIPA mamah kah hmueihtuk taengah vaa long pataeng im a hmuh tih pumpil loh amah vapuel ham bu a khueh pah.
Nang im kah kho aka sa rhoek a yoethen pai tih, namah te rhawp n'thangthen uh. Selah
Nang dongah a sarhi aka khueh tih, a thinko ah longpuei aka khui hlang tah a yoethen.
Baca kol ah aka pongpa loh tuisih a khueh tih, lobah yoethennah khaw a buem.
Tha dueng khui lamkah thadueng neh cet uh. Zion kah Pathen hmaiah phoe.
Ka thangthuinah he caempuei Pathen BOEIPA loh ya saeh lamtah, Jakob Pathen loh hnatun saeh. Selah
Pathen aw kaimih kah photling he hmu lamtah na koelh hlang kah maelhmai khaw paelki lah.
Na vongup khuikah hnin at he khohnin thawngkhat lakah then. Ka Pathen im kah thohka tawt he, halangnah dap kah om lakah ka ngaih.
BOEIPA Pathen tah khomik neh photling la om. Mikdaithen neh thangpomnah he khaw BOEIPA loh a paek. Cuemthuek dongah aka pongpa taengah hnothen a hloh pah moenih.
Caempuei BOEIPA namah dongah, aka pangtung hlang tah a yoethen pai.

BOEIPA namah loh khohmuen he na moeithen tih Jakob khuikah thongtla thongtla te na hlawt.
Na pilnam kathaesainah na phueih pah tih, amih kah tholhnah boeih na dah pah. Selah
Na thinpom te boeih na rhoe tih thintoek thinsa te na hnop.
Kaimih kah khangnah Pathen aw kaimih he koep n'thoh lamtah kaimih taengkah na konoinah te dip sak laeh.
Kumhal duela kaimih taengah na thintoek vetih, cadilcahma phoeikah cadilcahma duela na thintoek na yueng aya?
Na mael mahpawt nim? Kaimih nan hing sak vetih na pilnam loh namah dongah a kohoe mako.
BOEIPA namah kah sitlohnah te kaimih n'tueng lamtah na khangnah te kaimih taengah m'pae lah.
A pilnam taeng neh a hlangcim taengah ngaimongnah a thui dongah BOEIPA Pathen loh a thui te ni ka hnatun eh. Tedae anglatnah la mael boel saeh.
Kaimih kho khuiah thangpomnah rhaehrhong sak ham amah aka rhih taengah BOEIPA kah khangnah te rhep yoei sak lah.
Sitlohnah neh uepomnah loh humcui rhoi tih duengnah neh rhoepnah loh mok uh rhoi.
Diklai lamkah uepomnah poe tih vaan lamkah duengnah loh a sawt.
BOEIPA loh hnothen a paek dongah mamih kah khohmuen loh cangpai a khueh bal ni.
Duengnah te a mikhmuh ah cet tih a khokan ham longpuei a khueh pah.

BOEIPA aw kai he ka mangdaeng tih ka khodaeng oeh dongah na hna kaeng lamtah kai n'doo dae.
Kai tah ka cim dongah ka hinglu he hang ngaithuen dae. Ka Pathen namah dongah ka pangtung vanbangla namah loh na sal he n'khang dae.
Ka Boeipa nang te hnin takuem kang khue coeng dongah kai he n'rhen lah.
Ka Boeipa nang taengah ka hinglu neh ka dangrhoek coeng dongah na sal kah hinglu he kohoe sak lah.
Ka Boeipa tah na then tih na kamyawm dongah ni, nang aka khue boeih taengah sitlohnah yet.
BOEIPA aw, ka thangthuinah he hnatun lamtah ka huithuinah ol he hnatung lah.
Kai nan doo ham ni ka citcai hnin ah nang kang khue.
Pathen rhoek khuiah ka Boeipa namah bang he om pawt tih namah kah bibi bang khaw om pawh.
Na saii namtom boeih te halo uh vetih ka Boeipa namah mikhmuh ah bakop uh ni. Te vaengah na ming te a thangpom uh ni.
Namah te na tanglue coeng dongah khobaerhambae aka saii khaw Pathen namah bueng ni na om.
BOEIPA aw na longpuei te kai n'thuinuet lamtah na oltak dongah ka pongpa lah eh. Na ming rhih ham ka thinko saicin sak lah.
Ka Boeipa ka Pathen namah te ka thinko boeih neh kan uem vetih kumhal duela na ming ka thangpom ni.
Na sitlohnah loh kai ham len tih saelkhui hmui lamkah ka hinglu na huul.
Pathen aw thinlen rhoek loh kai n'thoh thil uh tih rhaengpuei hlanghaeng loh ka hinglu mae uh cakhaw amih hmai kah namah a hmaitang uh moenih.
Ka Boeipa nang tah thinphoei neh lungvatnah dongah thintoek aka ueh tih sitlohnah neh uepomnah aka baetawt Pathen la na om.
Kai taengla ha mael lamtah kai rhen lah. Na sarhi te na sal taengah pae lamtah na salnu kah a ca te khang lah.
Hno then kah miknoek te kai taengah saii lamtah ka lunguet rhoek loh hmu uh saeh. BOEIPA namah loh kai nan bom tih ka hal coeng dongah amih te yak uh saeh.

Te dongah ka tuisih boeih loh namah dongah lamcawn bangla hlai uh thae.

Kai he a laedil kah tangrhom ah, khohmuep ah, a cok ah nan khueh.
Na kosi te kai soah na tloeng tih na tuiphu tom neh nan phaep.

Nang kah sitlohnah te phuel khuiah, na uepomnah te Abaddon ah a thui aya?

BOEIPA aw ba dongah nim ka hinglu he na hlahpham tih kai taeng lamkah na maelhmai na thuh mai?
Kai mangdaeng he ka camoe lamkah ka pal coeng. Nang taengkah mueirhih ka phueih tih ka ngaidaeng.
Na thinsa loh kai soah n'khuk tih namah kah hihhamnah loh kai m'biit uh coeng.
Tui bangla kai n'hil uh tih, khohnin yung ah kai malh m'vael.
Ka lungnah ka paya khaw kai taeng lamkah nan lakhla sak tih khohmuep ni ka hmaiben coeng.

BOEIPA kah sitlohnah te, cadilcahma phoeikah cadilcahma duela, kumhal ah ka hlai ni. Namah kah uepomnah te, ka ka neh ka tukkil ni.

Te dongah BOEIPA nang kah khobaerhambae te vaan rhoek loh, na uepomnah khaw a cim hlangping khuiah a uem uh.

Caempuei Pathen, BOEIPA namah bangla unim aka om?. BOEIPA tah tlung tih na kaepvai ah na uepomnah om.

Ka sal David te ka hmuh coeng tih kamah kah situi cim neh ka koelh coeng.
Ka kut te anih taengah tawn uh tih ka ban loh anih a thoh ni.

Anih loh kai te, “Nang tah ka napa, ka Pathen neh kai ham khangnah lungpang,” lan'khue ni.
Kai long khaw anih te caming omthang neh diklai manghai rhoek kah a sangkoek la ka khueh ni.
Kamah kah sitlohnah te anih ham kumhal duela ka ngaithuen rhoe ka ngaithuen pah vetih, ka paipi he anih taengah cak ni.
Te dongah a tiingan te a yoeyah la ka thoh pah vetih a ngolkhoel loh vaan khohnin bangla om ni.
A ca rhoek loh ka olkhueng he a hnoo uh tih ka tiktamnah dongah a pongpa uh pawt atah,
ka khosing te a poeih uh tih ka olpaek te a ngaithuen uh pawt atah,
amih kah boekoek te mancai neh, amih thaesainah te khaw tlohthae neh ka cawh thil van ni.
Tedae ka sitlohnah he anih taeng lamloh ka phae pah pawt vetih ka uepomnah te rhi ka lat pah mahpawh.
Ka paipi he ka poeih pawt vetih ka hmui lamkah aka thoeng khaw ka thovael mahpawh.

Hl a bangla kumhal ah cikngae vetih khomong soah uepom laipai la om ni,” na ti. Selah
Tedae na hlahpham tih na hnawt coeng dongah na koelh hlang te na poe.
Na salpa kah paipi te na hai tih a rhuisam khaw diklai neh na poeih pah.
Anih kah tanglung khaw boeih na phae pah tih a hmuencak rhoek khaw porhaknah la na khueh pah.
Longpuei kah aka pongpa boeih loh anih te a rheth uh dongah a imben rhoek kah kokhahnah coeng.
A rhal rhoek kah bantang kut te na pomsang pah tih a thunkha boeih kah ko na hoe sak.
A cunghang taeh khaw na kolong pah sak tih caemtloek vaengah khaw na duel pawh.
A caihcilnah te na kangkuen sak tih a ngolkhoel te diklai la na voeih pah.
A cacawn tue na rhaem pah tih, yah neh na thing. Selah
BOEIPA nang mevaeng hil nim na thuh uh vetih, na kosi loh hmai bangla a yoeyah la rhong ve?

Ka Boeipa aw, lamhma kah na sitlohnah te ta? David taengah na uepomnah neh na toemngam te.

A pilnam taengah tlannah a thak pah. A paipi cim kumhal duela a uen dongah a ming khaw a rhih om pai.
BOEIPA hinyahnah he tah cueihnah a tongnah la om tih a olkhueng aka vai rhoek boeih taengah lungmingnah then om. Amah koehnah a yoeyah la pai.
BOEIPA te thangthen uh. BOEIPA aka rhih tih a olpaek dongah bahoeng aka hmae hlang tah a yoethen.
