Vaidam kawng pataeng hmuhming uh pawt dae a thin te a ning sak uh.
Lan la hlaikan uh tih Gennesaret a pha uh vaengah duem uh.
Lawng dong lamkah loh a suntlak uh vaengah Jesuh te kawl a hmat uh.
Kho tom a hil uh dongah tloh aka khueh rhoek te, Jesuh om tila a yaak nah la phakdoeng dongah koe a koh uh.
Amah a kun nah te tah vangca ah khaw, khopuei ah khaw, lohma ah khaw, hnoyoih hmuen ah khaw tattloel rhoek te a tloeng pauh. Te vaengah a himbai dongkah salaw te taek ham pataeng anih te a hloep uh. Te dongah anih aka taek rhoek boeih tah daem uh.
Te phoeiah Pharisee rhoek neh cadaek rhoek hlangvang te Jerusalem lamkah ha pawk uh tih Jesuh taengah tingtun uh.
Te vaengah a hnukbang rhoek hlangvang te a kut kutmuen neh tanghnong tangaih la buh a caak uh te a hmuh uh.
Patong rhoek kah singyoe aka pom Pharisee rhoek neh Judah rhoek boeih loh kut te hlaengtangnah pawt atah caak a caak moenih.
Hnoyoih hmuen lamkah a bal uh vaengah khaw tui a hluk uh pawt atah caak ca uh pawh. Te phoeiah a tloe boengloeng, tui-um, tuidueh neh thingkong te silh ham duela a loh uh tih aka pom te muep om uh.
Te dongah Pharisee rhoek neh cadaek rhoek loh, “Balae tih patong rhoek kah singyoe bangla na hnukbang rhoek a caeh uh pawt tih kut tanghnong neh buh a caak uh?” a ti nauh.
Te vaengah amih taengah, “Pilnam long he a hmui neh kai hinyah dae a thinko tah kai lamloh voelh nong, “tila a daek tangtae bangla nangmih hlangthai palat ham Isaiah loh a phong te thuem coeng”.
Hlang olpaek dongkah thuituennah bangla a thuituen uh tih a poeyoek la kai m'bawk uh.
Pathen kah olpaek aka hlahpham rhoek loh hlang kah singyoe te na muk uh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah amih te, “Namamih kah singyoe te thoh ham dongah Pathen kah olpaek te na hnawt uh pai he.
Moses loh, 'Na nu neh na pa te hinyah. Tedae nu neh pa aka thet tah dueknah neh duek saeh,’ a ti.
Tedae nangmih tah hlang loh a manu neh a napa te, 'Kai lamkah na hoeikhangnah koi te Korban Te tah kutdoe la om ni,’ a ti atah,
Te dongah a manu a napa taengah a saii ham te pakhat khaw anih taengah na hlah pah uh moenih.
Nangmih kah singyoe na pang uh te Pathen kah olka tah a hmil tih amah boeiloeih te muep na saii uh,” a ti nah.
Hlangping te khaw koep a khue tih, “Hlang boeih loh kai taengah hnatun uh lamtah hmuhming uh.
Hlang kah a hmanhu ah om tih a khuila aka kun loh anih te a poeih thai moenih. Tedae hlang lamkah aka thoeng tah hlang aka poeih la om.
Yaak nah hamla hna aka khueh loh ya saeh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah hlangping taeng lamloh im khuila a kun vaengah Jesuh te a hnukbang rhoek loh nuettahnah a dawt uh.
Te dongah amih te, “Nangmih khaw lungmongkotalh la na om tangloeng. A hmanhu kah boeih tah hlang khuila a kun akhaw anih te poeih thai pawh tila na yakming uh pawt nim?
Te te thinko khuiah pawt tih a bungpuei khui lam ni a kun tih naat khui ni a pha. Te dongah cakok he boeih cimcaih,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah, “ Hlang lamkah aka thoeng loh hlang a poeih.
Hlang thinko khui lamkah tah a thae poeknah, Cukhalnah, huencannah, ngawnnah,
samphaihnah, halhkanah, halangnah, tuengkhuepnah, omthenbawnnah, mikmuelh kholaeh, soehsalnah, kohangnah, anglatnah khaw thoeng coeng.
Hekah a thae boeih tah a khui lamkah ha thoeng dongah hlang a poeih,” a ti nah.
Te lamkah thoo tih Tyre vaang la cet. Te vaengah im pakhat ah a kun te ming sak ham ngaih pawt dae phah thai pawh.
Tedae a kawng te huta pakhat loh tlek a yaak. Anih te a canu tah mueihla thae loh a kaem pah dongah cet tih Jesuh kho khugah bakop.
Tahae kah huta tah Syrophoenician kah Greek hoel la om dae a canu kah rhaithae te haek sak ham Jesuh a hloep.
Te vaengah anih te, “Camoe rhoek te lamhma la hah sak dae saeh. Ca kah buh rhawt pah tih ui taengah lun pah ham tah hnothen la a om moenih,” a ti nah.
Tedae huta loh a doo tih Jesuh te, “Boeipa, camoe kah buhdik te caboei hmuikah uica rhoek loh a caak uh van ta,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah anih te, “Hekah ol dongah cet laeh, rhaithae te na canu taeng lamkah cet coeng,” a ti nah.
Amah im la a caeh vaengah thingkong soah aka yalh camoe te a hmuh. Te vaengah rhaithae khaw ana suntla coeng.
Te phoeiah Tyre vaang lamkah koep nong tih Sidon longah Decapolis vaang khui kah Galilee tuili la pawk.
Te vaengah hnapang olmueh te a khuen uh tih anih te kut tloeng thil ham Jesuh a hloep uh.
Te dongah anih te hlangping taeng lamloh amah bueng a hoep tih a hna khuila kutdawn a puei. Te phoeiah a timthoeih tih a lai te a taek pah.
Vaan la oeloe tih a huei phoeiah anih te, “Ephphatha (khui saeh tila om),” a ti nah.
Te vaengah a hnavue te tlek khui tih a lai aka khom te yaih tih balh cal.
Te phoeiah hlang taengah thui pawt ham amih te ol a paek. Amih te muep ol a paek dae amih loh a nah la muep a hoe uh.
Te dongah let uh khungdaeng tih, “Cungkuem la balh a saii dongah hnapang te a yaak ham a saii tih olmueh te a cal sak,” a ti uh.
Te khohnin ah hlangping te hut koep om tih caak koi ba khaw khueh uh pawh.
Hnukbang rhoek te a khue tih, “Kai taengah hnin thum rhaeh uh coeng tih caak bakhaw a khueh uh voel pawt dongah he hlangping ham ka thinphat.
Te dongah a im ah buhmueh rhathih la amih ka tueih koinih longpueng ah tawnba uh ni. Amih khuikah hlangvang tah khohla lamkah ha pawk uh,” a ti nah.
A hnukbang rhoek long khaw, “He rhoek he kohong ah me lamkah buh nim hlang loh a cah thai eh he?” a ti uh.
Te dongah amih te, “Vaidam meyet na khueh uh?,” a ti nah hatah, “Parhih,” a ti uh.
Te dongah hlangping te diklai ah ngol ham a uen. Te phoeiah vaidam parhih te a loh tih a uem tih a aeh. Te daengah hlangping taengah tael hamla a hnukbang rhoek te a paek tih a tael uh.
Te phoeiah ngadik a yool a khueh uh te khaw a uem tih amih te, “He khaw tael uh,” a ti nah.
A caak uh tih a hah uh phoeiah a nueipil aka coih te voh rhih la a phueih uh.
Te vaengah thawngli tluk om uh.
Amih a hlah phoeiah tah lawng khuila tlek kun tih a hnukbang rhoek neh Dalmanutha paengpang la pawk.
Te vaengah Pharisee rhoek te cet uh tih Jesuh te koe a oelh uh. Vaan lamkah miknoek te anih taengah a toem uh tih a noemcai uh.
Tedae a lungbuei ah huei tih, “Balae hekah cadil loh miknoek a toem. Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui, Hekah cadil he miknoek tueng ham moenih,” a ti.
Te dongah amih te a toeng phoeiah koep kun tih rhalvangan la kat.
Te vaengah buh khuen ham a hmaai uh dongah lawng khuikah amih taengah vaidam pakhat bueng pawt atah atloe khueh uh pawh.
Te vaengah amih te ol a paek tih, “Ngaithuen uh, Pharisee rhoek kah tolrhu neh Herod kah tolrhu te hmat uh,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah vaidam a khueh uh pawt te amamih khuiah dawtlet uh thae.
Tedae a ming dongah amih te, “Balae tih vaidam na khueh uh pawt te na thuiuh. Na yakming uh pawt tih, na hmuhming uh thlan a? Na thinko te mangkhak la vawk khueh uh ne.
Mik aka khueh rhoek loh na hmuh uh voel pawt tih hna aka khueh rhoek loh na yaak uh pawt dongah na poek uh moenih.
Thawngnga ham vaidam panga ka aeh vaengah a nueipil na phueih uh te voh meyet a bae?” a ti nah hatah Jesuh taengah, “Hlainit,” a ti nauh.
“Thawngli ham parhih vaengah a nueipil na phueih uh te voh meyet a bae?” a ti nah hatah Jesuh taengah, “Parhih,” a ti nauh.
Te phoeiah amih te, “Na hmuhming uh hlan a?,” a ti nah.
Bethsaida la a caeh uh vaengah mikdael te Jesuh taengla a khuen uh tih anih te taek sak ham a bih uh.
Te dongah mikdael kah kut te a tuuk tih kho voella a khuen tih a mik ah a timthoeih. A kut te a tloeng thil phoeiah, “Khat khat khaw na hmuh maia?” tila a dawt.
Te dongah oeloe tih, “Hlang rhoek te ka sawt dae thingkung aka cet bangla ka hmuh,” a ti nah.
Tedae a mik te a kut koep a tloeng pah thil daengah a cil pah tih a hoeih pah tih phaeng boeih a hmuh.
Tedae anih a im la a tueih vaengah tah, “Vangca la kun boeh,” a ti nah.
Jesuh neh a hnukbang rhoek tah Kaisarea Philip kah kho la a caeh uh vaengah longpueng ah a hnukbang rhoek te a dawt tih, “Kai he hlang loh ulae a ti uh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah amah te, “Pakhat loh tuinuem Johan, pakhat loh Elijah, tedae pakhat loh tonghma rhoek khuikah pakhat khat a ti uh,” a ti nauh.
Jesuh loh amih te, “Nangmih ta kai he ulae na ti uh?” tila a dawt. Peter loh a doo tih, “Nang tah Khrih ni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah amah kawng te thui pawt ham amih te a uen.
Te phoeiah amih taengah hlang capa te muep a patang ham neh patong rhoek loh a hnawt ham khaw, khosoihham rhoek neh cadaek rhoek loh a ngawn phoeikah hnin thum ah a thoh ham khaw a kuek te koe a thuituen.
Te vaengah ol te sayalh la a thui dongah Peter loh Jesuh te a khue tih koe a toel.
Tedae Jesuh loh mael tih a hnukbang rhoek te a sawt doeah Peter te a tluung tih, “ Satan, Pathen te na poek pawt tih hlang te na poek dongah ka hnuk la nong,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah a hnukbang rhoek neh hlangping te a khue tih, “Khat khat loh kai hnukah vai ham a ngaih atah amah a huek uh phoeiah a thinglam te kawt saeh lamtah kai m'vai saeh.
Amah khaw a hinglu te khang ham aka ngaih tah a hlong ni. Tedae amah khaw kai neh olthangthen ham a hinglu aka hlong tah daem ni.
Hlang pakhat te Diklai pum a dang dae a hinglu te a hlong atah balae a hoeikhang?
Hlang loh a hinglu ham balae tlansum la a phai eh?
He suentae lakliah kamah neh ka ol aka yah puei te tah samphaih neh hlangtholh la om coeng. Hlang capa loh a napa kah thangpomnah dongah hlangcim rhoek kah puencawn rhoek neh ha pawk vaengah anih te a yah puei van ni,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah amih te, “Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui hekah aka pai khuiah hlangvang loh thaomnah neh aka pai Pathen ram te a hmuh hlan atah dueknah ten mueh mahpawh,” a ti nah.
Hnin rhuk phoeiah tah Jesuh loh Peter, James neh Johan te a khue tih amamih bueng tlang sang la hloep a caeh puei hatah amih hmaiah thohai uh.
A himbai te khaw bok kathik la om tih phaeng aa. Diklai hmankah mebang hnosuk long khaw te tlam te bok sak thai pawh.
Amih taengah Elijah neh Moses khaw phoe tih Jesuh neh cal uh.
Te dongah Peter loh Jesuh te a doo tih, “Rhabbi, heah he mamih om ham then tih, dap pathum saii uh sih lamtah, nang ham pakhat, Moses ham pakhat, Elijah ham pakhat saeh,” a ti nah.
Tedae lakuengngaiha la a om uh dongah metla a doo khaw ming pawh.
Te vaengah khomai aka thoeng loh amih a dah tih khomai khui lamkah, “Anih tah ka ca thintlo ni, anih ol hnatun uh,” tila ol ha thoeng.
Tedae koe a sawt uh vaengah ukhaw om pawt tih amih taengah Jesuh bueng te a hmuh uh.
Tlang lamkah a suntlak uh phoeiah a hmuh uh te duek khui lamkah loh hlang capa a thoh hlan atah thui pawt ham amih te ol a paek.
Te dongah olka te a kuem uh tih, “Aka duek rhoek taeng lamkah loh a thoh ham te metlam a om eh?” tila amamih te oelh uh thae.
Te phoeiah amah te a dawt uh tih, “Balae tih cadaek rhoek loh, 'Elijah te ha pawk lamhma ham a kuek,’ a ti uh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih te, “Elijah he lamhma la ha pawk coeng tih boeih a thoh coeng ngawn. Tedae hlang capa muep a patang phoeiah a voeih ham te metlam a daek?
Tedae nangmih taengah ka thui tah Elijah khaw ha pawk coeng tih anih ham a daek pah vanbangla anih te a ngaih bangla boeih a saii uh,” a ti nah.
Hnukbang rhoek taengla aka pawk rhoek loh amih taengkah hlangping neh cadaek rhoek neh muep a oelh uh te a hmuh uh.
Hlangping boeih loh Jesuh te lawt a hmuh uh hatah a ngaihmang uh. Te dongah anih te a cuk thil uh tih a doe uh.
Te dongah amih te, “Amih neh balae na oelh uh thae,” tila a dawt.
Te vaengah hlangping lamkah pakhat loh saya, “Mueihla olmueh aka kaem ka capa te nang taengla kang khuen.
Anih he a tuuk vaengah tah bung tih a hom phoeiah no a rhueng tih koh. Te te haek ham na hnukbang rhoek te khaw ka dawt dae noeng uh pawh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih te a doo tih, “Aw aka tangnahmueh kah cadil, nangmih taengah meyet nim ka om ve, nangmih taengah mevaeng hil nim kan yaknaem ve? Anih te ka taengla hang khuen uh,” a ti nah.
Te daengah camoe te Jesuh taengla a khuen uh. Tedae Mueihla loh camoe te koe a doek te a hmuh. Te vaengah diklai la bung tih a hom neh bol.
Te vaengah a napa te, “ Anih taengah aka thoeng he kum meyet lamkah lae a om coeng?” tila a dawt.
Te dongah a napa loh, “A cahni lamkah coeng tih anih poci sak ham hmai khuiah khaw tui khuiah khaw a voeih taitu. Tedae pakhat khaw na saii thai khaming, kaimih soah thinphat la kaimih m'bom mai,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh anih te, “Na saii thai atah e te! Aka tangnah ham boeih coeng thai ta,” a ti nah.
Camoe kah a napa te tlek pang tih, “ Ka tangnah, ka hnalvalnah te m'bom mai ,” a ti nah.
Jesuh loh hlangping a khong te a hmuh vaengah, mueihla thae te a ho tih, “Olmueh neh hnapang mueihla Kai loh nang kan tueih. Anih taeng lamkah loh cet lamtah anih khuiah kun voel boeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah pang tih muep a suvaih phoeiah cet. Tedae camoe te aka duek bangla a om dongah, “Duek coeng, “tila muep a thui uh.
Tedae Jesuh loh a kut te a tuuk tih a thoh hatah koe thoo hang.
Im khuila a kun phoeiah tah a hnukbang rhoek loh, “Kaimih loh balae tih tih anih te ka haek uh thai pawh,” tila amah bueng hloep a dawt uh.
Te dongah amih te, “He bang he thangthuinah nen pawt atah haek thai mahpawh,” a ti nah.
Te lamkah loh thoo uh tih Galilee longah van uh dae pakhat khaw ming sak ham ngaih pawh.
A hnukbang rhoek a thuituen vaengah khaw, “ Hlang Capa tah hlang kut ah a voeih vetih a ngawn uh ni. Tedae a ngawn uh phoeikah hnin thum ah thoo ni,” a ti nah coeng.
Amih loh olthui te a mangvawt uh dae amah dawt ham khaw a rhih uh.
Kapernaum te a pha uh tih im ah a om vaengah, “Longpueng ah balae na thui uh?,” tila amih te a dawt.
Tedae long ah khat neh khat te ulae tanglue tila a thuingong uh dongah a hil a phah uh.
Te vaengah Ngol tih hlainit te a khue. Amih te khaw, “ Khat khat loh lamhma la om ham a ngaih atah hnukkhoem koek neh tueihyoeih koek la om ni,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah camoe te a khue tih amih lakli ah a pai sak tih a poem.
Amih te khaw, “Kai ming neh hebang camoe pakhat khaw aka doe long tah kai ni n' doe. Tedae kai aka doe long tah kai bueng kolla ka tueih te khaw a doe,” a ti nah.
Johan loh Jesuh taengah, “Boeipa, na ming neh rhaithae aka haek hlang khat te ka hmuh uh. Tedae mamih hnuk ham vai pawt dongah anih te ka paa sak uh,” a ti nah.
Tedae Jesuh loh, “Anih te paa sak uh boeh. Ka ming neh thaomnah aka tueng sak te a om pawt vaengah koeloe la kai n'thet ve.
Te dongah mamih neh kingkalh la aka om pawt te tah mamih ham ni a om.
Khrih kah hut la na om uh dongah ka ming neh tui boengloeng khat nangmih aka tul te tah a thapang te poci loengloeng mahpawh tila nangmih taengah rhep ka thui.
U long khaw kai aka tangnah camoe rhoek he pakhat khaw a khah atah a rhawn ah laak phaklung a oi tih tuili ah voei koinih anih ham hnothen la lat om coeng.
Nang khaw na kut loh n'khah atah hlueng mai. Kut panit om tih hmai aka duek pawh hell la caeh lakah hingnah khuiah a ngun la kun te nang ham hnothen la om.
Na kho long khaw nang n'khah atah hlueng mai.
Kho rhoi om tih hell khuila m'voeih lakah a ngun neh hingnah khuila kun te nang hnothen la om.
Na mik long khaw nang n'khah atah koeih mai.
Mik panit om tih hell la m'voeih lakah mikvang neh Pathen ram khuiah kun te nang ham hnothen la om.
Te ah tah amih kah a rhiit khaw duek pawt tih hmai khaw thi pawh.
Rhoepsaep boeih te hmai dongah a baek ni.
Lungkaeh tah then, tedae lungkaeh te a duu la om koinih ba nen lae na hlihlim sak eh. Namamih khuiah lungkaeh khueh uh lamtah khat neh khat taengah rhoep uh thae,” a ti nah.
Te lamloh thoo tih Judea vaang neh Jordan rhalvangan la cet. Te vaengah a taengah hlangping rhoek koep ha puei uh tih a sainoek bangla amih te koep a thuituen.
Tedae Pharisee rhoek loh a paan tih, “Te koinih tongpa te yuu a hlak sak a? tila a dawt uh tih Jesuh te a noemcai uh.
Tedae amih te a doo tih, “Moses loh nangmih balae n' uen,” a ti nah.
Te dongah amih loh, “Moses loh yuhlaknah cayol te a daek sak phoeiah a tueih sak,” a ti uh.
Tedae Jesuh loh amih te, “Nangmih kah thinthahnah kongah hekah olpaek he nangmih ham a daek.
Suentae cuek lamkah tongpa neh huta ni a saii.
Te dongah tongpa loh a manu neh a napa te a toeng vetih a yuu taengah kap ni.
Panit te pumsa khat la om ni. Te dongah panit voel pawt tih pumsa khat la om coeng.
Te dongah Pathen loh a samtom te hlang loh maa sak boel saeh,” a ti nah.
Im ah khaw hekah a kawng he hnukbang rhoek loh koep a dawt uh.
Te vaengah amih te, “A yuu te a hlak tih a tloe aka yunah te tah a yuu soah samphaih coeng.
Huta long khaw a va te a maa tih va tloe a sak atah samphaih coeng,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah camoe rhoek te taek sak ham a taengla a khuen uh. Tedae hnukbang rhoek loh amih te a ho uh.
A hmuh vaengah Jesuh loh a yakdam tih amih te, “Hlah uh laeh camoe rhoek te kamah taengah ha lo uh saeh. Amih te kang uh boeh. Pathen kah ram tah amih kah coeng ni.
Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui, camoe bangla Pathen kah ram te aka doe pawt te atah ram khuiah kun loengloeng mahpawh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah amih te a poem tih a uem dongah kut a tloeng thil.
Te phoeiah Jesuh te longpueng ah a caeh li vaengah hlang pakhat loh pak ha cu tih a cungkueng pah. Te phoeiah, “Saya then dungyan hingnah ka pang ham balae ka saii eh?,” tila a dawt.
Jesuh loh anih te, “Balae tih kai he a then na ti? Pathen pakhat bueng pawt atah aka then he om pawh.
Olpaek te na ming coeng hlang ngawn boeh, samphaih boeh, huencan boeh, laithae boeh, hmuiyoi boeh, na nu na pa te hinyah,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah anih loh, “Saya, te rhoek te ka camoe lamkah boeih ka tuem coeng,” a ti nah.
Tedae Jesuh loh anih te a sawt vaengah a lungnah tih, “ Nang pakhat na phavawt pueng, cet lamtah, na khueh boeih te yoi lamtah khodeng rhoek pae. Te daengah ni vaan ah khohrhang na dang eh. Te phoeiah halo lamtah kai m'vai,” a ti nah.
Tedae hnopai muep aka khueh la a om dongah tekah olka loh moelh a khaih tih kothae doela vik cet.
Te vaengah Jesuh loh taengvai a sawt tih a hnukbang rhoek te, “ Tangka aka om tah Pathen ram ah kun ham bahoeng kuel mai,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh olka dongah hnukbang rhoek tah a ngaihmang uh. Tedae Jesuh loh amih te koep a doo tih, “Camoe rhoek aih khaw, Pathen kah ram la kun ham te kuel kahlak la om ta.
Kuirhang te Pathen kah ram ah a kun lakah kalauk te phamet khui ah a kun ham phoeng ngai,” a ti nah.
Tedae te rhoek tah let uh khungdaeng tih amamih te, “Unim aka daem thai ve,” a ti uh.
Jesuh loh amih te a sawt tih, “Hlang ham a tloelnah dae Pathen ham tah a tloelnah moenih Pathen taengah tah boeih yoeikoek mai,” a ti nah.
Peter loh a tong tih, “Kaimih loh boeih ka toeng uh tih nang kam vai uh coeng he,” a ti nah.
Jesuh loh, “ Nangmih taengah rhep kan thui, kai ham neh olthangthen ham im khaw, manuca rhoek khaw, ngannu khaw, manu khaw, napa khaw, ca khaw lohmuen khaw aka toeng te om pawh.
Tahae tue kah hnaemtaeknah khuiah pataeng im khaw, manuca khaw, ngannu khaw, manu khaw, ca khaw, lohmuen khaw a pueh yakhat la dang het pawt nim? Aka lo ham tue ah dungyan hingnah khaw om pueng.
Te dongah lamhma te lamhnuk la, lamhnuk te khaw lamhma la muep om ni,” a ti nah.
Jerusalem la a caeh uh kah longpueng ah a om uh vaengah Jesuh tah amih taengah a lamhma ana om pah. Te dongah a ngaihmang uh tih aka vai rhoek long khaw a rhih uh. Tedae hlainit te koep a khuen tih amah taengah aka thoeng ham te amih taengah thui ham a tong.
“Jerusalem la n'caeh uh he hlang capa tah khosoihham neh cadaek rhoek taengah a paek vetih a duek ham a boe sak uh phoeiah namtom rhoek taengah a thak uh ni.
Anih te a tamdaeng uh phoeiah a timthoeih uh ni, a boh uh vetih a ngawn uh ni. Tedae hnin thum phoeiah koep thoo ni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Zebedee capa rhoi James neh Johan loh a paan rhoi tih, “Saya namah taengah kan bih uh te tah kaimih ham nan saii koinih ka ngaih rhoi,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih rhoi te, “Nangmih ham kai balae saii sak na ngaih rhoi,” a ti nah.
Te rhoi long khaw amah te, “Kaimih rhoi he namah kah bantang lamloh pakhat, banvoei lamloh pakhat te m'pae lamtah na thangpomnah dongah ka ngol rhoi eh,” a ti nah.
Jesuh loh amih rhoi taengah, “Na bih te na ming rhoi moenih. Ka ok boengloeng te ok ham neh kai aka nuem baptisma dongah nuem ham na noeng aya?,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah te rhoi loh amah te, “Ka noeng ngawn,” a ti nah rhoi. Tedae Jesuh loh amih rhoi taengah, “Ka ok boengloeng te na ok rhoi vetih ka nuem baptisma te na nuem rhoi ni.
Tedae kai kah banvoei bantang ah ngol ham te kai loh paek ham om pawt tih a hmoel tangtae rhoek ham ni a om,” a ti nah.
Parha rhoek loh a yaak uh vaengah James neh Johan taengah koe thatlai uh.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih te a khue tih, “Namtom rhoek aka mawt tah amamih aka vueinan tih amamih khuikah aka len loh amih aka huttet la a ngai uh te na ming uh.
Nangmih ah te tlam te om boel saeh. Tedae nangmih ah a len la om aka ngaih long tah nangmih kah tueihyoeih la om saeh.
Te phoeiah nangmih ah lamhma la om ham aka ngaih long tah hlang boeih kah sal la om saeh.
Hlang capa tah hlang thotat sak ham pawt tih sak ham pah ham neh a hinglu te ping kah tlansum la paek ham ni halo,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Jerikho la pawk uh tih Jerikho lamkah a hnukbang rhoek khaw, hlangping khaw huhut khong uh. Te vaengah Timaeus capa Bartimaeus buhbih mikdael te long taengah ngol.
Nazareth Jesuh om tila a yaak vaengah koe pang tih, “David capa Jesuh kai n'rhen lah,” a ti nah.
Te dongah anih te hilphah sak ham muep a sim uh. Tedae te long khaw anah la lat pang tih, “David capa, kai n'rhen lah,” a ti.
Te dongah Jesuh te pai tih, “Anih ke khue uh,” a ti nah. Te dongah mikdael te a khue uh tih, “Thoo, na ngaimong sak, nang n'khue coeng,” a ti nauh.
Te long khaw a himbai te a voeih tih a cungpet doela Jesuh taengah pawk.
Te phoeiah Jesuh loh anih te a doo tih, “Na ngaih te kan saii pawn eh,” a ti nah. Te dongah mikdael loh Jesuh taengah, “Rhabboni, ka hmuh van lah mako,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Jesuh loh anih te, “Cet laeh, namah kah tangnah loh nang n'khang coeng,” a ti nah. Te vaengah tlek a hmuh tih longpueng ah Jeusuh pahoi a vai.
Jerusalem, Olive tlang kah Bethphage neh Bethany a pha tom uh vaengah a hnukbang rhoek khuiah panit te a tueih.
Te vaengah amih rhoi te, “Na rhaldan kah vangca la cet rhoi lamtah a khuiah tlek na kun neh laak ca a pael te na hmuh rhoi ni. Te soah ah te hlang a ngol noek moenih. Te te hlam lamtah han khuen rhoi.
Te vaengah khat khat loh nangmih rhoi taengah, “Balae na saii te,’ a ti atah Boeipa loh a ngoe. Tedae he la tlek kan thak koep bitni, 'ti nah,” a ti nah.
Te dongah a caeh rhoi hatah thohka voel kah longrhak ah laak ca a pael te a hmuh rhoi tih a hlam rhoi.
Te vaengah tekah aka pai hlangvang loh, “laak ca na hlam rhoi te balae na saii rhoi,” a ti uh.
Te rhoi loh amih taengah Jesuh kah a thui bangla a thui rhoi daengah amih rhoi te a hlah uh.
Te phoeiah laak ca te Jesuh taengla a khuen rhoi tih amamih kah himbai neh a khuk thil uh phoeiah a soah Jesuh te ngol.
Te phoeiah hlang a yet loh a himbai te long ah a phaih uh. Tedae a tloe rhoek loh lohma kah thingbu te a hlaek pauh.
Te phoeiah lamhma rhoek neh hnukvai rhoek loh, “Hosanna, Boeipa ming neh aka pawk tah a yoethen pai.
A pa David kah ram aka pai tah a yoethen pai, a sangkoek ah hosanna,” tila pang uh.
Te phoeiah Jerusalem bawkim la kun tih boeih a sawt. A tue te khaw hlaem la om coeng tih hlainit neh Bethany la cet uh.
A vuen ah Bethany lamloh a caeh uh vaengah a bungpong.
Te vaengah thaibu a hnah aka om te a hla lamloh a hmuh. Te dongah a kung ah pakhat khat khaw a hmuh mai atah tila a paan. Thaibu tue la a om pawt dongah a taeng a pha vaengah tah a hnah pawt atah a tloe hmu pawh.
Te dongah a voek tih, “Nang kah a thaih te kumhal duela ca uh boel saeh,” a ti nah te a hnukbang rhoek long khaw a yaak uh.
Te phoeiah Jerusalem la ha lo uh tih bawkim la a kun vaengah bawkim kah hnoyoi neh hnolai rhoek te koe a vai. Tangkathung rhoek kah caboei neh vahu aka yoi rhoek kah ngoltlang te a palet pah.
Te phoeiah hnopai te bawkim longah pakhat khaw puen sak pawh.
Te phoeiah amih te a thuituen tih, “ Kai im tah namtom boeih ham thangthuinah im la a khue ni tila a daek moenih a? Tedae nangmih loh dingca rhoek kah khuirhung la na saii uh,” a ti nah.
Khosoihham neh cadaek rhoek loh a yaak uh vaengah Jesuh te poci sak ham a mae uh. Tedae anih kah thuituennah soah hlangping khaw boeih let uh tih loei a rhih uh.
Kholaeh a pha vaengah kho voella cet uh.
Te phoeikah yueya a van uh hatah thaibu tah a yung lamloh a koh te a hmuh uh.
Te vaengah Peter loh a thoelh tih Jesuh taengah, “Rhabbi thaibu thae na phoei thil te koh coeng he,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih te a doo tih, “Pathen taengah tangnah te khueh uh lah.
Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui, hekah tlang he, 'Phil saeh lamtah tuili la voei saeh, ' aka ti nah long tah a thinko ah boelhkhoeh boel saeh lamtah a thui te thoeng coeng tila tangnah saeh a thoeng pah bitni.
Te dongah nangmih taengah ka thui, thangthui neh na bih uh boeih te ka dang coeng tila tangnah uh lamtah nangmih ham ha thoeng bitni.
Thangthui la na pai uh vaengah khaw khat khat taengah ngaihlih bet na khueh atah hlah pah.
Te daengah ni vaan kah na pa long khaw nangmih kah tholhdalhnah te a hlah eh?,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Jerusalem la koep pawk uh tih Bawkim ah a pongpa vaengah khosoihham rhoek khaw, cadaek rhoek khaw, patong rhoek khaw, a taengla ha pawk uh.
Te phoeiah Jesuh te, “Mebang saithainah nen lae hekah he na saii? tih hekah he saii ham saithainah he ulong nang m'paek,” a ti nauh.
Tedae Jesuh loh amih taengah, “Olka pakhat nangmih kan dawt phoeiah kai n'doouh. Te vaengah mebang saithainah neh ka saii khaw nangmih ham kan thui bitni.
Johan kah baptisma te vaan lamkah a? Hlang lamkah a aka om a? Kai n'doo uh lah,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah amamih te dawtlet uh thae tih, “Vaan lamkah n'ti uh, “koinih, “ Balae tih anih na tangnah uh pawh,” a ti veh.
Hlang lamkah n'ti uh cakhaw hlang boeih loh Johan te, “Tonghma rhep ni,” a ti uh dongah hlangping te a rhih uh.
Te dongah Jesuh te a doo uh tih, “Ka ming uh pawh,” a ti uh. Jesuh long khaw amih te, “Hekah he mebang saithainah neh ka saii khaw nangmih taengah ka thui mahpawh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah amih taengah nuettahnah neh thui ham a tong tih, “Hlang pakhat loh misur a tue tih vongtung a tung, rhom a too, imsang a sak. Te phoeiah lotawn rhoek te a phaam sak tih vik yiin.
A tue vaengah lotawn taengkah misur thaih coi ham sal pakhat te lotawn rhoek taengla a tueih.
Tedae anih te a tuuk uh phoeiah a boh uh tih a tlongtlai la a tueih uh.
Te phoeiah sal a tloe te amih taengla koep a tueih hatah anih te khaw a vuek uh tih yah a bai uh.
Te phoeiah a tloe te a tueih dae te khaw a ngawn uh tih a tloe rhoek muep a tueih te, a ngen a boh uh tih a ngawn uh.
Capa thintlo pakhat a khueh pueng tih, “Ka capa te a yahnah uh ni,” a ti dongah a capa te amih taengla a hnukkhueng ah a tueih.
Tedae lotawn rhoek loh amamih te, “Anih tah rhopangkung ni. Halo anih he ngawn uh sih. Te daengah ni mamih kah rho la a om eh?,” a ti uh.
Anih te a tuuk uh tih a ngawn uh phoeiah misurdum lamkah loh vawl a voeih uh.
Te koinih misurdum kungmah loh balae a saii eh? A paan vetih lotawn rhoek te a poci sak phoeiah misurdum te a tloe rhoek taengah a paek ni.
Cacim he na tae uh pawt nim? Im sa rhoek loh a hnawt lungto te imkil kah a lu la poeh.
Hekah he Boeipa lamkah ha thoeng tih mamih mik ah aka khuet la om?” a ti nah.
Nuettahnah a thui te amih ni tila a ming uh dongah amah tuuk ham a mae uh. Tedae hlangping te a rhih uh dongah anih te a toeng uh tih cet uh.
Te phoeiah olka neh tuengkhuep ham Jesuh taengla Pharisee rhoek neh Herod hlang rhoek kah hlangvang rhoek te a tueih uh.
A pha uh vaengah Jesuh te, “Boeipa, a thuem la na om tih hlang maelhmai te na sawt pawt dongah u taengah khaw na birhih pawh. Pathen kah oltak longpuei te ni na thuituen tila ka ming uh. Te dongah Kaisar taengah mangmu paek ham a ngaih a?, a ngaih moenih a? Pae sih a? Pae boel sih a?” a ti uh.
Tedae amih kah thailatnah te a hmuh tih amih te, “Balae kai nan noemcai uh? Kai taengla denari hang khuen lamtah ka so lah eh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah a khuen uh hatah amih taengah, “A muei neh a ming he u kah nim he?” a ti nah vaengah, “Kaisar kah,” a ti uh.
Jesuh long khaw amih te, “Kaisar kah te Kaisar taengah, Pathen kah te Pathen taengah thuung uh,” a ti nah tih a taengah a ngaihmang uh.
Te phoeiah Sadducee rhoek loh a taengla a paan uh. Te rhoek loh, “Thohkoepnah om mahpawh,” a ti uh.
Te vaengah anih te a dawt uh tih, “Saya, Moses loh kaimih ham, “Khat khat kah a manuca tah duek tih a yuu te camoe khueh kolla a caehtak atah, a manuca patoeng loh a yuu te pang saeh lamtah a manuca kah a tiingan te thoh saeh tila a daek.
Boeinaphung parhih om uh tih lamhma te yuu a loh dae duek tih a tiingan khueh pawh.
A pabae long khaw anih a pang dae duek tih a tiingan caehtak bal pawh. A pathum long khaw amah boeiloeih la om.
A parhih long khaw a tiingan khueh pawh. A hnukkhueng ah huta te khaw duek.
Anih te parhih loh a yuu la a khueh uh dongah thohkoepnah khuiah a thoh uh vaengah amih khuiah u yuu lamlae a om eh?” a ti uh.
Jesuh loh amih taengah, “Cacim neh Pathen kah saithainah aka ming pawt loh n'rhaithi uh dongah moenih a he?
Duek lamkah a thoh uh vaengah yuloh vasak om mahpawh, rhaihlan khaw om mahpawh, vaan puencawn rhoek bangla om uh coeng.
Tedae aka duek rhoek a thoh uh te Moses cabu khuiah na tae uh pawt nim? Pathen loh tangpuem khuiah anih a voek vaengah, 'Kai tah Abraham kah Pathen, Isaak kah Pathen neh Jakob kah Pathen ni,’ a ti nah.
Pathen tah aka duek rhoek kah pawt tih aka hing rhoek kah ni. Bahoeng n'rhaithi uh coeng la he,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah amih a oelh uh thae te cadaek pakhat loh a yaak dongah a paan. Tedae amih a voek te thuem tila a hmuh. Te dongah Jesuh te, “Olpaek boeih khuiah melae tanglue la aka om,” tila a dawt.
Jesuh loh, “ Aw Israel hnatun lah, mamih kah Boeipa, Boeipa Pathen pakhat ni a om.
Te dongah na Boeipa Pathen te na thinko boeih, na hinglu boeih, na kopoek boeih, na thadueng boeih neh lungnah ' a ti te lamhma la om.
A pabae ah na imben te namah bangla lungnah. He rhoi lakah aka tanglue olpaek a tloe om pawh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah cadaek loh Jesuh te, “Thuem, saya, pakhat bueng om tih amah phoeiah a tloe om pawh tila oltak te na thui coeng.
Pathen te thinko boeih neh, yakmingnah boeih neh, thadueng boeih neh, lungnah tih imben te amah bangla lungnah ham te hmaihlutnah neh hmueih boeih lakah olpuei la om,” a ti nah.
Anih loh cat a doo te Jesuh loh a hmuh vaengah anih te, “Pathen kah ram lamloh lakhla la na om ngawn pawh,” a ti nah. Te phoeiah tah Jesuh te dawt ham ngaingaih uh voel pawh.
Jesuh loh bawkim ah a thuituen tih a doo vaengah, “Cadaek rhoek loh metlam, 'Khrih tah David capa ni,’ tila a thui?
David amah loh Mueihla Cim rhangneh, 'Boeipa loh ka Boeipa te 'Na rhal rhoek te na kho hmuiah ka khueh hlan atah kai kah bantang ah ngol dae ' a ti nah,’ a ti.
Anih te David amah long pataeng Boeipa la a khue atah metlamlae a capa la a om eh?,” a ti nah. Te vaengah hlangping te yet loh liplip a hnatun.
Te phoeiah amah kah thuituennah khuiah, “ Hnikul neh pongpa tih hnoyoih hmuen ah toidalnah ham,
tunim ah ngolhmuen then neh buhkung ah hmuensang aka ngaih cadaek rhoek te dawn uh.
Te rhoek loh nuhmai rhoek kah im a yoop uh tih mueituengnah ham khing thangthuiuh. Amih tah laitloeknah a yook uh khungdaeng bitni,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah tangkabu hmaiah ngol tih hlangping loh tangkabu khuiah rhohum a sang vaengah a kumngai kuirhang rhoek loh muep a sang uh te a hmuh.
Te vaengah nuhmai khodeng pakhat ha pawk tih mucih panit a sang. Te tah pekhat lo ni.
Te dongah a hnukbang rhoek te a khue tih, “Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui, tangkabu khuila aka sang rhoek boeih lakah hekah nuhmai khodaeng loh a sang ngai.
Hlang boeih loh amamih taengkah a coih te a sang uh dae anih tah a vawtthoek khui lamkah a khuehtawn boeih a khosaknah boeih te bitbit a sang coeng,” a ti nah.
Bawkim lamkah a caeh vaengah a hnukbang rhoek khuikah pakhat loh a taengah, “Saya, mebang lungto neh mebang imsak nim he,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh anih te, “Hekah imsak a len te na hmuh nama? Lungto sokah lungto he hmaai loengloeng het mahpawt a? Te tah phil loengloeng het mahpawt a?,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Bawkim rhaldan kah Olive tlang ah amah te ngol tih, Peter, James, Johan neh Andrew loh,
“Hekah he me vaengah lae a om khaw kaimih taengah thui lah. He he boeih a soep tom vaengkah miknoek tah mebang lae? tila Jesuh amah bueng te a dawt uh.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih te, “Ngaithuen uh khat khat loh nangmih n'rhaithi ve.
Kai ni, 'tila aka thui khaw kai ming neh muep ha pawk uh vetih muep rhaithi uh ni.
Te dongah caem neh caem kah olthang na yaak uh vaengah let uh boeh. A om ham khaw a kuek pai dae a bawtnah tah pha hlan.
Namtu loh namtu, ram loh ram a thoh thil ni. Hmuen takuem ah lingluei hinghuen vetih khokha khaw pai ni. Te tah bungtloh a tongnah coeng ni.
Te dongah nangmih tah namamih te hmat uh thae. Nangmih te khoboei rhoek taengla n'thak uh vetih tunim ah m'boh uh ni. Te phoeiah khoboei rhoek neh manghai rhoek hmaiah khaw, amih taengah khaw kai ham laipai la na pai uh ni.
Namtom boeih taengah khaw lamhma la olthangthen te hoe ham a kuek.
Te dongah nangmih n'khuen uh tih n' tloeng uh vaengah na thui uh ham te ngaisa uh boeh. Tedae amah tekah a tue vaengah nangmih m'paek te tah thui uh pai. Nangmih tah aka thui la na om pawt tih Mueihla Cim ni aka om.
Te phoeiah manuca loh manuca, a napa loh ca te duek sak ham a voeih ni. Camoe rhoek long khaw a manu napa te a tingtoeh vetih a duek sak ni.
Kai ming kongah hlang boeih loh m'hmuhuet uh ni. Tedae a bawt due aka ueh te tah daem ni.
Tedae na hmuh uh vaengah mitmoengnah tueilaehnah a pai te a kuek moenih. Aka tae loh yakming saeh. Te vaengah Judea kah rhoek te tlang la rhaelrham uh saeh.
Imphu kah aka om long khaw rhum boel saeh. A im kah khat khat loh ham khaw kun boel saeh.
Lohma kah long khaw a himbai loh ham a hnuk la bal boel saeh.
Anunae tekah khohnin ah bungvawn la aka om rhoek neh cacun rhoek aih.
Tedae sikca ah a om pawt ham thangthui uh.
Suentae kah a tongcuek lamloh aka om pawh tebang phacipphabaem khohnin te ha pai ni. Te tah Pathen loh a suen parhii te tahae due khaw om loeng loeng hlan.
Te dongah Boeipa loh khohnin te a biim pawt atah pumsa he boeih daem thai mahpawh. Tedae a tuek tih a coelh tangtae ham te khohnin te a biim pah ni.
Te vaengah pakhat loh nangmih taengah, 'Hela Khrih he, kela ke,’ a ti atah tangnah uh boeh.
Laithae khrih rhoek neh laithae tonghma rhoek phoe vetih a coengthai atah coelh tangtae rhoek te phael sak ham miknoek neh khobae rhambae a tueng sak uh ni.
Te dongah nangmih taengah ka thui boeih te nangmih loh ana noek uh.
Tedae phacip phabaem phoeikah tekah khohnin ah khomik loh hmuep vetih hla loh a aa pae mahpawh.
Aisi rhoek khaw vaan lamloh tla ni. Vaan kah thaomnah khaw hinghuen uh ni.
Te phoeiah Hlang Capa te thaomnah tanglue, thangpomnah neh, khomai dongah ha pawk te a hmuh uh ni.
Te vaengah, puencawn rhoek te a tueih vetih diklai a soi lamloh vaan a soi duela khohli pali dongkah a coelh rhoek te a coi ni.
Te dongah thaibu lamkah nuettahnah te canguh. A hlaeng te suepluep la om tih a hnah te a boe coeng atah khohal yoei coeng tila na ming uh.
Te dongah nangmih khaw hekah aka om he na hmuh uh vaengah thohka taengah rhet om coeng tila ming uh.
Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui, he rhoek loh boeih a thoeng hlan atah tahae kah cadil loh khum loengloeng mahpawh.
Vaan neh diklai tah khum ni, tedae kai kah ol tah khum loengloeng mahpawh.
Tedae tekah a tue khohnin kawng te a ming uh moenih, vaan kah puencawn rhoek long khaw ming pawh, pa long pawt atah capa long khaw a ming moenih.
Hlang pakhat loh a im te yiin la a hlah uh vaengah a sal rhoek te saithainah, neh a bibi rhip a paek phoeiah imtawt te hueltue la om ham a uen.
Me vaengah lae a tue te a omeh tite na ming uh pawt dongah hak uh lamtah ana noek uh.
Te dongah im kung te kholaeh ah khaw, ihdulh ah khaw, aikhong ah khaw, mincang ah khaw, me vaengah ha pawk ham khaw na ming uh pawt dongah ana hak uh.
Buengrhuet ha pawk vetih na ih uh te hmu ve.
Te dongah nangmih ham ka thui te hlang boeih ham khaw ka thui, hak uh lah,” pahoi a ti nah.
Tahae lamkah hnin nit phoeiah Yoom neh vaidamding om pawn ni. Te vaengah khosoihham rhoek neh cadaek rhoek loh Jesuh te mebang tuengkhuepnah nen khaw tuuk tih ngawn ham a mae uh.
“ Tedae khotue vaengah boel saeh, pilnam kah olpung kacan la om ve,” a ti uh.
Te phoeiah Jesuh te Bethany ah aka om hmaibae Simon im ah yalh. Anih te huta pakhat loh a paan tih botui lungbok a khuen pah. Te bang nardo cilh tah te a phutlo. Lungbok te a boh tih a lu te a suep pah.
Tedae amih khuiah te aka yakdam hlangvang om.Te dongah , “Baham nim botui he pocinah a khueh he?
He botui he denari yathum hlai la a yoih vetih khodaeng te a paek mako tila anih te a thanueih thiluh.
Tedae Jesuh loh, “ Anih te hlah uh, balae tih anih te thakthaenah neh na toehuh. Kai dongah bibi then a saii.
khodaeng rhoek te nangmih taengah om uh taitu tih na ngaih uh vaengah amih ham a then na saii uh thai. Tedae kai ka om taitu moenih.
A khueh duen te a saii coeng. Rhokhlaknah dongah ka pumsa he hluk hamla a sawn.
Te dongah nangmih taengah rhep kan thui, Diklai pum kah olthangthen a hoe nah takuem ah anih loh a saii te khaw a kutmuei la a thui ni,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah hlainit khuikah pakhat Judah Iskariot loh Jesuh te amih khosoihham rhoek taengah yoih hamla cet.
Te rhoek loh a yaak uh vaengah a uem uh tih anih te tangka paek ham a caeng uh. Te dongah anih voeih ham te a hoenghoep a dawn.
Vaidamding kah lamhmacuek hnin kah yoom a ngawn uh vaengah a hnukbang rhoek loh amah taengah, “Melam na ngaih dae, ka cet uh saeh lamtah , yoom caak ham ka tarhoek uh eh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah a hnukbang panit te a tueih. Te vaengah amih rhoi te , “ Khopuei khuila cet rhoi lamtah tuitang dongah tui aka phuei hlang loh nangmih rhoi n'doe ni.
Anih te vai rhoi lamtah a kun nah imkung te, 'Saya loh, 'Kai impahnah te melam a om, te rhoek ah ka hnukbang rhoek neh yoom ka ca uh mai eh,’ a ti, ti nah rhoi.
Te vaengah anih loh, “Imhman len a sikim la a rhoekbah te nangmih rhoi n'tueng bitni. Te vaengah mamih ham pahoi rhuengphong rhoi,” a ti nah.
Hnukbang rhoi te cet rhoi tih kho khuila a kun rhoi vaengah amih rhoi a uen bangla a hmuh rhoi tih yoom te a rhuengphong rhoi.
Hlaem a pha vaengah hnukbang hlainit neh ha pawk.
Te phoeiah a vael uh tih a caak uh vaengah Jesuh loh, “ Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui. Nangmih khuikah pakhat, kai taengah aka ca loh kai m'voeih ni te,” a ti nah.
Vik a kothae uh tih, pakhat phoeiah pakhat loh Jesuh te , “Kai mai khaming,” a ti nauh.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih te, “Hlainit khuikah pakhat, kai taengah baeldung khuila aka puei te.
Hlang capa tah a kawng a daek tangtae bangla a caeh te thuem. Tedae anih hlang pakhat loh hlang capa a voeih te anunae. Tekah hlang te thaang pawt koinih anih ham then ni,” a ti nah.
A caak uh vaengah, vaidam te a loh tih yoethen a paek . A aeh phoeiah amih te a doe tih, “He he kamah pum ni lo uh,” a ti nah.
Boengloeng te khaw a loh tih a uem phoeiah amih te a paek tih rhip a ok uh.
Te phoeiah amih taengah, “He tah ka thii neh cungkuem ham ka long sak paipi ni.
Nangmih taengah rhep ka thui, Pathen kah ram ah a thai la ka ok nah khohnin duela misur thaih ka o voel loengloeng mahpawh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah a hlai doeah olives tlang la cet uh.
Te phoeiah Jesuh loh amih te, “Boeih n'khah uh ni. 'Tudawn te ka tam vetih tu rhoek te pam ni, ' tila a daek coeng.
Tedae kai ka thoh phoeiah Galilee la nangmih hmaiah ka lamhma ni,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Peter loh Jesuh taengah, “Boeih a khah uh mai akhaw, kai van moenih,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Jesuh loh anih te, “Namah taengah rhep kan thui, tihnin hlaem ah he ai hnavoei a khong hlanah nang loh kai he voeithum nan huek uh tak ni,” a ti nah.
Tedae, “Nang hamla kai ka duek te a kuek cakhaw nang kan huek uh tak loengloeng mahpawh,” khak a ti nah. Te vanbangla a tloe boeih long khaw a ti uh.
Te phoeiah Gethsemene aka ming nah hmuen la cet uh tih a hnukbang rhoek te, “Ka thangthui rhuetah tah heah he ana ngol uh,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Peter, James neh Johan te amah taengla a khuen. Te vaengah ngaihmang neh khobing te a tong coeng .
Te dongah amih te, “Ka hinglu loh kothae a ming tih vat duek. Heah he naeh uh lamtah ana hak uh,” a ti nah.
Tedae hawt lamhma tih lai ah bakop. Te vaengah coeng thai la a om atah a tue loh anih a khum tak ham ni a thangthui coeng .
Te vaengah, “ Abba, a pa, nang ham tah boeih yoeikoek mai, hekah boengloeng he kai lamkah loh khoe mai. Tedae kai ngaih boel saeh lamtah namah ngaih mai saeh,” a ti.
Ha pawk vaengah amih a ih te a hmuh tih, Peter taengah, “Simon, na ip nama? Khonoek pakhat pataeng na hak thai mahnim?
Hak uh lamtah thangthuiuh. Te daengah ni cuekhalhnah khuiah na pha pawt eh. Mueihla loh a yakvawt ngawn dae pumsa loh tattloel,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah koep cet tih amah a thui tangtae ol neh thangthui.
Koep ha pawk vaengah tah amih a ih a hmuh. Aka om rhoek te a mik loh a nan uh. Te dongah Jesuh a doo uh ham te ming uh pawh.
A pathum kah ha pawk vaengah amih te, “Yulh na ip uh tih caih laeh Tamah saeh. A tue ha pawk coeng. Hlang Capa tah hlangtholh rhoek kut ah a voeih coeng he.
Thoo uh, cet uh pawn sih, kai aka voei tah, ha yoei coeng ke,” a ti nah.
A thui li vaengah, hlainit khuikah pakhat Judah te pakcak ha pawk. Te vaengah anih te khosoihham neh, cadaek rhoek neh, patong rhoek kah a tueih hlangping loh cunghang neh thingboeng neh a pueiuh.
Te vaengah anih aka voei loh amih mikhip a paek tih, “ Ka mok te tah anih ni. Anih te tuu uh lamtah rhep khuen uh ,” a ti nah.
Te dongah ha pawk neh Jesuh te koe a paan tih, “Rhabbi,” a ti nah phoeiah a mok.
Te rhoek loh kut a hlah thil uh tih Jesuh te a tuuk uh.
Tedae aka pai khuikah pakhat loh cunghang te a yueh tih khosoihham kah sal te a boeng hatah a hna a pat pah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh amih te a doo tih, “Dingca bangla, cunghang neh thingboeng neh kai tuuk ham nan suntlak thil uh.
Khohnin takuem nangmih taengah ka om tih bawkim ah ka thuituen vaengah kai na tuu uh pawh. Tedae he nen ni cacim tah a soep eh?,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Jesuh te a hlah uh tih boeih rhaelrham uh.
Tedae amah taengah aka bang cadong pakhat loh Jesuh pumtling te himbai neh a khuk hatah anih te khaw a tuuk uh.
Te long khaw himbai te a hnoo tih pumtling la rhaelrham van.
Jesuh te khosoihham taengla a khuen uh hatah khosoihham rhoek, patong rhoek neh cadaek rhoek loh boeih a khoong thiluh.
Peter long tah a hla lamloh khosoihham kah vongup khui duela a vai. Te phoeiah tueihyoeih rhoek taengah ngol tih hmaivang te rhet a om.
Te vaengah khosoihham rhoek neh khoboei pum loh Jesuh te duek sak ham laipai a toem uh dae hmu uh pawh.
Jesuh te muep a pael uh dae laipai rhoek te cikngae la om uh pawh.
Angen loh pai tih anih a pael nah la,
” Hekah kutsai bawkim he kai loh ka phae vetih hnin thum phoeiah a tloe kutsai mueh te ka sak ni, 'a ti te ka yaak uh coeng, ” a ti uh.
Amih kah olthui te khaw cikngae la om bal pawh.
Te dongah khosoihham tah a laklung ah pai tih Jesuh te a dawt tih, “Khat khaw na doo mahpawt a? Amih loh nang m'pael uh te,” a ti nah.
Tedae hil a phah tih pakhat khaw doo pawh. Khosoihham loh Jesuh te koep a dawt tih, “Nang he, uemom Capa Khrih a?” a ti nah.
Te dongah Jesuh loh, “ Kai ni, hlang capa te thaomnah bantang ah ngol vetih vaan khomai neh ha pawk te na hmuh uh bitni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah khosoihham loh a angki te a phen tih, “Laipai n'ngoe uh pueng a te?
soehsalnah te na yaak uh coeng. Metlam na poek uh ,” a ti nah. Amih loh anih te dueknah yook sak kuekluek hamla boeih a boe sakuh.
Te dongah hlangvang loh Jesuh te koe a timthoeih uh phoeiah, a maelhmai te a thing pa uh tih a thoek uh. Te phoeiah Jesuh te, “Olphong lah!” a ti nauh. Tueihyoeih rhoek kah kutcaihnah te khaw a duen pah.
Peter te vongtung hmui ah a om vaengah khosoihham kah salnu pakhat te ha pawk.
Hmai aka om Peter te a hmuh vaengah amah te a sawt tih, “Nang khaw Nazareth Jesuh taengah na om van,” a ti nah.
Tedae a aal tih, “Ka ming moenih, na thui te ka hmat moenih,” a ti nah. Tedae thohkaeng la voelh a caeh vaengah ai khong.
Te phoeiah Peter te salnu loh koep a hmuh tih aka pai rhoek taengah, “Anih he amih kah hlang ni,” a ti nah.
Tedae koep a aal bal. Rhaih a om phoeiah aka pai rhoek loh Peter te, “Amih kah hlang rhep ni, Galilee hoel van ni,” a ti nauh.
Te dongah pahoi thae a phoei tih, “Hekah hlang na thui uh he ka ming moenih, “tila a toemngam.
Ai a pabae la pahoi khong tih Jesuh loh anih taengah, “Ai hnavoei a khong tom ah kai voeithum nan huek uh tak ni,” a ti nah ol te Peter loh a poek tih hlut rhap.
Khosoihham rhoek, patong rhoek, cadaek rhoek neh khoboei pum loh dawtletnah yueya tlek a saii uh. Jesuh te a khih uh phoeiah a khuen uh tih Pilat taengah a thak uh.
Te vaengah Pilat loh Jesuh te, “Judah rhoek kah manghai la na om a? tila a dawt. Tedae Jesuh loh anih te a doo tih, “Namah long ni na ti,” a ti nah.
Khosoihham rhoek long khaw Jesuh te tholh muep a paelnaeh uh.
Te dongah Pilat loh Jesuh te koep a dawt tih, “Nang muep m'paelnaeh uh ke khat khaw na doo mahpawt nim? a ti nah.
Tedae Jesuh loh a doo voel pawt dongah Pilat te a ngaihmang.
Te vaengkah khotue takuem ah thongtla pakhat te a hoep tih ana hlah pah.
Te dongah rhalthoh rhoek neh a khoh Barabbas a ti te om. Anih loh olpungnah dongah ngawnnah a saii.
Hlangping te khaw cet uh tih a saii noek la amamih ham koe a bih uh.
Tedae Pilat loh amih te a doo tih, “Na ngaih uh nim, Judah manghai he nangmih ham kan hlah mako?” a ti nah.
Uethnetnah dongah khosoihham rhoek loh anih taengla a voeih uh te a ming.
Tedae khosoihham rhoek loh hlangping te a hueh tih Barabbas te amih ham lat a hlah sak.
Te dongah Pilat loh amih te a doo tih, “Te koinih Judah manghai la na khue uh te metla ka saii ham lae na ngaih uh?” koep a ti nah.
Te rhoek loh, “Anih te tai laeh,” tila koep pang uh.
Tedae Pilat loh amih taengah, “Mebang boethae nim a saii?” a ti nah. Amih long khaw, “Anih te tai laeh,” tila bung pang uh.
Pilat loh hlangping kolo la saii a ngaih dongah amih ham Barabbas te a hlah pah. Tedae Jesuh te a tam tih tai ham a paek.
Te phoeiah rhalkap rhoek loh Jesuh te khoboeiyung a om nah vongup khuila a khuen uh tih caem te a pum la a hueh uh.
Te phoeiah Jesuh te daidi neh a khuk uh tih hling rhuisam a vaeh uh te a khuem sakuh.
Te phoeiah, “Judah rhoek kah manghai na sading saeh,” tila Jesuh te kut koe a tuukuh.
Te phoeiah a lu te capu neh a boh uh tih a timthoeih uh. Khuklu te khaw cungkueng uh tih Jesuh te a bawk uh.
Jesuh te a tamdaeng uh phoeiah daidi te a pit pauh. Te phoeiah a himbai te a bai sak uh tih tai hamla a khuen uh.
Te vaengah Kurena hlang Alexander neh Rufus kah a napa Simon lohma lamkah ha pawk tih pal khum rhoi dae Jesuh kah thinglam te koh sak ham khak a tanolh uh.
Te phoeiah Jesuh te Golgotha hmuen la a khuen uh. Tekah te lurhuh hmuen ni a thuingaih.
Te vaengah myrrh misurtui te Jesuh a paek uh dae doe pawh.
Jesuh te a tai uh phoeiah a himbai te a phen pa uh tih amamih khat khat loh a khuen ham te hmulung a naan uh.
Khonoek pathum a lo vaengah Jesuh te a tai uh.
Te phoeiah a paelnaehnah ming te a daek tih,” Judah Manghai,” la a khueh pah.
Anih neh dingca panit te khaw bantang ah pakhat banvoei ah pakhat a tai uh.
Aka van paitai loh anih te a soehsal uh tih a lu a hinghuen uh.
Te vaengah, “Aw bawkim te aka phae tih hnin thum ah aka sa,
Namah te khang uh lamtah thinglam lamkah rhum lah,” a ti nauh.
Khosoihham rhoek neh cadaek rhoek van long khaw a tamdaeng uh tih khat khat taengah, “A tloe rhoek te a khang dae amah aka khang uh thai pawh.
Israel manghai Khrih thinglam lamkah rhum laeh, te daengah ni kan hmuh uh vetih kan tangnah u eh,” a ti nauh. A taengkah a tai uh long khaw Jesuh te a thuithet.
Khonoek parhuk a pha neh diklai pum ah yinnah loh khonoek pako duela a thing.
Khovang khonoek pako vaengah Jesuh tah, “ Eloi, Eloi lama sabakhthani?” tila a ol a len la pang. Te tah, “Ka Pathen, Ka Pathen, balae tih kai nan phap,” te ni a thuingaih.
Te vaengah a taengkah aka pai khuikah a ngen loh a yaak uh tih, “Elijah a khue ke,” a ti uh.
Hlang pakhat aka yong loh caethum te yuthui neh a sul tih cungkui dongah a kaek. Te phoeiah Jesuh te a tul tih, “Hlah uh lamtah so uh lah sih, anih aka hla la Elijah ha pawk venim,” a ti.
Te phoeiah Jesuh loh ol a lenla a huel tih pat.
Te vaengah bawkim kah hniyan te a soi lamloh a hmui due panit la pawn.
Anih hmai ah aka pai rhalboei long khaw a pat te a hmuh vaengah, “Hekah hlang tah Pathen Capa rhep ni,” a ti.
Te vaengah a hla lamkah aka dan huta rhoek khaw om uh. Amih khuiah Magadala Mary, a noe James neh Joses manu Mary neh Salome khaw om.
Amih tah Galilee ah a om vaeng lamkah loh Jesuh te a vai uh tih a khut uh. Te phoeiah a tloe, amah neh Jerusalem la aka luei rhoek khaw muep omuh.
Te phoeiah hlaem a pha coeng tih rhuengphongnah om. Te dongah te tah huetnah la om.
Te vaengah Arimathea lamkah khoboei hlangcong Joseph te ha pawk. Anih tah amah long khaw Pathen kah ram te aka lamtawn la om. Pilat taengah ngaingaih la cet tih Jesuh kah rhok te a bih.
Jesuh a duek tarha te Pilat khaw a ngaihmang. Te dongah rhalboei te a khue tih, “Duek dingrhae pawn nim ca,” tila a dawt.
Rhalboei lamkah te a mingpha daengah rhok te Joseph a paek.
Te vaengah a himbai lai neh a hlak. Himbai te a yen phoeiah anih te hlan ah a khueh. Te tah lungpang dongah a thuk tangtae la om. Te phoeiah tah hlan rhai te lungto a paluet thil.
Magadala Mary neh Joses manu Mary long khaw a khueh nah te a hmuh.
Sabbath poeng phoeiah Magadala Mary neh James manu Mary neh Salome loh bo-ul a lai tih boeipa te hluk ham la cet rhoi.
Sabbath phoeikah lamhmacuek vaengah yueya aih. pueng dae phuel la a pawk vaengah tah khomik thoeng coeng.
Te vaengah amamih te, “Hlan rhai kah lungto te ulong nim mamih ham a paluet ve?” a ti uh.
Tedae a sawt uh vaengah, lungto vik a paluet uh te a hmuh uh. Te te bahoeng a len la om dae ta.
Phuel khuila a kun uh vaengah hnikul a bok aka bai cadong pakhat tah bantang ben ah ana ngol te a hmuh uh tih a ngaihmang uh.
Tedae anih loh amih taengah, “ Na ngaihmang uh boeh. A tai uh tangtae Nazareth Jesuh te na toem uh. Heah a om moenih thoo coeng . Anih a khueh nah hmuen so uh lah he.
Tedae, cet uh lamtah a hnukbang rhoek neh Peter taengah, 'Nangmih taengah a thui bangla Galilee la nangmih hmaiah lamhma coeng, teah te Jesuh na hmuh uh bitni, 'tila thui pa uh,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah amih te thuennah neh, ngaihmang bangla a om uh dongah phuel lamkah cet tih rhaelrham uh. A rhih uh dongah u taengah khaw thui uh pawh.
A thoh phoeikah Sabbath yarh lamhma cuek mincang ah tah Magadala Mary taengah lamhma la a phoe pah. Rhaithae parhih te anih lamkah ni a haek pah.
Anih te cet tih Jesuh taengah aka om tih a nguek neh aka rhap rhoek taengah puen.
Jesuh hing tih a hmuh te a yaak uh dae a hnalval takuh.
Te phoeiah amih khuikah hlang panit te a kho la cet rhoi tih a pongpa rhoi vaengah mueimae a hloeh la a phoe pah.
Amih rhoi te cet tih a tloe rhoek taengah puen rhoi dae te rhoi te tangnah uh pawh.
Tedae hnuktloih la aka vael hlaikhat rhoek taengah a phoe pa tih amih kah hnalvalnah neh thinthahnah te a toel. Jesuh thoo coeng tih a hmuh uh lalah tangnah uh pawh.
Te phoeiah amih te, “Diklai pum ah cet uh lamtah suentae boeih taengah olthangthen te hoe uh.
Aka tangnah tih aka tuinuem tah daem vetih aka hnalval rhoek tah boe ni.
Te dongah miknoek tah aka tangnah rhoek loh a thuep ni. Ka ming neh rhaithae a haek uh ni. Ol thai te a thui uh ni.
A kut neh rhul a tuuk uh ni. Sue khat khat a ok uh mai akhaw amih te tloh sak mahpawh. Aka tlo soah kut a tloeng uh vetih sading la om uh ni,” a ti nah.
Boeipa Jesuh loh amih a uen phoeiah, vaan la a loh tih Pathen kah bantang ah ngol.
Tekah rhoek te khaw khotomrhali la cet uh tih a hoe uh. Boeipa loh a bongyong dongah olka te miknoek neh a rhoih uh tih a cak sakuh.
Mamih taengah aka soep tangtae hno kah cilol te muep a thuep tih boelrhai vaengah,
oltak kah tueihyoeih la aka om rhoek neh a tongcuek lamloh loh aka hmu rhep rhoek loh mamih taengah m'paek uh vanbangla,
kai khaw khaeh khaeh boeih ka thuep koep tih hlangcong Theophilu nang taengah daek ham tluep ka poek.
Te daengah ni hiluepnah ol loh n'thuituen te khaw na ming eh.
Judea manghai Herod tue vaeng ah, Abijah rhoihui khosoih pakhat, a ming ah Zekhariah te om tih Elizabeth aka ming nah Aaron canu te a yuu nah.
Pathen hmaiah a dueng la bok om rhoi. Boeipa kah rhilam neh olpaek cungkuem dongah cuemthuek la pongpa rhoi.
Tedae Elizabeth tah cakol la om tih camoe a om kolla a kum khaw patong la bok om rhoi coeng.
Pathen hmaiah a khosoih vaengkah bangla anih rhoihui te aitlaeng loh a pha.
Khosoih kah khosing bangla, Boeipa kah bawkim khuiah kun tih hmueihphum ham a yo.
Bo-ul tue vaengah pilnam khuikah aka om rhaengpuei boeih khaw poeng ah thangthui uh.
Te vaengah Boeipa kah puencawn tah a taengah a phoe pah tih bo-ul hmueihtuk kah bantang ah pai.
Zekhariah loh a thuen doela a sawt dongah rhihnah loh anih a tlak thil.
Tedae anih te puencawn pakhat loh, “Zekhariah rhih boeh, nang kah rhenbihnah te a hnatun coeng dongah na yuu Elizabeth loh nang ham capa pakhat han cun vetih, a ming te Johan la na khue ni.
Nang ham omngaihnah neh kohoenah la om vetih anih kah rhuirhong dongah boeih omngaih uh ni.
Boeipa hmaiah a len la om vetih, misurtui neh yu te o loengloeng mahpawh. A manu bung khuiah a om vaengah Mueihla Cim neh baetawt ni.
Israel ca rhoek te a Boeipa Pathen taengla muep a mael puei ni.
Anih tah a hmaiah Elijah kah mueihla neh thaomnah dongah lamhma ni. Pa rhoek kah thinko te ca rhoek taengla, lokhak rhoek te aka dueng lungcueinah dongla mael ni. Rhoekbah tangtae pilnam tah Boeipa ham a hmoel ni,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah Zekhariah loh puencawn taengah, “Hekah he Ba nen lae ka ming eh? Kai tah patong la ka om coeng tih ka yuu khaw a kum te ham coeng,” a ti nah.
Te dongah puencawn loh anih te a doo tih, “Kai tah Pathen hmaiah aka pai Gabriel ni, nang taengah he rhoek he phong ham neh thui ham n'tueih.
Tedae kai ol te na tangnah pawt dongah he he a soep nah khohnin duela olmueh la na om vetih na cal thai mahpawh ne. Amah tue ah ka ol te soep bit ni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Zekhariah te aka lamso pilnam a om dongah bawkim khuiah a di te a ngaihmang uh.
Ha thoeng vaengah tah amih te voek thai voel pawh. Te dongah bawkim khuiah a mangthui a hmuh coeng tila a ming uh. Te dongah Zekhriah loh amih taengah a lu a thuk tih olmueh la phat om.
Amah kah thothueng khohnin te a cup la a om phoeiah tah amah im la cet.
Te khohnin phoeiah a yuu Elizabeth te vawn tih amah khaw hla nga thuh uh.
“Boeipa loh kai ham hnin at neh a saii tangloeng coeng, te nen ni hlang lakliah kai dogkah hnaelnah te khoe hamla n'hip,” a ti.
Hla rhuk dongah Pathen taeng lamkah puencawn Gabriel te Galilee khopuei, a ming ah Nazareth la a tueih.
David imkhui kah hlang pakhat, a ming ah Joseph ham te oila a bae pah. Oila ming tah Mary ni.
Te phoeiah huta taengla kun tih, “A lungvat tangtae aw, omngaih lah, Boeipa tah nang taengah om pai,” a ti nah.
Tedae Mary te tekah olka dongah konglong ngaihit la om tih te toidalnah loh metla a om eh tila a poek.
Puencawn loh anih te, “Mary rhih boeh, Pathen taengkah lungvatnah na dang coeng te.
Te dongah bungvawn neh na yom tih capa na cun vaengah a ming te Jesuh sui ne.
Anih tah tanglue la om vetih Khohni capa tila a khue ni. Boeipa Pathen loh anih te a napa David kah ngolkhoel te a paek ni.
Jakob im ah kumhal due manghai pawn ni. A ram te khaw bawt ti om mahpawh,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Mary loh puencawn taengah, “Hekah he metlam a om eh? tongpa khaw ka ming moenih,” a ti nah.
Te dongah anih te puencawn loh a doo tih, “Mueihla Cim loh nang n'thoeng thil vetih, Khohni kah thaomnah te nang m'muek sak ni. Te dongah na cun te aka cim Pathen Capa tila a khue bal ni.
Te phoeiah namah huiko Elizabeth te a patong soiah, camoe a yom van coeng ke. Te dongah cakol la a khue te tahae ah hla rhuk lo coeng.
Pathen kah olka boeih long tah a tloel nah moenih,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Mary loh, “Boeipa kah salnu he, na olka bangla kai taengah om saeh,” a ti nah. Te phoeiah puencawn tah anih taeng lamloh nong.
Mary tah tekah khohnin ah thoo tih tlang kah Judah kho ah thahluenah neh cet.
Zekhariah im khuiah kun tih Elizabeth te a voek.
Mary kah toidalnah te Elizabeth loh a yaak vaengah a bung khuikah cahni te soipet tih Elizabeth khaw Mueihla Cim neh baetawt.
Te vaengah tamlung neh pang khungdaeng tih, “Nang tah huta rhoek lakliah na yoethen coeng tih, nang bung kah a thaih te a yoethen coeng.
Kai aih he metlam nim, ka boeipa kah a manu kai taengla ha pawk tarha he?
Nang kah toidalnah ol te ka hna khuiah a kun vaengah tah, ka bung khuikah cahni loh kohoenah neh soipet he.
Te dongah Boeipa loh a thui te hmakhahnah om ni tila aka tangnah tah a yoethen,” a ti nah.
Mary long khaw, “Boeipa te ka hinglu loh a oep.
Ka mueihla tah ka khangkung Pathen dongah hlampan coeng.
A salnu mathoe he a paelki thil coeng dongah tahae lamkah tah cadil boeih loh kai ng'uem uh pawn ni.
Kai taengah thaom tloe la a saii dongah, a ming tah cim pai saeh.
A rhennah tah amah aka rhih rhoek kah cadil cahma ham ni.
A ban neh a thaomnah a saii, a thinko kopoek ah buhueng aka pom te a taekyak.
Mangpa rhoek a ngolkhoel lamloh a hlak tih, tlayae rhoek te a pomsang.
Bungpong rhoek te hno then neh a hah sak tih, khuehtawn rhoek a tlongtlai la a tueih.
A rhennah te poek sak hamla a ca Israel te a bom‍ .
A pa rhoek taengah a thui bangla, Abraham neh a tiingan taengah kumhal duela a khueh,” a ti.
Mary te Elizabeth neh hla thum tluk hmaih a naeh phoeiah amah im la bal.
Elizabeth te a om tue a pha coeng tih capa a cun.
Boeipa loh a rhennah te anih taengah a khueh tih, a oep te a huiko neh imben loh a yaak vaengah anih te a omngaih puei uh.
Khohnin hnin rhet a lo vaengah camoe te yahvinrhet ham cet uh. Te vaengah anih te a napa ming Zekhariah la a khue uh.
Tedae a manu loh a doo tih, “Moenih, Johan la a khue ni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah anih taengah, “Hekah ming la a khue te na cako khuiah a om pawt ah,” a ti nauh.
Camoe metla khue a ngaih poek tila a napa te a yavaih uh.
Te vaengah cabael a hoe tih a daek hatah, “A ming tah Johan ni,” a ti tih boeih a ngaihmang uh.
Te vaengah a hmui, a lai te khaw pahoi a khui pah dongah cal tih Pathen te a uem.
Te vaengah amih tolvael rhoek boeih te rhihnah loh a pai thil. Te dongah hekah olka loh Judah tlang tom te boeih a ngae uh.
Aka ya boeih loh a thinko khuiah a dueh uh tih, “Hekah camoe he metlam nim a om ve?” a ti uh. Tedae Boeipa kah kut loh anih te a om puei.
A napa Zekhariah tah Mueihla Cim neh baetawt.
Te dongah a olphong neh, “A pilnam te a hip tih tlannah a saii dongah, Israel Pathen Boeipa tah uemom pai saeh.
A taengom David im khuiah mamih ham khangnah ki a thoh sak.
Khosuen lamloh a tonghma ciim rhoek kah ka dongah a thui vanbangla,
Mamih kah rhal rhoek neh mamih aka hmuhuet rhoek boeih kut lamkah khangnah,
a pa rhoek taengah rhennah tueng sak ham neh a paipi ciim te poek sak ham,
a pa Abraham taengah olhlo neh a toemngam te mamih paek ham,
amah taengah thothueng hamla rhal kut lamloh hoel n'hlawt coeng.
Mamih kah khohnin rhoek boeih te amah hmaiah duengnah neh cimcaihnah ham ni.
Te phoeiah, camoe, nang tah Khohni tonghma la n'khue vetih a longpuei rhoekbah ham Boeipa hmaiah na lamhma ni.
Amih kah tholh khodawkngainah rhangneh a pilnam taengah khangnah mingnah a paek ni.
Mamih Pathen kah rhehnah om. Te nen te a sang lamkah khothoeng loh mamih n'hip.
Dueknah mueihlip neh yinnah khuiah aka ngol rhoek ham te a tue vetih, mamih kah kho te ngaimongnah longpuei la hoihaeng ham ni,” a ti.
Camoe tah rhoeng tih mueihla ah khaw rhaang. Te dongah Israel taengah a phoenah khohnin duela khosoek ah om.
A khohnin a pha vaengah Kaisar Augustus taengkah oltloek te lunglai pum ah a pat.
Te hlangmi soepnah tah Syria Kurenius kah a taem vaengah lamhmacuek la om.
Te dongah hlang boeih loh minghlum ham amah kho la rhip cet uh.
Te vaengah Joseph khaw Galilee, Nazareth kho lamloh Judea kah Bethlehem la a khue David khopuei la cet. Anih te David imkhui kah nurhui pahrhui la om.
Minghlum ham vaengah amah ham a bae Mary te pumrhih la om pueng.
A om rhoi kuelhuelh ah a caom tue loh a kae.
Tedae a capa camingomthang te a cun vaengah tah impahnah ah hmuen a om pawt dongah a yol tih khongduk dongah a soei.
Te vaengah amah tekah pingpang ah tudawn rhoek om uh. A tuping te khoyin ah thongimla a khoem uh tih a rhaeh thiluh.
Te vaengah Boeipa kah puencawn tah amih taengah a phoe pah. Amih te Boeipa kah thangpomnah loh a tue dongah rhihnah neh bahoeng a rhih uh.
Tedae amih te puencawn loh, “Rhih uh boeh, pilnam boeih taengah aka om ham omngaihnah tanglue te nangmih taengah olthangthen kan thui he.
Tihnin ah nangmih ham khangkung om coeng. Anih tah David khopuei ah Khrih Boeipa la om coeng.
Nangmih ham miknoek pakhat om vetih, cahni te a yol phoeiah kongduk dongah a yalh te na hmuh uh ni,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah puencawn te vaan caempuei rhaengpuei loh tarha a om puei tih Pathen te a thangthen uh.
Te vaengah, “Pathen te a sangkoek ah thangpomnah om saeh, diklai ah rhoepnah neh hlang rhoek soah a kolonah om saeh,” a ti uh.
A om van bangla puencawn rhoek tah amih taeng lamloh vaan la cet uh. Tudawn rhoek loh khat neh khat taengah, “Bethlehem la cet pawn sih lamtah olthang aka thoeng he so uh sih. Te tah Boeipa long ni mamih ham a phoe sak,” a ti uh.
Te phoeiah, tatloe la cet uh tih Mary, Joseph neh kongduk dong ah aka yalh cahni te a hmuh uh.
A hmuh uh vaengah, te camoe kawng neh amih taengah a thui olka te a doek uh.
Amih taengah tudawn rhoek loh a thui te aka ya rhoek boeih tah a ngaihmang uh.
Tedae Mary loh tekah olka te boeih a kuem tih a thinko ah a khing a mong.
Tudawn rhoek tah amih taengah a thui pah bangla boeih a hmuh uh. A yaak uh dongah te Pathen a thangpom uh tih a thangthen uh phoeiah bal uh.
Hnin rhet cup coeng tih, camoe te yahvin a rhet vaengah tah a ming te Jesuh a sui. Te tah bung khuikah a yom hlanah puencawn kah a sui pah coeng ni.
Moses kah olkhueng bangla amih kah imcim khohnin te a pha vaengah Jesuh te Boeipa taengah nawn ham Jerusalem la a khuen rhoi.
Boeipa kah olkhueng dongah a daek bangla bung aka va tongpa boeih tah Boeipa ham cimcaih la a khue ni.
Te dongah Boeipa kah olkhueng dongah, “Vahu phiknit mai khaw, vahui ca panit mai khaw,” a ti bangla hmueih te a paek rhoi.
Te vaengah hlang pakhat, a ming ah Simeon te Jerusalem ah khoem om. Tekah hlang tah dueng tih cuep. Te dongah Israel kah thaphohnah te a lamtawn tih Mueihla Cim loh anih a om thil.
Mueihla Cim loh anih taengah, “Boeipa kah Khrih te a hmuh hlan atah dueknah na hmu mahpawh, “tila a mangthui tangtae te om.
Simeon te mueihla loh bawkim khuila a pawk puei. Te vaengah camoe Jesuh amah te olkhueng kah khosing la saii ham a manu pana loh a khuen.
Te phoeiah Simeon loh a kut dongah a doe tih Pathen te a uem.
Te vaengah, “Boeikung na sal he na olthui bangla ngaimongnah neh nan hlah coeng.
Namah kah khangnah te ka mik loh a hmuh coeng.
Te ni pilnam tom kah mikhmuh ah na tawn pah.
Vangnah he namtom a pumphoenah la, thangpomnah te na pilnam Israel hamla om coeng,” a ti.
Camoe kawng a thui soah a napa neh a manu tah a ngaihmang rhoi.
Simeon loh amih te yoethen a paek tih a manu Mary taeng ah, “Anih he Israel khuiah a yet kah a bungnah neh thohkoepnah ham neh boekoek miknoek la a khueh coeng he.
Namah neh namah khaw na hinglu thunglang loh n'rhaih ni. Te daengah ni thinko kah poeknah te poeng a pumphoe eh?,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah Asher koca kah Phanuel canu tonghmanu Anna om tih a kum khaw muep patong coeng. Anih he a hula lamloh a va neh kum rhih bueng hing rhoi.
Te phoeiah kum sawmrhet kum li hil nuhmai la om. Anih tah bawkim te hlah tlaih kolla khoyin khothaih yaehnah neh, rhenbihnah neh tho a thueng.
Pathen uem tue a pai kuelhuelh vaengah Jerusalem kah tlannah aka lamtawn rhoek boeih ham camoe kawng te a thui pah.
Boeipa kah olkhueng bangla boeih a soep vaengah te amah kho Galilee, Nazareth la bal rhoi.
Camoe tah a rhoeng vaengah rhaang tih cueihnah neh bae. Pathen kah lungvatnah long khaw a om thil.
Kum takuem yoom khotue ah a manu napa te Jerusalem la cet.
Kum hlainit a lo vaengah khotue kah khosing bangla amih te cet uh.
Khohnin te cup tih a a bal uh vaengah cadong Jesuh tah Jerusalem ah uelh tih a manu napa loh ming pawh.
Jesuh te lambong khuiah om tila a poek uh dae hnin at long caeh phoeiah tah a huiko neh a hmat taengah a tlap rhoi.
A hmuh rhoi pawt dongah anih tlap ham Jerusalem la mael rhoi.
A thum khohnin a pha phoeiah Jesuh te bawkim khuikah saya rhoek kah a laklung ah ana ngol, amih taengah a hnatun tih amih ana dawt te a hmuh rhoi.
Anih kah yakmingnah neh ollannah boeih te aka ya rhoek boeih tah limlum uh.
Jesuh te a hmuh rhoi vaengah let rhoi tih a manu loh, “Ka capa, balae tih kaimih rhoi tlam he nang khueh? Na pa neh kai loh nang kan toem rhoi tih n'yuek sut coeng he,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah amih rhoi te, “Balae kai nan toem rhoi? A pa im ah ka om ham a kuek te na ming rhoi mahnim?” a ti nah.
Tedae amih rhoi taengah a thui pah olka te amih rhoi loh a hmuhming rhoi moenih.
Te phoeiah amih rhoi taengah cet tih Nazareth la pawk uh. A taengah boengai la om tih olka te a manu loh a thinko ah boeih a khoem.
Jesuh tah cueihnah neh pumrho ah rhoeng tih Pathen neh hlang taengah lungvatnah a dang.
Tiberius Kaisar a manghai kum hlainga vaengah Judea te Pontius Pilat loh a taem tih, Herod te Galilee ah khoboei la om. A manuca Philip tah Ituraea neh Trakhoniti kho kah khoboei la om. Lusania tah Abilene kah khoboei la om.
Annas neh Kaiaphas khosoihham la a om vaengah Pathen kah ol tah khosoek kah Zekhariah capa Johan taengla thoeng.
Te phoeiah Jordan pingpang te boeih a pha tih tholh khodawkngainah ham yutnah baptisma kawng a hoe.
Tonghma Isaiah kah ol te cabu dongah ana daek sut bangla, khosoek kah pang ol loh, “Boeipa kah longpuei te rhoekbah uh lamtah, a caehlong te a dueng la saii uh.
Soklong te boeih a et vetih, tlang neh mol khaw boeih a tlarhoel sak ni. Aka kawn te a dueng la, long mueng khaw long tlaai la om ni.
Te vaengah pumsa boeih loh Pathen kah khangnah a hmuh ni.
Te dongah anih kah a nuem hamla aka thoeng hlangping te, “Rhulthae rhoek kah cadil rhoek, kosi aka tawn uh te rhaelrham tak ham unim nangmih aka tueng?
Te dongah yutnah neh a tiing la a thaih te saii uh. Na khuiah, 'Abraham te pa la ka khueh,’ ti koeloe boeh. Pathen tah hekah lungto lamloh Abraham ca rhoek a thoh thai te nangmih ham kan thui.
Tedae hai tah thing yung ah oepsoeh la a khueh van coeng. Thaih tak la aka thai pawh thing tah boeih a vung tih hmai ah a pup,” a ti nah.
Te dongah amah te hlangping loh a dawt tih, “Te koinih balae ka saii uh eh?” a ti nah.
Te dongah amih te a doo tih, “Angki yungnit aka khueh loh aka khueh pawt te doedan saeh. Te vanbangla caak aka khueh long khaw saii van saeh,” a ti nah.
Te vaengah mangmucoi rhoek khaw nuem hamla ha pawk uh tih anih taengah, “Saya, balae ka saii uh eh? “a ti uh.
Te dongah amih te, “Nangmih ng'uen phoeiah a yet la khoboe boeh,” a ti nah.
Anih te rhalkap rhoek long khaw a dawt uh tih, “Kaimih tah balae ka saii uh van eh?” a ti uh. Amih te khaw, “Hlang te hihham uh boeh, huttet uh boeh. Namamih kah buhcun neh rhaemhal uh,” a ti nah.
Pilnam kah a lamso vanbangla amamih kah thinko ah Johan te boeih a thui uh tih, “Anih he Khrih coini,” a ti uh.
Johan loh a doo tih, “Nangmih he kai loh tui dongah kan nuem dae kai lakah aka tlung te ha pawk coeng. Anih kah khokhom rhui hlam ham pataeng aka koih la ka om moenih. Anih loh nangmih te Mueihla Cim dongah hmai neh n'nuem ni.
A kut dongkah cangcopcung loh a cangtilhmuen a coeh vetih cang te a khai khuila a sang ni. Tedae canghi tah aka duek pawh hmai neh boeih a hoeh ni,” a ti nah.
Te dongah pilnam te a tloe neh muep a thaphoh tih olthangthen a phong pah.
Tedae Herod a khoboei vaengah a mana yuu Herodias kawng dongah Herod loh boethae a saii boeih te Johan loh a toeltham.
Te te boeih a tungsaep thil dongah Johan te thongim ah a uup.
Pilnam te boeih a nuem vaengah Jesuh khaw a nuem tih a thangthui hatah vaan te ong uh.
Te phoeiah Mueihla Cim te a pumrho neh vahu kah mueimae bangla a suntlak thil. Te vaengah, “Nang tah ka capa thintlo la na om tih, nang taengah ka lungtlun,” tila vaan lamkah ol ha thoeng.
Jesuh loh amah bibi a tong vaengah a kum sawmthum tluk lo coeng. Poek vaengah Heli capa Joseph kah a ca bangla om.
Tedae Heli te Matthat capa, Matthat te Levi capa, Levi te Melkhi capa, Melkhi te Janna capa, Janna te Joseph capa,
Joseph te Mattathias capa, Mattathias te Amos capa, Amos te Nahum capa, Nahum te Esli capa, Esli te Naggai capa,
Naggai te Maath capa, Maath te Mattathias capa, Mattathias te Shimei capa, Shimei te Joseph capa, Joseph te Joda capa,
Joda te Joanan capa, Joanan te Rhesa capa, Rhesa te Jerubbabel capa, Zerubbabel te Shealtiel capa, Shealtiel te Neri capa,
Neri te Melkhi capa, Melkhi te Addi capa, Addi te Kosam capa, Kosam te Elmadam capa, Elmadam te Er capa,
Er te Jose capa, Jose te Eliezer capa, Eliezer te Jorim capa, Jorim te Matthat capa, Matthat te Levi capa,
Levi te Simeon capa, Simeon te Judah capa, Judah te Joseph capa, Joseph te Jonan te Eliakim capa,
Eliakim te Melea capa, Melea te Menna capa, Menna te Mattatha capa, Mattatha te Nathan capa, Nathan te David capa,
David te Jesse capa, Jesse te Obed capa, Obed te Boaz capa, Boaz te Sala capa, Sala bte Nashon capa,
Nashon te Amminadab capa, Aminadab te Admin capa, Admin te Aram capa, Aram te Hezron capa, Hezron te Perez capa, Perez te Judah capa,
Judah te Jakob capa, Jakob te Isaak capa, Isaak te Abraham capa, Abraham te Terah capa, Terah te Nakhaw capa,
Nakhaw te Saruk capa, Saruk te Rhagau capa, Rhagau te Phalek capa, Phalek te Eber capa, Eber te Shelah capa,
Shelah te Kainan capa, Kainan te Arpaxad capa, Arpaxad te Shem capa, Shem te Noah capa, Noah te Lamekh capa,
Lamekh te Methuselah capa, Mehtuselah te Enok capa, Enok te Jared capa, Jared te Maleleel capa, Maleleel te Kainan capa,
Kainan te Enos capa, Enos te Seth capa, Seth te Adam capa, Adam te Pathen capa la om.
Jesuh tah Jordan lamloh Mueihla Cim a baetawt la mael tih Mueihla loh khosoek la a khuen.
Rhaithae loh khohnin sawmli a noemcai. Tekah khohnin vaengah caak pakhat khaw a caak kolla bungpong neh a thok sak.
Te vaengah anih te rhaithae loh, “Pathen capa la na om atah, lungto he voek lamtah buh la poeh saeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah anih te Jesuh loh, “'Hlang long he buh bueng neh hing boel saeh, 'tila a daek coeng ta,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah anih te a khuen tih a tue kolkalh rhuet ah lunglai kah ram rhoek te boeih a tueng.
Te vaengah anih te rhaithae loh, “Hekah saithainah boeih neh a thangpomnah he nang kam pae eh?, kai taengah m'paek coeng dongah ka ngaih te tah ka paek mai.
Te dongah, nang khaw kai taengah na bakop atah nang hamla boeih om bitni,” a ti nah.
Tedae Jesuh loh anih te a doo tih, “A daek tangtae coeng ni, BOEIPA na Pathen mah bawk lamtah amah bueng mah thothueng,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah anih te Jerusalem la a khuen tih bawkim kah tlungsoi ah a pai sak. Te vaengah anih te, “Pathen capa la na om atah, he lamloh namah te cungpung thuk.
A daek tangtae vanbangla amah kah puencawn rhoek te nang aka khoem ham namah yueng a uen bitni.
Na kho te lungto dongah na tongtah ve a ti dongah nang te a kut neh n'dom uh bitni,” a ti nah.
Tedae anih Jesuh loh a doo tih, “A thui coeng te ta, BOEIPA na Pathen te noemcai boeh,” a ti nah.
Rhaithae loh a noemcainah te boeih a soep coeng dongah a tuetang a pha hlan duela anih taeng lamloh nong.
Jesuh tah Mueihla kah thaomnah neh Galilee la mael. Te vaengah anih kah olthang te te rhoek pingpang tom ah cet.
Amamih kah tunim ah khaw a thuituen tih hlang boeih loh a thangpom.
Te phoeiah aka khut a om nah Nazareth la pawk. Tedae a sainoek bangla Sabbath hnin ah tunim khuila kun tih ca tae hamla pai.
Te vaengah anih te tonghma Isaiah kah cabu te a doe uh. Cabu te a hlam vaengah tekah hmuen ah a daek tangtae aka om te a hmuh;
BOEIPA Mueihla loh kai n'om thil tih khodaeng te olthangthen phong pah ham kai ng'koelh coeng. Hlangsol taengah khodawkngainah, mikdael taengah khoval te hoe pah ham, a haemtaek rhoek te khodawkngainah khuila tueih ham,
BOEIPA kah kum uem om te hoe ham kai n'tueih coeng.
Cabu te a awn tih tueihyoeih taengla a mael phoeiah ngol. Te dongah tunim ah aka om rhoek kah a mik loh anih te boeih a hmaitang uh.
Te dongah amih te, “Tihnin ah olcim he nangmih hna khuiah soep coeng,” pahoi a ti nah.
Te vaengah anih te boeih a oep uh tih a ka lamkah aka thoeng lungvatnah olka dongah a ngaihmang uh. Te dongah, “Joseph capa moenih a he?,” a ti uh.
Te dongah amih te, “Siboei la, 'Namah mah hoeih vaikhai,’ a ti, nuettahnah he kai taengah na thui uh tangkhuet. Kapernaum ah aka om te boeih ka yaak uh coeng, he khaw namah tolrhum ah saii,’ na ti uh.
Tedae nangmih taengah rhep ka thui, Amah tolrhum ah a uem uh tonghma a om moenih.
Nangmih te oltak ni kan thui. Elijah tue vaengah Israel khuiah nuhmai muep om. Te vaengah vaan ke kum thum hla rhuk a khaih tih, khokha loh diklai pum ah muep om.
Te vaengah Sidoni Zarephath kah nuhmai nu taeng pawt atah amih taengla Elijah a tueih moenih.
Tonghma Elisha tue vaengah Israel khuiah hmaibae muep om dae, Syria Naaman pawt atah amih a cing pah moenih,” a ti nah.
Te rhoek te a yaak uh vaengah tunim khuikah rhoek tah a thinsanah neh boeih hah uh.
Te dongah thoo uh tih Jesuh te kho voel la a haek uh. Anih te tulh ham amamih kah a sak khopuei tlang kah pango la a khuen uh.
Tedae amih te a laklung ah a va tih cet.
Te phoeiah Galilee khopuei, Kapernaum la suntla thuk tih, Sabbath vaengah amih aka thuituen la pahoi om.
A ol tah saithainah neh a om dongah a thuituennah te a ngaihmang uh.
Te vaengah rhaithae kah rhalawt mueihla aka kaem hlang te tunim khuiah om tih ol ue la pang.
“Aya! Nazareth Jesuh, nang taeng neh kaimih taengah balae aka om? Kaimih aka poci sak ham nim na pawk? Nang te kan ming ta, Pathen kah hlangcim la na om ta,” a ti.
Tedae anih te Jesuh loh a ho tih, “Paa lamtah anih lamloh cet,” a ti nah. Te dongah anih te rhaithae loh a laklung la a voeih tih a tloh kolla anih te a caeh tak.
Te vaengah ngaihmangnah loh boeih a thoeng thil uh. Te dongah khat neh khat te voek uh tih, “Mebang olka nim he, saithainah neh a thaomnah dongah rhalawt mueihla rhoek a tueih tih, a caeh uh mai he,” a ti uh.
Te dongah Jesuh kah olhum tah te rhoekg pingpang kah a hmuen boeih la pawk.
Tunim lamloh thoo tih Simon im la kun. Te vaengah Simon masae te satloh om tih a nan malcal. Te dongah anih kongah Jesuh te a dawt uh.
Anih te a pai thil tih tloh te a ho daengah anih te tloh loh a hlah. Te dongah pahoi thoo tih amih te a kok.
Khomik a tlak vaengah tlohtat cungkuem neh tattloel la aka om boeih te Jesuh taengla a khuen uh. Amih pakhat rhip te kut a tloeng thil tih amih te a hoeih sak.
A yet taeng lamkah rhaithae rhoek khaw nong uh. Te phoeiah pang uh tih, “Nang tah Pathen capa ni,” a ti nah. Anih te Khrih ni tila a ming uh dongah amih te a ho tih thui sak voel pawh.
Khothaih a pha vaengah khoe uh tih khosoek hmuen te a paan. Tedae hlangping loh anih te a toem uh tih anih te a paan uh. Te phoeiah amih taeng lamkah a nong pawt ham Jesuh te a tuuk uh.
Tedae amih te, “Pathen kah ram te kho tloe rhoek taengah khaw ka thui ham a kuek dongah ni n'tueih,” a ti nah.
Te dongah Judea ah om tih tunim ah olthangthen a hoe.
A om rhuet vaengah anih te hlangping loh a et tih Pathen kah olka a hnatun uh. Te vaengah anih tah Gennesaret tuili taengah om tih pai.
Te vaengah tuili kah aka pai lawng panit te a hmuh. Tedae te lamkah tuihoi rhoek tah lawk suk la khoe uh coeng. Te phoeiah ngol tih lawng dong lamkah loh hlangping te a thuituen.
Te phoeiah lawng pakhat khuila kun. Te tah Simon kah la a om dongah, “Lan lamkah bet thoeih dae,” a ti nah.
A thui a bawt van neh Simon te, “A dung la thoeih lamtah nga tuuknah ham na lawk te voei lah,” a ti nah.
Tedae Simon loh a doo tih, “Boeipa, khoyin khing ah ka thakthae uh tih ka dang uh moenih. Tedae namah ol dongah lawk te ka voei eh?,” a ti nah.
A saii uh tangloeng vaengah nga hol te muep a kol uh tih a lawk khaw a va pah.
Te dongah lawng tloe dongkah a pueipo rhoek te a cavaih uh tih amih talong ham ha pawk uh. Tedae ha pawk uh vaengah lawng rhoi te bae coeng tih dalh buek uh.
Simon Peter loh a hmuh vaengah Jesuh te khuklu a bakop thil tih, “Kai taeng lamloh nong laeh, kai he hlang tholh ni BOEIPA,” a ti nah.
A tuuk uh bangla a nga tuknah soah amah neh a taengkah rhoek boeih te ngaihmangnah loh a tuuk.
Simon kah a pueipo la aka om Zebedee ca rhoi James neh Johan khaw a ngaihmang rhoi van. Te phoeiah Simon te Jesuh loh, “Rhih boeh tahae lamkah tah hlang aka tu la na om pawn ni,” a ti nah.
Lawng rhoek te lan la a thak phoeiah boeih a toeng uh tih Jesuh te a vai uh.
Kho pakhat ah a om vaengah hlang pakhat tah hmaibae hoeng la tarha om. Jesuh te a hmuh vaengah a hmai long bakop. Te vaengah, “BOEIPA na ngaih atah kai nan cim sak thai,” a ti nah tih a bih.
Anih te kut a yueng doela a taek tih, “Ka ngaih ta, cim saeh,” a ti nah. Te dongah anih te hmaibae loh pahoi a nong tak.
Tedae anih te Jesuh loh, “Thui boeh ne, tedae cet lamtah namah te khosoih taengah moe pah, na cimcaihnah dongah Moses loh ng'uen bangla nawn lamtah amih taengah laipai la om saeh,” a ti nah.
Tedae anih kah olthang tah a nah la cet. Te dongah a ol hnatun ham neh amih vawtthoek rhoek te hoeih sak ham hlangping loh muep tingtun uh.
Tedae Jesuh amah tah khosoek la vi uh tih thangthui.
Hnin at om tih Jesuh loh a thuituen vaengah, Galilee vangca boeih neh Judea, Jerusalem lamkah aka pawk Pharisee rhoek neh saya rhoek khaw om uh tih ngol uh. Te vaengah a hoeih ham khaw BOEIPA kah a thaomnah loh om ngawn coeng.
Khawn tih aka om sut hlang te hlang rhoek loh phak dongah tarha hang khuen uh. Te phoeiah a taengla a khuen tih tloeng pah ham Jesuh a toem uh.
Tedae hlangping laklo ah metla anih khuen ham khaw hmu uh thai pawh. Imphu la yoeng uh bangyai longah a laklung kah Jesuh hmaiah thingkongca neh a hlak uh.
Amih kah tangnah te a hmuh vaengah, “Hlang pa aw, na tholhnah loh nang n'hlah coeng,” a ti nah.
Tedae cadaek rhoek neh Pharisee rhoek long tah dawtlet ham a tong uh tih, “Soehsalnah aka thui te unim ca he? Pathen bueng pawt atah tholh hlah ham ulae aka coeng thai eh?” a ti uh.
Tedae amih kah poeknah te Jesuh loh a ming dongah amih te a doo tih, “Nangmih thinko khuiah balae na poek uh?
'Na tholh loh nang n'hlah coeng, 'ti ham neh 'Thoo lamtah cet, 'ti ham te melae a phoeng la aka om?
Te daengah ni hlang capa loh diklai dongah tholh hlah hamla saithainah a khueh te na ming uh eh,” a ti nah. Aka khawn te khaw, “Namah khaw kan thui eh?, thoo, na thingkongca te khuen lamtah namah im la cet laeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah amih hmaiah hlat thoo tih, a yalh nah te a khuen tih, Pathen a thangpom doela a im te a paan.
Te vaengah mueimang bangla boeih om uh tih Pathen te a thangpom uh. Rhihnah nen khaw baetawt uh tih, “Tihnin ah poektloel la m'hmuh,” a ti uh.
Te phoei lamkah loh a caeh vaengah a ming ah Levi, mangmu aka coi tah mangmu doenah ah a ngol te a hmuh tih, “Kai m'vai laeh,” a ti nah.
Te dongah a cungkuem te a hnoo phoeiah thoo tih Jesuh te a vai.
Te phoeiah Levi loh amah im ah Jesuh ham buhloei muep a tael pah. Te vaengah mangmucoi rhoek khaw hlangping la muep om tih amih taengkah aka om hlang tloe rhoek long khaw a vael uh.
Te dongah Pharisee rhoek neh cadaek rhoek loh Jesuh kah hnukbang rhoek te a kohuet thil uh tih, “Balae tih mangmucoi rhoek neh hlangtholh rhoek taengah na caak na ok uh?” a ti nauh.
Jesuh loh amih te a doo tih, “Siboei he sading rhoek loh ngoe pawt cakhaw tloh aka khueh rhoek long tah a ngoe.
Aka dueng rhoek khue ham pawt tih aka tholh rhoek te yutnah dongla khue ham ni ka pawk,” a ti nah.
Te rhoek loh Jesuh te, “Johan kah hnukbang rhoek tah puet a yaeh uh tih rhenbihnah khaw a saii uh. Pharisee rhoek kah hnukbang rhoek long khaw a saii uh van. Nangmih tah na caak na ok uh,” a ti nauh.
Tedae Jesuh loh amih te, “Yulueihmuen kah pacaboeina la na om uh moenih a? Amih neh a om rhuet ah yulokung loh a yaeh ham na saii uh aya?
Tedae a tue ha pawk bitni, yulokung te amih taeng lamkah loh a khue khohnin ah a yaeh uh bitni,” a ti nah.
Te phoeiah amih te nuettahnah neh, “Himbai a thai te a himbai pen la a phen tih himbai rhuem a bo thil moenih. Te pawt koinih, a thai khaw pawn vetih himpai pen a thai te a rhuem neh rhoep mahpawh.
Misur noe te tuitang rhuem dongah a than moenih, te pawt koinih, misur noe loh tuitang te a va vetih, misur khaw cae ni, tuitang khaw poci ni.
Tedae misur noe te tuitang thai dongah ni a than.
A rhuem aka o loh misur noe a ngaih moenih. 'A rhuem tah kodam la om,’ a ti,” a ti nah.
Sabbath a om vaengah Jesuh te canghli longah pah phai. Te vaengah a hnukbang rhoek loh cangvuei te a yun uh tih a kut neh a noi uh phoeiah a caak uh.
